这个作业站站长孔令强说，这种飞机一天能对6000多亩耕地喷施药剂，效率约是无人机的8倍，是人工的数百倍。	Kong Lingqiang, Director of the Work Station, said that such planes were able to spray pesticides over 6,000 mu (400 hectares) of fields per day, the efficiency of which was eight times unmanned aerial vehicle, and hundreds of times that of human labor.	The operator, Kong Lingqiang, said that the aircraft can spray more than 6,000 acres of arable land a day, which is about eight times more efficient than drones and hundreds of times more artificial.	Kong Lingqiang, the station director, said such aircraft can spray more than 6,000 acres of cultivated land a day, about eight times more efficient than drones and hundreds of times more artificial.
这个农场位于我国第一产粮大省黑龙江省友谊县境内，从过去“唰唰”的割稻声穿越到如今“隆隆”的马达声，中华传统农耕与农场在这片黑土带上实现蜕变。	The farm is located in Youyi County, Heilongjiang Province, which is the largest grain production base of China, and judging from the swish of cutting the rice seedlings with sickles in the past to the rumble of motors today, we can see that China’s traditional agriculture and farm have changed tremendously in the black land. In addition to aircraft, satellites are also used in modern agricultural production at Friendship Farm.

在今年的水稻生产过程中，农场将卫星导航无人驾驶插秧技术的作业面积从去年的3000亩扩展到30000亩。	During the production of rice this year, the farm extended the area utilizing satellite navigation unmanned driving transplantation technology to 30,000 mu (2,000 hectares) from 3,000 mu (200 hectares) last year.	During rice production this year, the farm expanded the operating area of its sat-nav unmanned interpolator technology to 30,000 acres from 3,000 acres last year.	During this year's rice production, the farm expanded its operations with satellite navigation unmanned interpolation technology to 30,000 acres from 3,000 acres last year.

This technology makes planting more uniform, maximizes the use of sunlight and cropland resources, and saves 16 yuan in labor costs per acre. Moscow, July 25 (Xinhua) -- According to the plans of the Russian Ministry of Defense, the Ka-52M, an upgraded version of the Russian armed helicopter (hereinafter referred to as Wuzhi), will be completed in December this year for the first time.
据俄《消息报》日前报道，武直卡-52M名为“超级短吻鳄”，其研制合同于去年4月由俄军方与军工单位签订，目前首批2架该升级版武直正在俄“进步”航空航天集团公司的远东直升机制造厂接受改造换装，其国家级测试和改进收尾工作将于2022年10月前结束。	According to recent reports in Russia’s Izvestiya, the Kamov Ka-52M is nicknamed the “Super Alligator”, and the contract for its development was signed between the Russian military and military institutions in April last year; now, the first batch of the two upgraded Kamov Ka-52M are being completed at the Far Eastern Helicopter Factory of Russian “Progress” Aerospace Cooperation, and national-level testing and final improvements of the design will conclude by October 2022.	According to Russian Newspapers, Wuzhika-52M is called "super alligator." Its development contract was signed by the Russian military and military industrial units in April last year. At present, the first two upgraded versions of Wuzhi are undergoing transformation and replacement at the Far East Helicopter Manufacturing Plant of the Russian "Progress" Aerospace Group.	According to the Russian news newspaper recently reported that Wuzhika-52M named "Super Alligator," its development contract was signed by the Russian military and military industrial units in April last year, currently the first batch of two of the upgraded version Wuzhi is undergoing modification and replacement of Russian "Progress" aerospace group Far East Helicopter Factory, its national testing and improvement work will be completed by October 2022.
据了解上述升级工作的俄专家介绍，“超级短吻鳄”的“前辈”——武直卡-52于2011年11月正式列装，该机型在使用中暴露出一些弱点，此次改造升级正是为了“补短板”。	According to Russian experts familiar with the aforementioned upgrading work, the “predecessor” of the “Super Alligator”, the Kamov Ka-52, was officially commissioned in November 2011, but defects were discovered during use, so the upgrading was designed to for “address the defects”. 报道说，与卡-52相比，卡-52M将部分采用不会增加重量的新型防护材料，其飞行员座舱将被加固，配备抵御导弹攻击的新装备，从而增加战场生存概率；装配功率更大的发电机，以便为更加复杂的机载电子设备供电；光电系统升级，能够侦察、识别相距更远的战场目标；配备主要攻击装甲战车和钢筋混凝土防御工事的新式轻型多用途导弹，其射程达20公里，比俄现役武直使用的同类导弹射程提高约1倍；其防御武器和通信设备将最大限度地与可攻击空中目标的米-28NM武装直升机通用，从而使相关维护变得简便和经济。	The report claimed that, in comparison with the Kamov Ka-52, the Kamov Ka-52M would partially use new armor materials which would not increase its weight, the seat of pilots would be consolidated with new equipment to defend against missile attacks to increase the possibility of survival in the battlefield, and it also has: a stronger power generator to generate electricity for more complex airborne electronic equipment; upgraded light and electricity systems, which detect and identify targets in the battlefield at great distances; new light missiles with multiple uses to mainly attack armored vehicles and reinforced concrete fortifications at a range of up to 20 kilometers, double the range of the same missile used in the current helicopter; and defensive weapons and communication equipment will be commonly used with Mi-28NM, which is able to attack targets in the air to make protection work more convenient and economical.	According to the report, the Ka-52M will be partially armed with new protection materials that will not increase weight, and its pilot cabin will be strengthened with new equipment to withstand missile attacks, thus increasing the probability of battlefield survival; more powerful generators will be installed to power more complex airborne electronic equipment; photovoltaic systems will be upgraded to detect and identify more distant battlefield targets; new multipurpose missiles will be equipped with mainly armored combat vehicles and reinforced concrete fortifications, with a range of up to 20 km, which is about one times higher than the range of similar missiles used by Russian armed forces in active service; and defensive weapons and communications equipment will be used to maximize the utility of Mi-28NM helicopter gunships that can attack airborne targets, thus making	The report said that compared with the Ka-52, the Ka-52M will partially use new protective materials that do not increase weight, its pilot cockpit will be reinforced with new equipment against missile attack, thereby increasing battlefield survival probability; equipped with more powerful generators to power more complex on-board electronic equipment; photoelectric system upgrade, capable of reconnaissance and identification of more distant battlefield targets; equipped with main attack armored combat vehicles and reinforced concrete fortifications of the new light multi-purpose missile, with a range of 20 km, about 1 times more than the same missiles used by Russia in active military service; its defense weapons and communications equipment will be used to the maximum extent possible with the Mi-28NM helicopter gunships that can attack airborne targets, thus making related maintenance easy and economical.

河北今年以来河湖生态补水17.5亿立方米-中新网	Ecological water restoration of 1.75 billion cubic meters to rivers and lakes has been realized in Hebei Province so far this year -Ecns.cn	Hebei river and lake ecological recharge 1.75 billion cubic meters since this year -	Hebei river and lake ecological water supply 1.75 billion cubic meters this year

Hebei province has seized the advantageous opportunity of increasing the flow of water through the south-north water north to increase the middle line project, and has implemented ecological recharge of water to Tang River, Sha River and Qianlong River by drawing	Hebei Province seized the favorable opportunity of increasing the flow of water from the south-to-north water diversion project and implemented ecological water supply to Tang River, Shahe River and Panlong River.
与此同时，利用西大洋、东武仕等9座大中型水库及白洋淀向滏阳河、青龙河等河流实施了生态补水，累计形成水面面积超过90平方公里。	Meanwhile, nine large and medium-sized reservoirs, Xidayang Reservoir and Dongwushi reservoir for example, and Baiyang Lake supplied water to rivers such as Fuyang River and Qinglong River, creating a total water surface area of over 90 square kilometers.	At the same time, nine large and medium-sized reservoirs, including the West Ocean and Dongwuyuan, and the Baiyangdian River were used to recharge rivers such as the Xiangyang River and Qinglong River.	At the same time, nine large and medium-sized reservoirs such as West Ocean and Tobushi and Baiyangdian were used to replenish water to rivers such as Puyang River and Qinglong River, with a total surface area of more than 90 square kilometers
为做好生态补水工作，河北省水利厅积极组织开展补水河流隐患排查、整治加固和河道清洁工作，细化实化措施，加强巡查管护。	In order to do a good job of ecological water replenishment, the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province actively organizes the investigation of hidden hazards, rectification and reinforcement, and river cleaning work to strengthen inspection and management with detailed and practical implementation measures.	In order to do a good job of ecological recharge, the Hebei Water Department has actively organized the inspection and remediation of hidden dangers of recharging rivers and cleaning rivers, refining practical measures and strengthening patrol and management.	In order to do a good job of ecological water supply, the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province actively organizes the investigation of hidden dangers of water supply rivers, remediation and reinforcement and river cleaning work, refine practical measures, strengthen inspection and management.
通过督导检查与集中暗访，及时解决各类问题，确保了河流补水安全有序。	Through supervision, inspection, and intensive & secret inquiries, various problems were resolved in time to ensure the safe and smooth replenishment work.	Through supervision and inspection and centralized secret visits, all kinds of problems can be solved in time to ensure the safe and orderly recharge of the river	Through supervision and inspection and centralized secret visits, timely solve all kinds of problems, ensure that the river water supply safe and orderly.
据河北省水利厅相关负责人介绍，河湖生态补水的有序实施，有效修复了河北省河湖水生态环境，促进了沿岸地下水的回补和涵养，极大改善了沿线人居环境和经济发展环境，对实现“水清、岸绿、河畅、景美”的河湖管理保护目标具有重要意义。	According to the person in charge of the relevant division in the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province, the smooth ecological water replenishment effectively restored the ecological environment of rivers and lakes in Hebei Province, and was also conducive to the replenishment and nourishment of groundwater along the river bank; besides greatly improving the living and economic development environment, it is deeply significant in the process of realizing the goal of "clear water, green shores, unobstructed courses, and beautiful scenery" for managing and protecting rivers and lakes.	According to the relevant head of Hebei Water Resources Department, the orderly implementation of river and lake ecological recharge has effectively repaired the river and lake ecological environment in Hebei Province, promoted the recharge and conservation of coastal groundwater, greatly improved the living and economic development environment along the coast, and has great significance for the realization of the goal of "clean water, green shore, smooth river and jingmei	According to the relevant person in charge of the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province, the orderly implementation of river and lake ecological replenishment, effectively repair the river and lake ecological environment of Hebei Province, promote the replenishment and conservation of coastal groundwater, greatly improve the living environment and economic development environment along the route, to achieve the goal of "clean water, shore green, river smooth, Jingmei"

新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。	BEIJING, July 26, 2020 (Xinhua, by Ni Yuanjin) July 26 marks the beginning of “Zhongfu (the second phase of Sanfu)” this year. 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。	However, on July 24 and 25, Beijing was under a blue alert for high temperature; the highest temperature of most regions was 37 degrees Celsius, while some regions were even hotter, with a temperature of over 40 degrees Celsius. 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。	Sanfu is the period with the highest temperature and humidity within a year, consisting of “three phases” every year, the second of which is the hottest, the period when people “lose their appetites”.	Futian is the highest temperature, humidity and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in the year. The hottest is in mid-voltage. The Chinese people say "bitter summer."	Fu Tian is the highest temperature, humid, sweltering day of the year, a year has "three volts," the hottest in the mid-volt, Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.

At the time, the house was filled with barns, and the folk had a "one-volume satin two-volume face."	When the family fills up the barn, there is a saying that the people have "one volt of chopsticks and two volts of surface."

饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。	Therefore, mung beans and coix seeds should be eaten to clear the heat, invigorate the spleen, and stimulate the appetite, and bitter foods such as sow thistle and bitter gourd can also be eaten for the same functions. 发动机可能熄火 FAA急令查2000架波音客机-新华网	FAA launches urgent investigation of 2,000 passenger jets due to possible engine stalling - Xinhuanet	Engine may quench FAA emergency investigation of 2,000 Boeing airliners - Xinhua	FAA orders emergency investigation of 2,000 Boeing airliners - Xinhua News Agency
美国联邦航空局(FAA)24日发布紧急适航指令，要求对在美注册的大约2000架波音737NG和737Classic型客机作紧急检查，缘由是上述客机的空气止回阀遭腐蚀后可能导致发动机空中停车。	On the 24th, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) issued an emergency Airworthiness Directive demanding an urgent inspection of the roughly 2,000 737NG and 737 Classic airliners registered in the US due to the fact that corrosion of the airliners’ air check valves may cause the engines to stall while in midair.	The FAA issued an emergency airworthiness directive on February 24, requiring urgent inspections of approximately 2,000 Boeing 737NG and 737Classic airliners registered in the United States, as the air check valves of the said airliners may be corroded and lead to engine aerial parking.	The United States Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) issued an emergency airworthiness directive requiring urgent inspections of approximately 2,000 Boeing 737NG and 737Classic aircraft registered in the United States because the corrosion of the air check valves of these aircraft may cause the engine to stop in the air.
联邦航空局说，迄今收到4份737NG和737Classic型客机发动机空中停车的报告，因而作出紧急检查要求，检查对象是连续停放7天及以上的客机和重新投入飞行后迄今飞行次数低于11次的客机。	The FAA said it has received reports of 4 incidents of 737NG and 737 Classic aircraft engines stalling in midair, so it has issued the emergency inspection order for all passenger aircraft that have been idled for 7 days or more or reactivated aircraft which have made fewer than 11 flights.	According to the Federal Aviation Administration, four reports of engine aerial parking of 737NG and 737Classic airliners have been received to date, resulting in urgent inspection requests for passenger aircraft parked for seven days or more and for those that have returned to flight less than 11 times so far.	The Federal Aviation Administration stated that it had received four reports of airborne engine parking for 737NG and 737Classic aircraft to date, resulting in urgent inspection requests for airliners that had been parked for seven consecutive days or more and for airliners that had flown fewer than 11 times so far since re-
联邦航空局警告，客机全部两台发动机的第5级止回阀如果都遭腐蚀，可能卡死在打开位置，导致客机完全失去动力且无法重启发动机。	The FAA warned that if the Level 5 check valves in both engines of a passenger airliner become corroded, they may become stuck in the open position, causing the aircraft to completely lose power and be unable to restart its engines.	The Federal Aviation Administration warned that if all two engines of the airliner's Level 5 check valve were corroded, they could become stuck in the open position, causing the airliner to lose power completely and be unable to	The Federal Aviation Administration warned that if both engines were corroded, stage 5 check valves could get stuck in the open position, causing the aircraft to lose power completely and fail to restart the engine.
这一航空监管机构下令，一旦发现止回阀遭腐蚀，航空运营商必须在客机再次投入使用前更换这一关键部件。	The regulatory agency’s order stipulates that if a check valve is found to be corroded, this critical component must be immediately replaced by the operator before the airplane may be returned to service.	The aviation regulator ordered that once the check valve is found to be corroded, the air operator must replace the key component before the airliner can re-enter service.	The aviation regulator ordered that once corrosion of the check valve was detected, the airline operator must replace this critical component before the aircraft could be brought back into service.

治水要从源头下手。	Treating the waters begins at the source.	Water treatment starts at the source.	Water treatment should start from the source.
在宁夏银川，当地采取“提标+治污+严管”的方式，工业园区污水全部实现集中处理，城镇污水处理厂全部实现一级A标准排放，城市建成区黑臭水体基本消除，成功申报第三批中国黑臭水体示范城市。	In Ningxia’s Yinchuan, through a “raising standards + cleaning up pollution + strict management” method, all wastewater from industrial parks is collected and treated, all urban water treatment plants have achieved Class A discharge standards, bodies of dark and smelly water in built-up urban areas have essentially been eliminated, and the city’s application to be included in the Third Batch of China Model Cities for Dark and Odorous Water Management has been approved.	In Yinchuan, Ningxia, the local "bid raising pollution control strict control" method, the industrial park sewage treatment is all centralized, the urban sewage treatment plant has all achieved a level A standard discharge, the urban built-up area black odor water body basically eliminated, successfully declared the third batch	In Yinchuan, Ningxia, the local adopted the method of "raising standards pollution control strict pipe," all industrial park sewage treatment, urban sewage treatment plants to achieve Class A standard discharge, urban built-up areas basically eliminated black odor water, successfully declared the third batch of China black odor water demonstration cities.

自2009年以来，宁夏相关部门已累计投入湿地保护工程项目资金约34.5亿元人民币，目前，银川湿地面积为1.92万公顷，湿地保护率达78.5%，有自然湖泊、沼泽湿地近200个，拥有5处国家湿地公园、1处国家城市湿地公园、6处自治区级湿地公园、8处市级公园。	Since 2009, the related departments in Ningxia have invested a total of 3.45 billion RMB in wetland protection projects; presently, Yinchuan’s wetlands cover 19,200 hectares, of which 78.5% are protected areas; Yinchuan has nearly 200 natural lakes and marsh wetlands, has 5 national wetland parks, 1 national urban wetland park, 6 autonomous region wetland parks, and 8 municipal parks. 银川市湿地保护中心副主任吕金虎告诉记者，湿地保护增加了生物多样性，在鸟类身上体现得尤为明显，“遗鸥是一种濒危鸟类，全世界只有2万多只，其中银川湿地就栖息着2千多只。”	Deputy director of the Yinchuan Wetland Conservation Center Lu Jinhu expressed to this reporter that wetland protection has increased biodiversity, which is especially apparent in the variety of bird species, “The relict gull is endangered, with just over 20,000 left in the world, of which more than 2,000 nest in Yinchuan wetlands. “	Lu Jinhu, deputy director of the Yinchuan Wetland Conservation Center, told reporters that wetland conservation increases biodiversity and is particularly evident in birds. "Widows are an endangered bird, with more than 20,000 in the world, including more than 2,000 in the Yinchuan Wetland." 从2010年起，银川市就开始面临持续性的夏季高峰期的缺水问题，近十年的“缺水之痛”成为众多高楼层居民夏日痛苦的经历，但在各大水源地处于超采极限、市区地下已形成大面积地下水超采漏斗区的现状下，水源性缺水已成为困扰银川市的难题。	Starting in 2010, Yinchuan faced perennial water shortages during the peak summer season, and over the past decade, this water shortage has become a painful summer experience for many high-rise dwellers, but with all major water sources extremely stressed and the city’s drilling and exploitation of huge areas of groundwater, water shortages were a significant problem for Yinchuan.	Since 2010, Yinchuan City has faced a persistent water shortage problem during the peak summer season. The "water shortage pain" of the past decade has become a painful summer experience for many high-rise residents. 这58款APP存在的问题，包括私自收集个人信息、超范围收集个人信息、频繁申请权限、过度索取权限、账号注销难、私自共享给第三方、不给权限不让用等情形。	The problems found in these 58 apps include collecting personal information without permission, collecting personal information beyond the scope of the app, frequent and excessive requests for permissions, difficulty logging out, unauthorized information sharing with third parties, and inaccessibility without giving permissions.	There are problems with these 58 apps, including private collection of personal information, out-of-scope collection of personal information, frequent application for permission, excessive request for permission, account cancellation difficulties, private sharing with third parties, and denial of access. 刘易斯家人：约翰·刘易斯是“为最势弱而战”的战士	Lewis family: John Lewis was a “fighter for the least of us”	Lewis family: John Lewis is' fighting for the most vulnerable'	Lewis family: John Lewis was a fighter 'fighting for the weakest'
美国国会议员，民权斗士约翰·刘易斯（John Lewis）在周六（7月25日）为他举行的追悼会上被追念为“为最势弱而战”的战士。	At a memorial service held in his remembrance on Saturday, July 25th, US Congressperson and civil rights activist John Lewis was described as a “fighter for the least of us”.	Congressman John Lewis, a civil rights fighter, is remembered as a "fighter for the most vulnerable" at a memorial service for him on Saturday, July 25.	Members of Congress, civil rights crusader John Lewis, are remembered at a memorial service for him on Saturday (July 25) as a warrior who "fought for the weakest."
刘易斯的公开追悼会自周六開始在阿拉巴马州举行。	Public memorial services for Lewis have been open to the public since Saturday in Alabama.	Lewis's public memorial service has been in Alabama since Saturday.	A public memorial service for Lewis has been held in Alabama since Saturday.
首日就有两次追悼会。	On the first day, two memorial services were held.	There were two memorial services on the first day.	There were two memorial services on the first day.
周六在阿拉巴马州特洛伊大学的公開追悼会上，刘易斯的五个兄弟姐妹和一个姪孙谈到他是一个充满爱心、無所畏懼、以家庭为重的男人。	At the memorial service held on Saturday at Alabama’s Troy University, Lewis’s five brothers and sisters and one grandson described him as a deeply caring and courageous family man.	At a public memorial service at Troy University in Alabama on Saturday, Lewis' five siblings and a dwarf Sun spoke of him as a loving, fearless, family-focused man.	At a public memorial service Saturday at Troy University in Alabama, Lewis's five siblings and one great-grandson spoke of him as a loving, fearless, family-oriented man.
刘易斯最小的弟弟亨利·“格兰特”·刘易斯（ Henry “Grant” Lewis) 在会中表示：“他毕生致力于帮助他人。”	Lewis’s younger brother, Henry “Grant” Lewis, said at the service, “He dedicated his life to the service of others. “	"He devoted his life to helping others," Lewis' youngest brother, Henry "Grant" Lewis, said during the congregation.	"He dedicated his life to helping others," Lewis's youngest brother, Henry "Grant" Lewis, said during the meeting.
塞缪尔·刘易斯（Samuel Lewis）说，他的母亲曾警告约翰“不要惹麻烦，不要去惹事。”	Samuel Lewis said his mother warned Lewis, “Not to make trouble, don’t make trouble. “	Samuel Lewis, defending, said his mother had warned John "not to get in trouble and not to go into anecdotes."	Samuel Lewis, defending, said his mother had warned John "not to get into trouble, not to get into trouble."
他补充说，约翰没有听从母亲的警告，他说：“我们都知道约翰总会去惹麻烦，总是在惹事，但那却是因为坚持正确的事，那是好的麻烦（a good trouble)。”	He added that John ignored his mother’s warning, and continued, “We all knew John would always make trouble, always get into trouble, but it was always to stand up for the right thing, so it was a good trouble. “	He added that John had not heeded his mother's warnings, saying: "We all know that John is always going to get in trouble, always getting into anecdotes, but that's because he is sticking to the right thing, which is a good trouble."	He added that John had not heeded his mother's warnings, saying: "We all knew John was always going to get in trouble, always getting in trouble, but that was because of sticking to the right thing, which was a good trouble."
刘易斯的兄弟姐妹提醒在追悼会上的人们，约翰最为著名的论点便是要去制造“好的麻烦”，也就是只要为了公义，就不避讳挑起事端。	Lewis’s brothers and sisters told those in attendance at the service that John’s most famous point of argument was that people should create “good trouble”, which is to say that he would never shy away from causing trouble for the sake of justice.	Lewis's siblings reminded the people at the memorial service that John's most famous argument was to make "good trouble," which was not to shy away from provoking events as long as justice was done.	Lewis's brothers and sisters reminded those at the memorial service that John's most famous argument was to create "good trouble," that is, to avoid causing trouble for the sake of justice.
约翰曾经申请位于他出生地阿拉巴马州特洛伊市的特洛伊大学（Troy University ），然而当时全为白人学校的特洛伊大学拒绝了他的入学申请。	John once applied to Troy University in Troy, Alabama, where he was born, but he was rejected because it was an all-white school at the time.	John had applied to Troy University in Troy, Alabama, where he was born, but at the time the all-white school, Troy University, refused his application.	John applied to Troy University in his birthplace of Troy, Alabama, but Troy University, which was all white at the time, rejected his application.

1965年他和要求黑人投票权的示威群众就是在这座桥前遭到阿拉巴马州警察痛殴，警方还向示威者施放催泪瓦斯。	In 1965, Lewis and several other demonstrators demanding the right to vote for Blacks were beaten viciously by Alabama police on this bridge, and the police also fired tear gas into the crowd. 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网	Shenzhen Government Asks for Public Opinion On Health Regulations to Be Published -- Xinhua Net	Shenzhen to hold public consultation on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhua	Shenzhen public consultation on the introduction of health regulations
为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。	In order to encourage local residents to perform a physical evaluation to detect abnormalities as early as possible, the draft for comments proposed that heath agencies should establish a basic catalogue for physical evaluation programs based on factors including age and job.	In order to encourage the population to perform medical examinations and detect problems early, the above-mentioned draft for consultation suggests that the health department should draw up a basic directory of health examination projects according to different age and occupation	In order to encourage residents to perform regular physical examinations and identify problems early, the draft proposed that health departments should develop a basic catalogue of health examination projects according to different age, occupation and other factors.
属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。	Personal physical evaluation fees covered by the basic catalogue should be paid annually by social and medical insurance funds.	The costs of health check-ups, which fall within the scope of the basic catalogue of health check-ups, are paid by the General Fund for Social Health Insurance at the rate	Health examination expenses falling within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination projects shall be paid by the Social Medical Insurance Comprehensive Fund according to the standard of one person per year.
征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。	The draft for comments clarified that, the employers should arrange their human resources appropriately, reasonably coordinating their time schedule, and to prevent staff spending too much physical and mental efforts at work, a rotating schedule should be well-implemented, so that issues due to excessive physical and mental exertion can be avoided, and also strictly implement a paid leave system.	The consultation draft makes it clear that the employer should rationally allocate human resources, arrange employees for rest time, apply a rotation system for employees with high mental and physical labor load, avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly enforce the paid leave system for employees.	According to the draft, employers shall allocate human resources reasonably, arrange rest time for employees, implement a system of rotation rest for employees with heavy mental and physical workloads, avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health injury to employees' health, and strictly implement the system of paid leave for employees.
此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。	In addition, the employers should employ full-time and part-time health staff, and organize physical evaluations for staff regularly.	In addition, the employer should have a full-time health manager and organize regular health checkups for employees.	In addition, the employer shall be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize staff health examinations.
在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。	In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments prohibited the sales of alcohol beverage to minors, with the restriction of sales places, and proposed that those who disobey the rules will be asked to correct themselves by Market Supervisory Authorities and be fined RMB 30,000.	With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the consultation draft proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors be prohibited, that restrictions be placed on the location of the sale of alcoholic beverages, and that violations of the provisions be corrected by order of the market supervision and	In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, while restricting the location of the sale of alcoholic beverages. Where there is a violation of the provisions, the market supervision and administration department shall order rectification

可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网	Tibetan antelope migration season arrives in Hoh Xil	Cocosilian Tibetan antelope enters the relocation season - Xinhua	Kexili Tibetan antelope into the relocation season
五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。	Monitoring images from areas near the Wudaoliang Conservation Station show that on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes leading 3 calves crossed Kilometer Marker 3002 on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge on the Qinghai-Tibet Railway, indicating that Tibetan antelopes have already begun their return migration.	Surveillance footage near the Five Beam Protection Station showed that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led by three Tibetan antelope young children passed 3002 kilometers (1,000 mi) along the Qinghai-Tibetan Highway and the five Liangbei Bridge of the Qinghai-Tibet Railway.	Surveillance footage near Wudaoliang protection station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelope led three Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of Qinghai-Tibet Highway, Qinghai-Tibet Railway Five Liangbei Bridge, Tibetan antelope has begun to move back.
专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。	According to experts, in recent years, Tibetan antelope calves have made up a fifth to a quarter of the total herd migrating along the return route.	Experts have analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope young in the return sheep accounted for a quarter to a fifth of the total number of Tibetan antel	Experts analyze that in recent years, the number of Tibetan gazelle cubs in returning sheep accounted for a quarter to a fifth of the total number of Tibetan gazelle
中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”	Lian Xinming, associate researcher at the Chinese Academy of Sciences Northwest Plateau Biology Institute said, “During the return migration season, Tibetan antelopes are at higher risk of being hunted, so the number of calves is low, and sometimes there are none at all. “	"Tibetan antelopes are exposed to a higher risk of predation during the early stages of re-migration, so the number of pups in the flocks will be relatively small, and there may even be no pups," said Lien Xinming, an associate researcher at the	Lian Xinming, associate researcher at Northwest Plateau Biology Institute of Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "Early migration, Tibetan antelope face a higher risk of predation, so the number of young in the flock will be relatively small, and may even appear without young."
根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。	Statistics from the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration Yangtze River Origin Park Hoh Xil Management Office show that the number of Tibetan antelopes on the return migration route has been increasing each year, with 4,860 counted in 2019, an increase of 338 over 2018.	According to statistics from the Yangtze River National Park Administration of Sanjiangyuan National Park, the overall number of Tibetan antelope re-migration is rising every year, with 4,860 Tibetan antelope re-migration in 2019, an increase of 338 since 2018.	According to the statistics of Cocosili Management Office of Changjiangyuan Park of Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelope returning has increased year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelope returning was 4,860, an increase of
连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”	Lian Xinming said, “This year’s return migration of Tibetan antelopes is predicted to conclude in early September, and there is hope that the number will continue to rise. “	"It is expected that the return of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes returned is still expected to continue to increase,"	Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that this year's Tibetan gazelle migration will end in early September, the number of Tibetan gazelle migration is still expected to continue to increase
藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。	The Tibetan antelope is a national Level 1 protected species.	Tibetan antelopes are protected animals at the national level.	Tibetan antelope belongs to state-level protection animals.
每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。	Each year in late May, Tibetan antelopes from areas Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, the Altyn-Tagh mountain range in Xinjiang, and other areas migrate to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to breed and birth their calves.	At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Qinghai Sanjiangyuan, Tibet Tongtang, Xinjiang Alshan Mountain and other places travel to Lake Zhuonai in the hinterland of Cocosili	At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelope from Qinghai Sanjiangyuan, Tibet Yangtang, Xinjiang Alshan and other places have to go to Zhuo Nai Lake in the hinterland of Cocosili
我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”	According to Wu Xiaomin, a Chinese Tibetan antelope conservation expert and researcher at the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwestern Endangered Animals Research Institute), “The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is the process of female Tibetan antelopes leading their calves back to their original habitats after their birthing period. The herd that leaves the birthing ground is fairly large, but later, the Tibetan antelopes split into groups specific to different regions and return along separate routes to their original territories. “	Wu Xiaomin, an expert in the protection of Tibetan antelopes in China and a researcher at Shaanxi Province Animal Research Institute (Northwest Endangered Animals Research Institute), said: "Tibetan antelope removal is the process of female Tibetan antelopes returning to their habitat after the end of the birth of the pups.	Wu Xiaomin, an expert in Tibetan antelope conservation and researcher at Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said: "Tibetan antelope migration is the process of female Tibetan antelope returning to their habitat after giving birth.

那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？	So, how should we deal with heat in our daily lives?	So, how to solve the heat in daily life?	So, how do you solve the heat in everyday life?
专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。	According to experts, you should avoid going outside during the hottest part of the day during summer and avoid walking or labor in the sun before or after noon, because these periods of the day are when the sun is most intense and the possibility of heatstroke is highest.	Experts recommend that summer out to avoid the high temperature period, it is best not to walk or labor in the hot sun around noon, because this period of sunshine is the strongest, the likelihood of heat stroke is higher.	Experts recommend that going out in summer try to avoid the high temperature period, it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is strongest during this period, the likelihood of heat stroke is higher.
如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。	If you can’t avoid going outside during these periods, take protection measures such as carrying a parasol, wearing a sun hat, wearing sunglasses, and applying sunscreen when possible to prevent burns.	If you have to go out at this time, be sure to do a good job of protection, such as hitting the sunshade, wearing a sunshade, wearing sunglasses, and applying sunscreen to sun	If you have to go out at this time, be sure to do a good job of protection, such as playing a parasol, wearing a sun hat, wearing sunglasses, conditionally best apply sunscreen to sunburn.
衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。	For clothing, light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, and silk are best, while chemical fiber clothing should be avoided to prevent heatstroke due to insufficient heat dissipation when sweating profusely.	Wear light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp, silk texture, wear fewer chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid excessive sweating can not heat in time, causing heat stroke.	Clothes try to use light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp, silk texture, wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to sweat a lot can not timely heat dissipation, causing heat stroke.
高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。	In hot, humid weather, have sufficient water ready and drink it before you feel thirsty, because feeling thirsty means your body is already dehydrated, while also ensuring that each mouthful is between 150-200ml, and drink warm, boiled water instead of ice-cold water.	When the hot and sweltering weather, prepare enough water to drink in time, do not wait for thirst to drink water, because once the thirst indicates that the body has run out of water, drink water at 150ml to 200ml each time, drink warm water, do not drink ice water.	High temperature sweltering weather, to prepare plenty of water to drink, drink in time, do not wait for thirst before drinking water, because once you feel thirst indicates that the body has been dehydrated, each time drinking water control in 150 ml to 200 ml, drink warm water, do not drink ice water.
根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。	Depending on temperature, the average person drinks 1.5-2L of water per day, while workers in high-temperature environments drink 3-5L per day.	The average person drinks 1.5 to 2 litres of water per day, and the average person drinks 3 to 5 litres per day.	According to the temperature, average personnel drink 1.5 to 2 liters of water per day, high temperature workers, drink 3 to 5 liters of water per day.

When sweating more, some salt water can be properly replenished to compensate for the loss of salinity due to sweating.	Sweating more can be appropriate to add some salt water, make up for the loss of salt due to sweating.
另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。	In addition, the human body tends to be deficient in potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and depleted, so drinking potassium-infused tea is an excellent way to relieve yourself from the heat.	In addition, in summer, the body is prone to iodine deficiency, people feel tired and tired, iodized tea is an excellent antipyret	In addition, the body is prone to lack of potassium in summer, making people feel tired and tired. 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。	During the long days and short nights of summer, while temperatures are high, the body’s metabolism ramps up and consumes more calories, making it easy to feel tired.	Summer day and night are short, high temperature, high metabolism, consumption and fatigue.	Summer days are short, the temperature is high, the body has a strong metabolism, consumption is also large, easy to feel tired.

专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。	Experts say the best time to fall asleep is between 22:00-23:00, and the best time to wake up is between 05:30-06:30. 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。	Experts advise that people who exercise outdoors or work in high-temperature environments carry Shi Di Shui, Ren Dan, Huo Xiang Zheng Qi Shui, Huo Xiang Zheng Qi Wan, or other heatstroke prevention medicines to with them or place them around their work environment and use them often to prevent heatstroke.	Experts recommend that in outdoor activities or high temperature work, you can carry ten drops of water, mandan, musk or musk gas pills and other heat protection drugs, or placed in the nearby workplace, at any time to prevent heat stroke.	Experts recommend that in outdoor activities or people working at high temperatures, you can carry ten drops of water, peony, Yanxiang Zhengqi water or Yanxiang Zhengqi pills and other heat medicine, or placed in the nearest workplace, ready to use to prevent heat stroke.

澳大学研制新药有望用于治疗新冠引发的血管堵塞-新华网	Australian university develops new drug to treat COVID-19 blood vessel blockage - Xinhuanet	Australian University to develop new drug promising to treat blood vessel blockages caused by new crown - Xinhua - RT News	Australian University develops new drugs expected to be used to treat coronavirus-induced blood vessel blockage - Xinhua News Agency
新华社悉尼7月26日电（记者陈宇）澳大利亚莫纳什大学的研究人员正在研发一种有助于预防心脏病和中风的新药，并希望这种药物能用于治疗由新冠病毒引发的血管堵塞。	Xinhua News Agency, Sydney, reported July 26 (Correspondent: Chen Yu) Researchers at Australia’s Monash University are developing a new drug to prevent stroke and heart disease, and it is hoped that the same drug can be used to treat blood vessel blockage caused by COVID-19.	Sydney, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Researchers at Monash University in Australia are developing a new drug that can help prevent heart disease and stroke, and hope it can be used to treat blood vessel blockages caused by the new crown virus.	Sydney, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Researchers at Monash University in Australia are developing a new drug that could help prevent heart disease and stroke, and hope the drug can be used to treat blood vessel blockages caused by the coronavirus.
研究人员发现，在心脏病或中风发作前，血小板中的一种酶会加速血小板凝结。	The researchers discovered that prior to a heart attack or stroke, an enzyme present in platelets accelerates platelet clotting.	Researchers found that an enzyme in the platelets accelerates platelet clotting before a heart attack or stroke.	Researchers found that an enzyme in platelets accelerates platelet clotting before a heart attack or stroke.
由此他们研发一种药物，可以暂时性抑制血小板凝结，从而避免血管堵塞，对心脏病和中风起到预防作用。	To target this, they are developing medicine to temporary inhibit platelet clotting as a way to avoid clogging blood vessels and thereby prevent heart disease and stroke.	As a result, they developed a drug that temporarily inhibits platelet clotting, thereby preventing blood vessels from clogging and preventing heart disease and stroke.	As a result, they developed a drug that temporarily inhibits platelet clotting, thereby avoiding blood vessel blockage and preventing heart attacks and strokes.
研究人员表示，这种药物只会在出现心脏病或中风征兆时，抑制血小板的凝结效应。	They claim the drug’s inhibitive effect will only affect clotting when in the presence of signs of heart attack or stroke.	Researchers say the drug will only suppress the clotting effect of platelets when signs of heart disease or stroke appear.	Researchers say the drug will only suppress the clotting effect of platelets when there are signs of heart attack or stroke.
由于有研究显示类似的血管堵塞是导致新冠重症患者死亡的主要原因之一，研究人员希望这种药物在将来可以用于此类重症患者的治疗。	Studies indicate that such blood vessel blockage is a leading cause of death in severe COVID-19 cases, so the researchers hope this drug can be use to treat such severe cases in the future.	With studies showing that similar blood vessel blockages are one of the leading causes of death in new coronary artery disease patients, researchers hope the drug could be used in the future in the treatment of such serious patients.	With studies showing similar blood vessel blockages are one of the leading causes of death in patients with coronary artery disease, researchers hope the drug could be used in the future to treat patients with such severe conditions.
目前，该药物已在动物模型实验中取得良好效果，研究人员准备下一阶段进行人体临床试验。	At present, the drug shows promising results in animal studies, and the researchers are preparing for the next phase of experiments, human trials.	Currently, the drug has shown good results in animal model experiments, and researchers are preparing for the next phase of human clinical trials.	Currently, the drug has shown good results in animal model experiments, and researchers are preparing for the next phase of human clinical trials.
研究成果日前已发表在美国《科学·转化医学》杂志上。	The results of their research were recently published in the US magazine “Science Translational Medicine”.	Research has been published in the American Journal of Science and Translational Medicine.	The research results have been published in the journal Science Translational Medicine.

新疆深耕“向日葵田” 用好清洁能源-中新网	Xinjiang Ploughs in “Sunflower Fields” to Take Advantage of Clean Energy-ChinaNews.com	Xinjiang cultivates "sunflower fields" with good clean energy -	Xinjiang deep ploughing "sunflower fields" to use clean energy
2020-07-26 15:43:42 来源：中国新闻网 作者：陈海峰 责任编辑：陈海峰	2020-07-26 15:43:42 Source: Chinanews.com Author: Chen Haifeng Editor: Chen Haifeng	2020-07-26 15: 43: 42 Source: China News Network Author: Chen Haifeng Editor: Chen Haifeng	2020-07-26 15: 43: 42 Source: China News Author: Chen Haifeng Responsible Editor: Chen Haifeng
6000多块五边形定日镜，每块48平方米，一圈一圈排列整齐，如一片银色“向日葵田”，随太阳转动，将阳光反射到中心200多米高的吸热塔，实现发电。	Over 6,000 pentagon heliostats, 48 square meters each, lined up in circles like a field of silver sunflowers, turning with the sun and reflecting sunlight to the 200-meter heat absorption tower in the middle for power generation.	More than 6000 pentagonal sun mirrors, each 48 square meters, arranged in a circle, such as a silver "sunflower field," as the sun rotates, reflecting sunlight into the center of more than 200 meters high heat absorbing tower to achieve power generation.	More than 6000 pentagonal heliostats, 48 square meters each, arranged in one circle, such as a silver "sunflower field," with the rotation of the sun, reflect sunlight to the center of 200 meters high heat absorption tower to achieve power generation.
记者25日在新疆哈密市伊吾县淖毛湖镇的中电工程哈密熔盐塔式光热发电场，见到这一场景。	On the 25th, the reporter saw this view when visiting a CNEEC Hami molten salt tower solar power plant in Naomaohu Township of Yiwu County in Hami, Xinjiang. The reporter saw this scene on the 25th at the Hami molten salt tower solar thermal power plant of China Electric Power Project in Yili County, Hami City, Xinjiang Province.
“所谓熔盐塔式光热发电，就是将太阳光通过镜面集中反射到吸热塔形成热能，再通过传统发电技术将热能转化为电能。”	“Molten salt tower solar power generation means to form thermal energy through specular concentrated sunlight reflection to the heat absorption tower, then turn the thermal energy into electricity through conventional power generation technology. ”	"Melt salt tower type thermal power generation is the reflection of sunlight through the mirror to the thermal tower to form thermal energy, and then through conventional power generation technology to convert heat into electric power."	"The so-called molten salt tower solar thermal power generation is the reflection of sunlight through the mirror into the heat absorbing tower to form heat energy, and then through the traditional power generation technology to convert heat into electricity."
中电哈密太阳能热发电有限公司副总经理张勇介绍说，其设计原理类似于中国西北地区农村使用的太阳灶，都要把太阳光聚集起来。	Zhang Yong , Vice GM of CNEEC Hami Solar Power Co., Ltd., said the design concept is similar to solar stoves used in Northwestern rural areas, which use concentrated sunlight.	Zhang Yong, deputy general manager of China Electricity Hami Solar Thermal Power Co., Ltd., said that the design principle is similar to the solar stove used in rural northwest China, to gather the sunlight.	Zhang Yong, deputy general manager of CEC Hami Solar Thermal Power Co., Ltd., said that its design principle is similar to the use of solar cookers in rural areas in northwest China, to gather sunlight.
该发电场于2017年10月开工建设，去年底实现并网，占地6600亩，共计划安装14500块定日镜。	Covering an area of 6,600 mu, the power plant, construction of which started in October 2017, was integrated into the grid at the end of last year, with a total of 14,500 heliostats ultimately to be installed.	The plant began construction in October 2017 and was grid-connected at the end of last year, covering an area of 6,600 mu, with 14,500 fixed heliostats planned to be installed.	Construction began in October 2017 and was connected to the grid by the end of last year, covering an area of 6,600 acres, with plans to install 14,500 heliostats.
“相比传统太阳能发电技术，其最大优点是可将聚集的热能储存起来，在晚上也能发电。”	“Compared to conventional solar power technology, its greatest advantage is to store collected thermal energy so that power generation can continue in the evening. ”	"The greatest advantage over conventional solar power technologies is the ability to store concentrated heat and generate electricity at night."	"Compared to conventional solar power technology, the biggest advantage is that the accumulated heat can be stored and can generate electricity at night."
张勇说，该项目配置的13小时储热系统，可使发电机组保持连续稳定运行，不受光照变化影响；也可根据电网负荷峰谷需求，快速参与电网调峰。	Zhang Yong said the 13-hour thermal storage system deployed at this project is not affected by sunlight changes, enabling continuous stable operation of the generator unit, and can also swiftly support power grid peak stabilization according to grid load peak and valley demands.	Zhang Yong said that the project is equipped with a 13-hour heat storage system, which can keep the generator set running continuously and steadily without being affected by the change of light. It can also participate in fast grid adjustment according to the needs of the grid load peak	Zhang Yong said that the 13-hour heat storage system configured by the project can keep the generator set running continuously and stably, not affected by changes in light; also according to the peak and valley demand of grid load, rapid participation in grid peaking.
该项目完全建成后，可实现年发电量1.98亿度，每年可节约标准煤6万多吨，减排二氧化硫60多吨、氮氧化物60多吨、烟尘约20吨、二氧化碳15多万吨，为当地提供源源不断的清洁能源。	Annual power generation of the project will reach 198 million kwh when completed, saving over 60,000 tons of standard coal, cutting over 60 tons of sulfur dioxide emission, 60 tons of oxynitrides, 20 tons of dust and fumes, and over 150,000 tons of carbon dioxide while providing a steady flow of clean energy to the locals.	When completed, the project could generate 198 million degrees of electricity annually, save more than 60,000 tons of standard coal per year, reduce emissions of more than 60 tons of sulfur dioxide, more than 60 tons of nitrogen oxide, about 20 tons of soot and 150,000 tons of carbon dioxide, and provide a steady stream of clean energy locally. 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。	He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as sensitivity of detection reagents, infection time and detoxification time of the tested people, cooperation of the tested people when the samples are taken (low level of cooperation may lead to failure to take the specimen), as well as the detection environment and the proficiency of the inspectors.	He also said that from the experience of other regions of the country, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the testing reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the person being tested, the cooperation of the person being tested when the sample is taken (poor fit may result in the sample not being taken in	He also said that from the experience of other parts of the country, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as detection reagent sensitivity, infection time and detoxification time of the person being tested, specimen collection when the person being tested with the situation (poor fit may lead to the specimen not taken in place) and the detection environment,
由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。	For various reasons, false negative results can also appear in nucleic acid testing.	Nucleic acid testing can also have false-negative results for a variety of reasons.	Nucleic acid tests can also produce false negative results for various reasons.
所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。	False negative means that the person tested is indeed infected, but the results of the nucleic acid test are negative.	A false negative test is a test in which the person tested is actually infected, but the nucleic acid test results are negative.	False negative means that the person being tested is actually infected, but the nucleic acid test results are negative.
另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。	In addition, for those who have close contact with confirmed cases and suspected cases, it usually takes two nucleic acid tests to exclude them.	In addition, a person who has had close contact with a confirmed or suspected case usually requires two nucleic acid tests to be excluded.	In addition, people who have been in close contact with confirmed or suspected cases usually need two nucleic acid tests to be excluded.
对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。	For those who have been to the high-risk areas for the pandemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, there may be a possibility of false negatives in nucleic acid testing, so another nucleic acid test is needed.	For people who have visited high-risk areas during the outbreak, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, a nucleic acid test is likely to be falsely negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to rule it out.	For people who have traveled to high-risk areas of the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms are present, a single nucleic acid test negative may be false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to rule out.
他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。	He said that in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi would carry out two free nucleic acid tests in key areas such as Tianshan district and Saybag district, and carry out the work of “making up for deficiencies". 大连市同时决定，进一步扩大实施集中隔离医学观察人员范围，对核酸检测阳性人员（含病例及无症状感染者）的密切接触者、密切接触者的密切接触者全部实施14日集中隔离医学观察、至少2次核酸检测。	Dalian also decided to expand the scope of those subject to centralized isolation and medical observation, and will now require 14 days of centralized isolation and medical observation and at least 2 nucleic acid tests for the close contacts and secondary close contacts of anyone with positive nucleic acid tests (including cases and asymptomatic infections).	At the same time, the city of Dalian decided to further expand the scope of implementation of centralized isolation medical observers, and to implement 14-day centralized isolation medical observation and at least two nucleic acid tests for those in close contact with people who test positive for nucleic acid (including cases and asymptomatic infections) and those in close contact with	At the same time, Dalian decided to further expand the scope of centralized isolation medical observation personnel, for nucleic acid test-positive persons (including cases and asymptomatic infected persons) of close contact, close contact of close contact with all 14 days of centralized isolation medical observation, at least two nucleic acid testing.
大连机场、大连火车站25日均发布通知，全市人员原则上实施非必要不离连，确需离连的，须持7日内核酸检测阴性证明；大连汽车客运总站自25日12时起暂停全市全部线路售票，具体恢复时间另行通知。	On the 26th, Dalian Airport and Dalian Railway Station both issued notices stating that in principle, unnecessary trips outside of Dalian are not allowed, and where confirmed necessary, negative nucleic acid tests results from within the last 7 days are required; Dalian Bus Terminal will suspend ticket sales for all routes from Dalian at noon on the 25th, and will resume sales at a date to be determined later. 巴西研究表明羟氯喹对治疗轻中症新冠肺炎无效-中新网	Brazilian Study Indicates Hydroxychloroquine Ineffective in Treating Mild and Moderate COVID-19 Illnesses-ChinaNews.com	Brazil study shows iodine chloroquine is not effective in treating mild coronary pneumonia	Brazilian study shows that hydrochloroquine is ineffective in treating mild coronavirus
近日，一项巴西研究表明，羟氯喹对轻中症新冠肺炎患者无效。	Recently, a Brazilian study has shown that hydroxychloroquine is ineffective in treating COVID-19 patients with mild and moderate symptoms.	Recently, a Brazilian study showed that iodine chloroquine was not effective in patients with mild to moderate coronary	Recently, a Brazilian study showed that hydrochloroquine is ineffective in patients with mild coronavirus.
该研究报告在《新英格兰医学杂志》 (New England Journal of Medicine)上发表。	The study report was published in the New England Journal of Medicine.	The study was published in the New England Journal of Medicine.	The study was published online in the New England Journal of Medicine.
巴研究人员将全国55家医院的667名患者分成三组，进行了临床试验；主要对比单独使用羟氯喹或结合其它抗生素阿奇霉素的治疗效果，分析是否有助于改善新冠肺炎轻度和中度患者的病情。	Brazilian researchers put 667 patients from 55 hospitals across the country into 3 groups for clinical trials to compare the effectiveness of treatment using hydroxychloroquine only and through hydroxychloroquine combined with other antibiotics (azithromycin) to see if it was helpful in improving COVID-19 patients’ mild and moderate conditions.	The Bar researchers divided 667 patients from 55 hospitals across the country into three groups and conducted clinical trials; comparing the therapeutic effects of azithromycin alone or in combination with other antibiotics, and analyzing whether it helped improve the mild and moderate rate of coronary pneumonia.	Ba researchers divided 667 patients from 55 hospitals across the country into three groups to conduct a clinical trial that compared the effectiveness of treatment with hydroxychloroquine alone or in combination with other antibiotics azithromycin to determine whether it could help improve patients with mild and moderate coronavirus.
结果显示羟氯喹不仅没有治疗效果，反而可能对脏器产生损伤性副作用。	The results show that not only is hydroxychloroquine not helpful, it can have damaging side effects on the body's organs.	The results showed that iodine chloroquine not only has no therapeutic effect, but may cause damaging side effects on the organs	The results show that hydrochloroquine is not therapeutic but may have damaging side effects on organs.
这项研究是由巴西多家权威医院如爱因斯坦医院(Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein) 、心脏病医院(HCor) 、叙利亚黎巴嫩医院(Hospital Sírio-Libanês)等与巴西临床研究所(BCRI)和巴西重症监护研究网络(BRICNet)联合完成。	This research was a collaboration between multiple prestigious Brazilian hospitals, such as Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, HCor, Hospital Sírio-Libanês, and BCRI, and BRICNet.	The study was carried out by several authoritative hospitals in Brazil, such as Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, the Heart Hospital (HCor), the Hospital Srio-Libans in Syria, in conjunction with the Brazilian Institute of Clinical Research (BCRI) and the Brazilian Network for Critical Care Research (BRICNet).	The study was carried out by leading Brazilian hospitals such as Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, Hospital of Cardiology (HCor) and Hospital Srio-Libans in Syria, in collaboration with the Brazilian Clinical Institute (BCRI) and the Brazilian Network for Intensive Care Research (BRICNet).

今年4月，美国证监会（SEC）和美国公众公司会计监管委员会（PCAOB）发布《关于审计质量和监管获取审计和其他国际信息的重要作用声明 — — 关于在中国有大量业务的美国上市公司当前信息获取的挑战讨论》 。	In April of this year, the American Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) and Public Company Accounting Regulatory Board (PCAOB) stated, "Emerging Market Investments Entail Significant Disclosure, Financial Reporting and Other Risks; Remedies are Limited" listing certain risks that the disclosures by Chinese companies may be "incomplete or misleading."	In April, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Public Company Accounting Regulatory Commission (PCAOB) issued a "Statement of Important Roles for Auditing Quality and Regulatory Access to Audits and Other International Information - A Discussion of the Challenges of Current Access to Information for US Listed Companies with Substantial Operations in	In April, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the US Public Corporate Accounting Regulatory Board (PCAOB) issued a statement on audit quality and the important role of regulatory access to audit and other international information - A discussion of current information access challenges for US listed companies with significant operations in China.
这份声明表示，虽然近年来的国际合作和协调显著增加，但美国监管部门在信息获取方面的问题依旧存在，SEC和PCAOB仍然面临法律和实践的挑战；与该文件相对应的是，PCAOB网站详细列出遭遇审计障碍的上市公司名单及其审计机构，大量中概股公司在列。	According to the statement, despite the significant uptick in international cooperation in recent years, US regulators still have difficulty accessing information, and the SEC and PCAOB also face challenges on a legal and practical level; in addition to the statement, a detailed list of companies on the stock exchange which pose obstacles in their audits and their auditing agencies was posted on the PCAOB website, which included many Chinese concepts stock companies.	According to the statement, although international cooperation and coordination has increased significantly in recent years, problems with access to information remain for US regulators, and the SEC and PCAOB continue to face legal and practical challenges.	The statement said that despite significant increases in international cooperation and coordination in recent years, problems with access to information by US regulators persist and the SEC and PCAOB still face legal and practical challenges. In contrast to the document, the PCAOB website provides a detailed list of listed companies and their auditors, with a large number of M & A companies listed.

受持续降雨影响，7月22日以来，武隆区土地乡六井村中台组中堡滑坡后缘土体开裂出现大面积滑移变形情况，滑坡体落入乌江支流沿沧河中。	In Zhongtai Cluster, Liujing Village, Didi Township, Wulong District, the continued rainfall since July 22nd caused soil at the rear edge of the Zhongbao landslide to crack, leading a large area to deform and slide into the Wujiang tributary along the Cang River. 25日，当地出现强降雨天气过程，滑坡进一步扩大，造成村道公路通行中断，并完全阻断沿沧河，形成坝前水位13米、库容水量约42万立方米的堰塞湖。	On the 25th, heavy rainfall in the area caused the landslide to expand, blocking the village road and completely obstructing the Cang River, forming a barrier lake with a water level of 13 meters behind the dam and a volume of an estimated 420,000 cubic meters.	On the 25th, heavy rainfall and heavy weather caused a further expansion of the landslide, which disrupted road access along the village road and completely blocked access along the river, resulting in a 13 m water level at the front of the dam and a reservoir capacity of about 420,000 m3.	On the 25th, there was heavy rainfall weather process, landslide further expanded, causing village road traffic was interrupted, and completely blocked along the Huai River, forming a dam before the water level of 13 meters, reservoir capacity of about 420,000 cubic meters of Wusai Lake.

APEC成员贸易部长会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网	APEC Ministers Responsible for Trade Meeting states it will work to speed up regional economic recovery - Xinhuanet	APEC member trade ministers say will accelerate regional economic recovery - Xinhua - RT News	APEC Trade Ministers Say They Will Accelerate Regional Economic Recovery - Xinhua News Agency
新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。	Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25th (Correspondent: Lin Hao) At the APEC Ministers Responsible for Trade Meeting, held over video on the 25th, the body promised to strive to lower the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the regional economy and speed up the realization of a flexible, sustainable, and inclusive regional economic recovery.	Xinhua Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) trade ministers' videoconference was held on July 25, and the meeting committed to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate the promotion of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.	The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Trade Ministers' Conference was held on July 25, pledging to reduce the impact of COVID-19 on regional economies and accelerate efforts to achieve resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
会议由今年APEC领导人非正式会议主办方马来西亚主持。	The meeting was organized by Malaysia, the host of this year’s informal APEC Ministerial Meeting.	The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.	The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, which hosted this year's APEC Leaders' Meeting.
会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。	In the joint statement issued after the meeting, the APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent, and predictable trade and investment environment for economic recovery in this challenging time.	A joint statement issued after the meeting said APEC members' trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.	The joint statement issued after the meeting said APEC member trade ministers recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.
各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。	All sides pledged to ensure that emergency measures implemented in response to the pandemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent, and temporary, will not create unnecessary trade barriers that disrupt global supply chains, and will comply with WTO rules.	The parties committed themselves to ensuring that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary barriers to trade and disrupt global supply chains, while adhering to World Trade Organization	The parties committed themselves to ensuring that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic were targeted, appropriate, transparent and ad hoc, did not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and complied with World Trade Organization rules.
APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。	In the statement, the APEC ministers responsible for trade promised to improve cooperation to ensure the circulation of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection by improving supply chain flexibility, and minimize disruptions to the movement of medical materials, food products, and agricultural products to combat the pandemic.	The APEC members' trade ministers pledged in the statement to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of necessary goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain elasticity and minimize disruptions to the flow of medical goods, food and agricultural products in response to the outbreak.	In their statement, APEC trade ministers pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of necessary goods and services, facilitate connectivity by strengthening supply chain resilience and minimize disruption to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.
APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。	The APEC ministers responsible for trade were unanimous in their agreement that it is necessary to discuss how to minimize non-tariff barriers to the movement of necessary commodities, and restated their commitment to guaranteeing the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting pandemic control measures.	APEC trade ministers agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods and reiterated their commitment to facilitate the necessary cross-border movement of people without prejudice to measures to stop the spread of the epidemic.	APEC trade ministers agreed on the need to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods and reiterated their commitment to facilitating necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stem the spread of the epidemic.
会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。	The meeting also issued a statement regarding ensuring the movement of necessary commodities.	It also issued a declaration on facilitating the flow of essential commodities.	The Conference also issued a declaration on facilitating the flow of essential commodities.
宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。	The statement makes clear that all economies will ensure that all trade measures taken in response to the pandemic comply with WTO rules, and includes promises to reduce non-tariff trade barriers and promote trade to ensure the movement of necessary commodities during the pandemic.	The declaration stated that the economies would ensure that the trade measures they had taken in response to the epidemic were in line with WTO provisions, and pledged to take action to reduce non-tariff barriers to trade, trade facilitation and so forth in order	Economies will ensure that their trade measures in response to the epidemic are consistent with WTO regulations, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation, etc., to facilitate the flow of goods necessary for the epidemic, the declaration

法国加大太空军事投入-新华网	France Increases Its Military Spending in Space -- Xinhua Net	France to increase military investment in space - Xinhua - RT News	France to increase military investment in space
法国国防部长弗洛朗丝·帕利24日说，法国将追加数亿欧元太空防务预算，发展太空军事力量，以防范其他国家可能在外太空进行的“不友好举动 ” 。	Florence Parly, Defense Minister of France, said on July 24 that France would invest further billions of euros into space defense to develop space military strength as a means to guard against other countries’ possible “unfriendly behavior” in the outer space.	France will add hundreds of millions of euros to its space defense budget and develop a space military force to guard against "unfriendly moves" that other countries may make in outer space, French Defense Minister Florence Palli said on Tuesday.	France will add hundreds of millions of euros to its space defense budget and develop military forces in space to guard against "unfriendly moves" that other countries may make in outer space, Defense Minister Florentine Paley said on Tuesday.
帕利当天告诉《普罗旺斯报》，2019年至2025年期间，法国太空军事项目支出预算将从先前拟定的36亿欧元（约合42亿美元）增加至43亿欧元（50亿美元）。	Parly told La Provence that day that from 2019 to 2025, France’s budget for space military projects would increase to EUR 4.3 billion (USD 5 billion) from the previous EUR 3.6 billion (about USD 4.2 billion).	Pally told Le Provence newspaper that day that the budget for spending on French space military projects will increase to 4.3 billion ($5 billion) between 2019 and 2025, up from a previously planned 3.6 billion ($4.2 billion).	Parley told Le Provence newspaper the same day that the spending budget for France's space military programs would increase to 4.3 billion euros ($5 billion) between 2019 and 2025 from a previously proposed 3.6 billion euros ($4.2 billion).
根据法国议会2018年批准的《2019年至2025年法国军事规划法案》，法国今后预计将更新现有的观测卫星和通信卫星，发射3颗电磁侦听卫星，提高太空监视雷达的现代化水平。	According to the France Military Budget Plan 2019-2025, approved in 2018 by the French Assembly, France is projected to update its existing observation satellites and communication satellites and launch three electromagnetic interception satellites to enhance the modernization level of its space monitoring radar.	Under the French Military Planning Act 2019-2025, approved by the French Parliament in 2018, France is expected to upgrade its existing observation and communications satellites in the future, launch three electromagnetic listening satellites and modernize its space surveillance radar.	Under the French Military Planning Act 2019-2025 approved by the French Parliament in 2018, France is expected to upgrade its existing observation and communications satellites, launch three electromagnetic listening satellites and modernize its space surveillance radar in the future.
法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙去年7月宣布，法国空军内部将成立太空军事指挥部和“航空与太空部队”。	Emmanuel Macron, President of France, announced in July last year that the French air force would establish a space military command post and “aviation and space armies” within itself.	French President Emmanuel Macron announced last July that a military space command and "air and space forces" would be established within the French Air Force.	French President Emmanuel Macron announced last July that a military space command and an "air and space force" would be established within the French air force.
帕利说，她晚些时候到普罗旺斯地区萨隆视察一所军校时将正式宣布成立这支太空部队。	Parly said that she would officially announce the establishment of the space army while inspecting a military college in Saron, Provence.	Pally said she would formally announce the formation of the space force later when she visited a military academy in Salon, Provence.	Paley said she would make an official announcement about the space force later when she visited a military academy in Salon de Provence.

The China Sharing Accommodation Development Report 2020 (hereinafter referred to as "the report"), released recently by the National Information Center Sharing Economy Research Center of the National Information Center (reporter Yang Shaokui), shows that the first five months of 2020, China's shared accommodation market turnover fell by 72.1	According to the "China Shared Accommodation Development Report 2020" (hereinafter referred to as the "Report") recently released by the National Information Center Sharing Economy Research Center, China's shared accommodation market turnover fell by 72.1 year-on-year in the first five months of 2020.

《报告》显示，共享住宿市场交易额大幅下降，一方面是由于疫情防控下出行住宿需求大幅下降，订单量急剧减少，前5个月订单总量同比下降65%，接待人次同比下降63%；另一方面，需求的疲软也导致间夜价格出现了较为明显的下降，前5个月平均间夜价格同比下降16%。	The Report states that the sharp reduction in shared accommodation market transactions is caused, in part, by the sharp reduction in demand for travel accommodations due to epidemic control measures, which has drastically reduced order volume over the past 5 months; order volume is down by 65% year-on-year and guest stays are down by 65% year-on-year; meanwhile, it is also caused in part by a notable drop in per-night room prices due to decreased demand, which have declined an average of 16% year-on-year over the past 5 months.	According to the report, the shared accommodation market has seen a sharp decline in transactions, due to a sharp decline in demand for travel accommodation under the control of the epidemic. In this regard, Yu Fengxuan, deputy director of the National Information Center Sharing Economy Research Center, told the Workers' Daily that the development of shared accommodation needs stronger policy support. 记者在会上了解到，血管病是中国第一大死亡原因，主动脉作为人体各个器官的主干道，从心脏流向全身，担负着重要作用。	The reporter learned at the seminar that vascular disease is the number one cause of death in China, and the aorta plays an important role as the main artery for all organs and the heart.	At the meeting, journalists learned that vascular disease is the leading cause of death in China, and that the aorta plays an important role as the mainstay of the various organs of the human body,	Reporters learned at the meeting that vascular disease is the largest cause of death in China, the aorta as the main thoroughfare of various organs of the human body, from the heart to the whole body,
主动脉疾病的发生常常伴随着高风险，高死亡率及治疗的高难度，主动脉最粗的一段直径达4cm，一旦形成血管瘤，出现破裂情况，或是血管内膜破裂产生夹层，将引发大出血，十分危险。	Aortic disease is often associated with high risks, high mortality, and complicated treatment; the thickest section of the aorta is 4cm in diameter, and once an aneurysm appears, followed by a rupture or intima rupture and dissecting aneurysm, it can lead to hemorrhage, which is very dangerous.	Aortic disease is often accompanied by high risk, high mortality and high difficulty of treatment. The thickest part of the aorta is up to 4 cm in diameter. Once a haemangioma is formed, a rupture occurs, or the endovascular rupture produces a mezzanine	The occurrence of aortic disease is often accompanied by high risk, high mortality rate and high difficulty of treatment. The thickest section of the aorta is up to 4cm in diameter. Once a hemangioma is formed, rupture occurs, or rupture of the lining of the blood vessels
近些年来，随着人们生活方式的改变，生活节奏加快，中国成为高血压世界第一大国，主动脉疾病也随之增多，如今，伴随手术技术及工业材料的发展，对于主动脉疾病的治疗朝着微创、快速、高效的方向持续发展。	In recent years, as people's lifestyles change and the pace of life speeds up, China has become the leading country around the world for hypertension, and aortic disease cases has increased, so along with the development of surgical techniques and industrial materials, the treatment of aortic disease continues to be minimally invasive, rapid, and efficient. 2020-07-26 17:34:48 来源：中国新闻网 作者：陈海峰 责任编辑：陈海峰	2020-07-26 17:34:48 Source: chinanews.com Writer: Chen Hai Editor Chen Hai	2020-07-26 17: 34: 48 Source: China News Network Author: Chen Haifeng Editor: Chen Haifeng	2020-07-26 17: 34: 48From: China News Author: Chen HaifengResponsible Editor: Chen Haifeng
