中新网重庆7月26日电 (记者 韩璐)记者26日从中国铁路成都局集团有限公司获悉，全长约18.9千米的郑万高铁小三峡隧道当日全线贯通。	Chinanews.com, Chongqing, posted July 26th (correspondent Han Lu) On July 26th, this reporter learned from China Railway Chengdu Bureau Group LTD that the Zhengzhou–Wanzhou high-speed railway’s Small Three Gorges Tunnel, with a total length of roughly 18.9 km, had been completed the same day.	On July 26, a reporter from China Railway Chengdu Group Co., Ltd. learned that about 18.9 km long Zhengwan high-speed railway tunnel through the whole line on the same day.	Zhongxin network Chongqing July 26 (reporter Han Lei) reporter 26 learned from China Railway Chengdu Group Co., Ltd., a total length of about 18.9 km Zheng Wan high-speed rail Little Three Gorges Tunnel that day through the whole line.
据了解，小三峡隧道不仅是三峡库区范围内最长的高铁隧道，也是目前国内正在建设的项目中，设计时速达到350公里/小时的最长单洞双线高铁隧道。	Based on available information, the Small Three Gorges Tunnel is both the longest high-speed rail tunnel in the Three Gorges Reservoir area, and also, among the rail projects under construction in China, is the longest dual-track single-hole high-speed rail tunnel with a 350 km/h design speed.	It is understood that the Little Three Gorges Tunnel is not only the longest high-speed rail tunnel within the Three Gorges Library area, but also the longest single-hole double-line high-speed rail tunnel designed to reach 350 km / h in the project currently under construction in China.	It is understood that the Little Three Gorges Tunnel is not only the longest high-speed rail tunnel within the scope of the Three Gorges library area, but also the longest single-hole two-line high-speed rail tunnel designed to reach 350 km / h in the project under construction in
郑万高铁位于河南、湖北、重庆三省市境内，在郑州北接京广、徐兰高铁，在万州南连渝万高铁抵达重庆，是我国“八纵八横”高速铁路网中沿江通道和呼南通道的重要组成部分。	The Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway links cities within the three provinces of Henan, Hubei, and Chongqing, connects to the Beijing-Guangzhou and Xuzhou-Lanzhou high-speed rail routes via the Zhengzhou North Station and reaches Chongqing through the Chongqing-Wanzhou intercity railway link via the Wanzhou South Station; it is an important component of China’s "Eight Vertical and Eight Horizontal" network that connects to the Yangtze River corridor and the Hohhot–Nanning corridor.	Zhengwan high-speed rail is located in Henan, Hubei and Chongqing provinces and cities, in Zhengzhou north to Jingguang and Xulan high-speed rail, in Wanzhou Nanlianyuanwan high-speed rail to Chongqing, is an important part of China's "eight longitudinal eight horizontal" high-speed railway network along the river channel and	Located in three provinces and cities in Henan, Hubei and Chongqing, Zhengzhou north of Beijing-Guangzhou and Xulan high-speed railway, in Wanzhou south of Lianyuwan high-speed rail to reach Chongqing, it is an important part of China's "eight vertical and eight horizontal" high-speed railway network along the river channel and
郑万高铁小三峡隧道26日全线贯通。	The Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway Small Three Gorges Tunnel was fully connected on the 26th.	The tunnel of the Mnches-de-la-Trke line runs through the	Zhengzhou-Wanzhou High-speed Rail Little Three Gorges Tunnel opened on 26th.
图为贯通现场。	Image of fully opened tunnel.	The picture shows the scene.	The picture runs through the scene.
郑万高铁起于河南省郑州市，向西南经平顶山市、南阳市、湖北省襄阳市至重庆市万州区，新建线路全长约818公里，设计速度350公里/小时，重庆境内约184公里。	The Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway begins in Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, then runs southwest through Pingdingshan City, Nanyang City, and Xiangyang City in Hubei Province, and terminates in Wanzhou District, Chongqing City; the length of the new line is about 818 km, of which 184 km run through the borders of Chongqing, and has a design speed of 350 km/h.	From Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, to the southwest via Pingdingshan, Nanyang City, Hubei Province, Liyang City to Chongqing Wanzhou District, the new line is about 818 km long, with a design speed of 350 km / h, and about 184 km / h in Chongqing.	Zhengzhou-Wanzhou High-speed Railway starts in Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, southwest through Pingdingshan City, Nanyang City, Hubei Province, Xiangyang City to Chongqing City Wanzhou District, the new line length of about 818 km, design speed 350 km / h, Chongqing territory about 184 km
其中，郑州至襄阳段已于2019年12月1日先期开通运营，重庆段正加紧推进建设。	The Zhengzhou-Xiangyang stage of the line opened early on December 1st, 2019, and construction on the Chongqing stage is being accelerated.	On 1 December 2019, the Zhengzhou to Qianyang section was opened for operation, and the Chongqing section is undergoing intensive construction.	Among them, the Zhengzhou to Xiangyang section was opened early on December 1, 2019, and the Chongqing section is stepping up its construction.
26日全线贯通的小三峡隧道为郑万高铁全线控制性工程，项目位于重庆市奉节县与巫山县交界，全长约18.9千米，最大埋深890米。	The Small Three Gorges Tunnel, which was fully connected on the 26th, is a total-line control project for the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway; the project is located at the border of Fengjie County and Wushan County, Chongqing City, has a total length of roughly 18.9 km, and has a maximum buried depth of 890 meters.	On 26 May, the entire line of the Little Three Gorges Tunnel was controlled by the Zhengwan High-speed Railway, which is located at the junction of Fengjie County and Wushan County in Chongqing, China. The total length is about 18.9 km and the maximum	The project is located at the junction of Fengjie County and Wushan County, Chongqing City, with a total length of about 18.9 kilometers and a maximum depth of 890 meters.
该隧道于2017年2月开始施工，2020年7月26日全线贯通。	Work began on the tunnel in February of 2017, and the tunnel was fully connected on July 26th, 2020.	Construction of the tunnel began in February 2017 and the tunnel was fully operational on 26 July 2020.	Construction of the tunnel began in February 2017 and the entire line opened on 26 July 2020.
据勘察设计方中国中铁二院工程集团有限责任公司郑万高铁隧道设计负责人王国军介绍，小三峡隧道所处位置地形地质条件非常复杂，面临岩溶、突泥涌水、软岩大变形等风险，属Ⅰ级高风险隧道，隧道设计和施工难度极大。	Wang Guojun, director of tunnel design for the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway at China Railway Eryuan Engineering Group Co., Ltd., stated that the Small Three Gorges Tunnel cuts through highly complicated terrain and geological conditions, and faces risks such as karsts, sudden mudslides, and massive soft rock deformation, making it a Class I high-risk tunnel, for which design and construction are exceedingly difficult.	According to Wang Jun, head of the design of China Railway Second Institute Engineering Group Co., Ltd., Zhengwan high-speed rail tunnel, the position of the Little Three Gorges Tunnel is very complex, facing the risk of karst, mud rush water, soft rock deformation, etc., it is a high risk tunnel of, and the tunnel	According to the survey and design party China Railway Eryuan Engineering Group Co., Ltd. Zheng Wan high-speed rail tunnel design director Wang Jun, the small three gorges tunnel location terrain geological conditions are very complex, facing risks such as karst, mud surges, soft rock deformation, etc.
“项目建设过程中，我们采用地质调查法、物探法和超前钻探法等方式超前地质预报，对30余处各类型溶洞采取了特殊设计方案。如设计修建了长24米的桥梁，跨越隧道内纵向长度超10米、深度超55米的大型溶洞，避免隧道沉降。”王国军说。	“During construction, we used approaches such as geological surveys, geophysical techniques, and advanced drilling methods to make geological forecasts far in advance and create special design plans for over 30 types of caves. For example, we built a bridge within the tunnel that was 24 meters in length across a karst cave gap that was 10 meters wide and 55 meters deep to avoid tunnel settlement,” he said.	"During the construction of the project, we have adopted advanced geological forecasting methods such as geological survey, physical exploration and advanced drilling methods. We have adopted special design solutions for more than 30 types of caves.	"During the construction of the project, we adopted advanced geological forecasting by geological survey method, geophysical exploration method and advanced drilling method, and adopted special design solutions for more than 30 types of caves. For example, we designed a 24-meter-long bridge to cross a large cave with a longitudinal length of over 10 meters and a depth of over 55 meters inside the tunnel to avoid tunnel settlement."
据施工方中铁隧道局介绍，该隧道施工时，采取疏导堵结合的方式，通过修建横洞平导、注浆堵水、强化隧道结构支护以及修建污水处理站，既保证了工程有序推进，也避免了施工排水对小三峡风景区水体的破坏，同时成功克服了长达7公里的软岩大变形等不良地质、每日最大涌水量达15.7万立方米的多突泥涌水等施工难题。	The building company, the China Railway Tunnel Group, constructed the tunnel using a combination of dredging and blocking, building horizontal tunnels, water blocking, enhanced structural tunnel support, and building outflow treatment plants, which together ensured the project could proceed on schedule while avoiding damage from polluted wastewater to the Three Gorges Scenic Area, and at the same time, overcame construction problems such as 7 kilometers of karst soft rock deformation and other bad geology, as well as a maximum daily water inflow of 157,000 cubic meters.	According to the construction party China Railway Tunnel Bureau, during the construction of the tunnel, it is used as a guide block combination method. Through the construction of cross hole flat guide, grouting blockage, reinforced tunnel structural support and the construction of sewage treatment station, the orderly promotion of the project is ensured and the damage to the water body of the small Three Gorges Scenic Area is avoided.	According to the construction party China Railway Tunnel Bureau, the tunnel construction, using a combination of channel plugging way, through the construction of horizontal hole leveling guide, grouting plugging, strengthening tunnel structure support and construction of sewage treatment station, not only to ensure the orderly progress of the project, but also to avoid the construction of drainage on the small three gorges scenic water damage, at the same time successfully overcome up to 7 kilometers of soft rock deformation and other bad geology, the maximum daily surge of 157,000 cubic meters of
郑万高铁全线建成通车后，将成为我国西南地区通往中原、华北、东北地区新的便捷快速客运主通道，对改善西南地区东北向铁路通道能力和质量、完善区域路网布局、加快沿线旅游资源开发和城镇化进程，促进区域协调发展，推动西部大开发战略实施具有重要意义。	When the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway is completed and fully operational, it will have critical importance as a rapid and convenient passenger channel that connects the regions of Southwest China, the Central Plains, North China, and Northeast China which improves both the quality and capacity of the Southwest China railway network’s northeast corridor, improves the regional transit network, speeds up the development of tourism resources and urbanization along the route, promotes inter-regional coordinated development, and facilitates the implementation of the Western Region development strategy.	After the completion of the whole line of Zhengwan high-speed railway, it will become the new convenient and fast passenger main channel to Central Plains, Northern China and Northeast China. It is important to improve the capacity and quality of northeast rail access in Southwest China, improve the layout of the regional road network, speed up the development and urbanization of tourism resources along the route, promote the coordinated development of the region and	After the completion and opening of the whole line of Zhengwan High-speed Railway, it will become a new convenient and fast passenger main route to the Central Plains, North China and Northeast China in southwest China. 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪	Collecting immigration status data through US Census for House of Representatives seat allocation is unconstitutional, say experts	Experts say gathering immigration information through U.S. Census for House seat allocation unconstitutional	Experts say collecting immigration data through US Census for House seat allocation unconstitutional
一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。	Civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have filed a lawsuit against the US federal government, claiming the Trump administration’s attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census are both unconstitutional and would unworkable.	Civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, saying that attempts by the Trump presidential palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.	Several civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, arguing that attempts by the Trump administration to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census are unworkable and unconstitutional.
美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。	The US Census decides the allocation of seats in the US House of Representatives.	The U.S. Census will determine the allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.	The U.S. Census will determine the allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”	American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) executive director Sarah Brannon told VOA, “This is unworkable. “	"It doesn't work that way," Sarah Brannon, executive attorney for the American Civil Rights Freedom Coalition, told VOA.	Sarah Brannon, executive counsel for the American Civil Rights Liberties Union, told Voice of America, "It just doesn't work."
她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”	She continued, saying Trump’s demand that the US Census determine the immigration status of census respondents was difficult and “not very reliable”. “	She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship of people who take the census in the census is difficult to do and "not very reliable."	She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship of people who take the census is difficult to do and "not very reliable."

阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”	Arlington County Board Chair Libby Garvey said, “The US Constitution requires that we make an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We need an accurate count of every resident in Arlington County, and we must never illegal attempts like these to frighten away and shrink our immigrant community succeed. “	Garvey, the Arlington County executive board chairman, said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County and must not let this illegal attempt to scare away people and compress our immigrant communities succeed."	"The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years... We must accurately count every single person living in Arlington County and cannot allow this illegal attempt to scare people away and compress the size of our immigrant community to succeed," said Garvey, chairman of Arlington County's governing board.
另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。	Other individuals and organizations expressed praise for Trump’s executive order.	Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive orders.	Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。	Alabama Attorney General Steve Marshall called the executive order a “victory” for the state. 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”	He said, “The allocation of House of Representatives and electoral college seats must be based on the number of residents in each state, particularly the number of legal residents. “	"Allocating congressional House seats and Electoral College seats in the states must be based on the number of residents who live in the states and are legally resident," he said.	"The allocation of congressional House seats and Electoral College seats to each state must be based on the number of residents living in the state and who are legally resident," he said.
美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。	Last year, the US Supreme Court stopped the Trump administration’s attempts to include citizenship questions on the 2020 census form. 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。	Earlier this week President Trump signed an executive order directing Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census, so that the administration can exclude this population from state census results, which in turn are used to determine whether each state will increase, decrease, or maintain its number of seats in the House of Representatives. Rabat, July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to Moroccan media, the coast guard attached to the Moroccan navy intercepted a batch of cannabis products in the Mediterranean Sea that day, with a total weight of more than 1 ton.
摩洛哥官方通讯社援引军方消息报道说，摩洛哥海岸警卫队当天在地中海巡逻时截获一艘涉嫌走私大麻制品的快艇，嫌疑人在被捕前将船上大麻制品抛入海中，海岸警卫队随后将其捞起。	The official Moroccan news agency quoted military sources as reporting that the Moroccan Coast Guard intercepted a speedboat suspected of smuggling cannabis products during a patrol in the Mediterranean on July 26; the suspect threw the cannabis products on board into the sea before being arrested, and the Coast Guard subsequently fished it up. 为进一步做好防汛防台工作，东方航空技术有限公司成立应急抢险预备队，开展防汛防灾知识培训，并根据每日天气和台风等预警情况，制定航班计划，对沿海地区停场飞机做好运行恢复前的准备工作和相关应急预案。	To further implement flood and typhoon control measures, Eastern Airlines Technology is setting up a emergency rescue reserve team, conducting training on flood and disaster prevention, making flight schedules based on daily weather conditions and typhoon alerts, as well as developing preparations and emergency plans for grounded planes in coastal areas before resuming operation. “盛夏青海湖畔，满眼金花、万蜂飞舞，这里海拔较高、昼夜温差大、空气污染少，强烈的光照孕育了最顽强、慷慨的蜂群，造就了青海蜂王浆高活性、高蛋白、富含营养价值、低糖低脂的特点。”	“At Qinghai Lake in midsummer, there are golden flowers as far as the eye can see, and innumerable bees flying everywhere; the high elevation is high, large temperature difference between night and day, low air pollution, and strong illumination breeds the most resilient and fertile bee colonies which create the highly active, protein-rich, and nutritious Qinghai royal jelly, which is also low in sugar and fat, “	"Qinghai lake in the summer, full of golden flowers, thousands of bees fly, here the elevation is higher, day and night temperature difference, less air pollution, strong light breeds the most tenacious and generous hive, creating the Qinghai royal jelly high activity, high protein, nutritional value, low sugar and low fat."	In summer, Qinghai Royal Jelly has high activity, high protein, rich nutritional value, low sugar and low fat characteristics. It has high altitude, large temperature difference between day and night, less air pollution.

今春，各地因疫情防控需要设置道路通行关卡，蜂农们“追花逐蜜”的路途受阻，许多蜜蜂因错过花期、缺少食物而死亡，蜂农收入受到严重影响。	This spring, due to roadblocks set up to control the epidemic, beekeepers have been blocked from their usual “following the flowers to produce honey” routes, many bees have died of starvation because they missed the flowering periods, and beekeeper incomes have suffered a sharp decline.	In the spring of this year, due to the need to prevent and control the epidemic, road access levels were set up, bee farmers "pursuit of honey" road blocked, many bees missed the flower season, lack of food, bee farmers' income was seriously affected.	This spring, due to the epidemic prevention and control needs to set up road access checkpoints, bee farmers "chase flowers for nectar" road obstructed, many bees missed flowering period, lack of food died, bee farmers income was seriously affected.

“小蜜蜂是‘环境侦察兵’，污染严重的地区蜜蜂也无法生存。”中国蜂产品协会常务副会长赵小川介绍，蜜蜂授粉是生态链的重要环节，对于保护植物的多样性和改善生态环境有着不可替代的作用。	“Bees are ‘nature’s advance scouts’, because they can’t survive in heavily polluted areas. “ Zhao Xiaochuan, deputy secretary of the China Bee Products Association, explained that pollination by bees is a very important link in the ecological chain, and that it plays an irreplaceable role in protecting plant diversity and improving the environment.	"Xiaobee is an 'environmental scout," and bees in highly polluted areas cannot survive. "Zhao Xiaochuan, executive vice president of the China Bee Products Association, said bee pollination is an important link in the ecological chain and has an irreplaceable role in protecting plant diversity and improving the ecological	"Bee pollination is an important part of the ecological chain and plays an irreplaceable role in protecting plant diversity and improving the ecological environment."
同时，蜜蜂授粉能使农作物增产提质，特别在广种而管理条件差的地区，授粉的意义更大。	Bee pollination also increases the yield and quality of crops, and is even more important in regions with a wide diversity of crops and poor farm management.	At the same time, bee pollination can increase crop productivity and improve quality, especially in areas with extensive and poorly managed conditions.	At the same time, pollination by bees increases crop yield and quality, especially in areas with widespread and poorly managed populations.
研究数据显示，授粉能够使油菜增产15% - 30%左右。	Research data proves that pollination improves rapeseed yields by 15-30%.	Research data show that pollination can increase rape production by 15 -30.	Research data show that pollination can increase canola production by about 15-30.

国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网	Inter Milan Has Its 3000th Serie A Game - China News	Inter Milan Unlock the 3000th Serie A Game -	Inter unlock 3000th Serie A match - China News

据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。	According to the Italian media, the away game against Genoa is Inter Milan's 3,000th Serie A match, making it the first team to reach this milestone.	According to Italian media, the away game against Genoa was the 3,000th Serie A match in Milan's history, and the Blue and Black Army was the first team to unlock the milestone.	According to Italian media, the away game against Genoa was Inter Milan's 3,000th Serie A game and the Nerazzurri were the first team to unlock this milestone.
自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。	Inter Milan is the only team to have never missed a Serie A Game since the league was reorganized in 1929, and also the only team to have never been relegated.	Since the league was restructured in 1929, Internazionale are the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated	Inter are the only team that has never been absent from Serie A since the League was restructured in 1929, and the only team that has never been relegated.

2020-07-26 15:18:27 来源：央视网 作者：朱延静 责任编辑：朱延静	2020-07-26 15:18:27 Source: cctv.com Author: Zhu Yanjing Editor: Zhu Yanjing	2020-07-26 15: 18: 27 Source: CCTV Author: Zhu Yanjing Editor: Zhu Yanjing	2020-07-26 15: 18: 27From: CCTV Author: Zhu YanjingResponsible Editor: Zhu Yanjing
启动App违法违规收集使用个人信息治理工作。	Corrective work on illegal and violating collection and use of personal information by apps.	Started App illegal illegal collection and use of personal information management work.	Start app illegal and illegal collection and use of personal information governance work.
全国信息安全标准化技术委员会、中国消费者协会、中国互联网协会、中国网络空间安全协会，以及相关专业评估机构参加了会议。	The conference was attended by the National Information Security Standardization Technical Committee, China Consumers Association, Internet Society of China, Cybersecurity Association of China, and other related professional evaluation institutions.	The National Technical Committee for Standardization of Information Security, the China Consumer Association, the China Internet Association, the China Cyberspace Security Association and relevant professional evaluation bodies participated in the meeting.	The National Technical Committee for Information Security Standardization, China Consumer Association, China Internet Association, China Cyberspace Security Association and relevant professional evaluation agencies participated in the meeting.
App违法违规收集使用个人信息治理工作组利用微信公众号(“App个人信息举报”)、网站(pip.tc260.org.cn)两种专门渠道，受理广大网民关于违法违规收集使用个人信息的线索举报和问题反映。	The corrective work on illegal and violating collection and use of personal information by apps will be conducted through two dedicated channels, the WeChat Public Account (“App Personal Information Reporting”) and website (pip.tc260.org.cn), where netizens can report evidence and offer feedback on the illegal and violating collection and use of personal information.	The App Illegal Collection and Use of Personal Information Governance Working Group uses two special channels: WeChat public number ("App personal information report") and website (pip.tc260.org.cn) to receive leads and questions from users about illegal collection and use of personal information.	The App Illegal and Illegal Collection and Use of Personal Information Governance Working Group uses two specialized channels: WeChat public account ("App Personal Information Report") and website (pip.tc260.org.cn) to receive leads reports and questions from netizens about illegal collection and use of personal information.
同时，广大网民也可向违法和不良信息举报中心(www.12377.cn )、网络不良与垃圾信息举报受理中心(www.12321.cn)等平台举报和反映不法行为。	At the same time, netizens can also report and offer feedback on illegal behaviors to platforms such as the Illegal and Improper Information Reporting Center (www.12377.cn) and the Center for Reporting and Handling Spam (www.12321.cn).	At the same time, the majority of Internet users can also report and reflect wrongdoing to illegal and bad information reporting center (www.12377.cn), network bad and spam information reporting receiving center (www.12321.cn) and other platforms.	At the same time, the majority of netizens can also report and reflect illegal acts to illegal and bad information reporting center (www.12377.cn), bad network and spam information reporting and receiving center (www.12321.cn) and other platforms.
经济观察网 记者 饶贤君 7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。	Eeo.com.cn reporter Rao Xianjun, July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued a "Suggestive Announcement on the State-owned Shareholders' Intention to Transfer Part of the Company's Shares and Resume Trading through Public Solicitation of the Transferee."	On July 26, 2016, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued a "Prompt Notice on State-owned Shareholders to Agree to Transfer Parts of the Company's Shares and Repurchases by Publicly Collecting Transferees."	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued an indicative announcement on the proposed transfer of some shares of the company and resumption of trading by means of public solicitation of transferees.
本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。	The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the suggestive announcement date (July 27, 2020); the audited net asset value per share of the company in the latest accounting year.	The price of the shares to be transferred is not lower than the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the first 30 trading days prior to the indicative announcement date (27 July 2020) and the company's audited net asset value per share for the most recent fiscal year.	The price of the proposed transferred shares is not lower than the higher of the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days prior to the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020) and the Company's audited net asset value per share for the most recent fiscal year.

It is important to note that Greenland is not expected to have a controlling shareholder and actual controller after the transfer of this share, but the control structure may change significantly.	It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, Greenland is expected to have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.
绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。	Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it was operated under the pure state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the joint-stock system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, strategic investors were introduced to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, the company has been entirely listed and has become a public company. 2020-07-26 05:01:11 来源：法制日报 作者：王思硕 责任编辑：王思硕	2020-07-26 05:01:11 Source: Legal Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Editor: Wang Sishuo	2020-07-26 05: 01: 11 Source: Legal Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Editor: Wang Sishuo	2020-07-26 05: 01: 11From: Legal Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Responsible Editor: Wang Sishuo
操场被砸，孩童获赔后再诉校方	Hit on Sports Ground, Child Sues University After Compensation is Paid	Playground smashed, children awarded compensation before suing school	Playground smashed, children sue school after winning compensation
□ 本报通讯员 赵一凡	Reported by, Zhao Yifan	Correspondent Zhao Yifan	Correspondent Zhao Yifan
3岁的小文在某大学操场玩耍时，意外被垒球队的陈某在投球时砸中了头部。	When playing on sports ground of an university, 3-year old Xiaowen was accidentally hit in the head by a softball thrown by Chen from the softball team.	The 3-year-old was playing in a college playground when he was accidentally hit in the head by a softball team's Chen while pitching.	Three-year-old Xiaowen was accidentally hit in the head by Chen of the softball team while playing in a college playground.
陈某赔偿后，小文的父亲文先生作为小文的法定代理人将学校诉至法院，要求事发操场所在的学校赔礼道歉，并支付医疗费、精神损害抚慰金等共计两万元。	After being compensated by Chen for the accident, Xiaowen’s father, acting as Xiaowen’s legal guardian, sued the university in court, demanding an apology for what happened on the sports ground and a total of 20,000 yuan for medical bills and emotional distress.	As a result of the settlement of the case, the court ordered the school to pay compensation to the school where the incident took place, and to pay medical expenses and compensation for moral damages totalling 20,000 yuan.	After Chen compensation, Mr. Wen Xiaowen's father, Mr. Wen Xiaowen, as Xiaowen's legal representative, brought the school to the court, demanding that the school where the playground occurred apologize, and pay medical expenses, moral damage relief and a total of 20,000 yuan.
近日，北京市海淀区人民法院对此案审理后认为，事发时学校在操场设置了防护网，已尽到适当的安全保障义务，且陈某已进行了赔偿，据此判决驳回了原告的诉讼请求。	Recently, the People’s Court of Haidian District in Beijing heard the case and believed the university fulfilled its obligation to provide appropriate safety assurance by setting up a protective barrier at the sports ground; in addition, Chen had already compensated for the accident, and therefore, the claims of the plaintiff were dismissed.	Recently, after hearing the case, the Beijing Haidian District People's Court held that the school had installed a protective net in the playground at the time of the incident, that it had done its proper safety and security obligations, and that Chen had made compensation, and accordingly rejected the plaintiff's claim.	Recently, Beijing Haidian District People's Court after hearing the case believes that the school set up a protective net in the playground when the incident occurred, has done the appropriate security obligations, and Chen has made compensation, according to which the judgment rejected the plaintiff's claim.
文先生诉称，2019年暑假期间，他带小文在学校操场玩耍，当时正值垒球队在操场训练。	As Mr. Wen claims, he took Xiaowen to the sports ground of the university during summer vacation in 2019, and the softball team was training on the sports ground at the same time.	Mr. Wen claims that during the summer of 2019, he took Xiao Wen to play in the school playground while the softball team was training in the playground.	Mr. Wen claims that during the summer vacation of 2019, he took Xiaowen to play in the school playground while the softball team was training in the playground.

In order to avoid the risks associated with this, Mr. Wen and many other children and parents operate in a safe area designated by the softball team.	In order to avoid this risk, Mr. Xiao Wen, Mr. Wen Wen Wen and many other children and parents operate in the softball team designated safe area.
但之后垒球队队员陈某在投球时脱手，导致垒球越过护网飞至上述安全区域内并击中小文后脑。	However, later when Chen, a member of the softball team, was throwing the ball, it slipped out of his hand, went over the protective barrier into the safety area, and hit Xiaowen in the back of her head.	However, the player was then thrown off the pitch, causing the ball to fly over the guard net and hit the back of the head.	However, Chen, a member of the softball team, got off his hands while pitching, causing the softball to fly across the net into the above safe area and hit Xiaowen in the back of the
文先生立即带小文去医院治疗，被诊断为头外伤。	Mr. Wen took Xiaowen to the hospital immediately, and she was diagnosed as having head trauma.	Mr Wen immediately took Xiao Wen to hospital for treatment and was diagnosed with a head trauma.	Mr Wen immediately took Xiaowen to hospital for treatment and was diagnosed with head trauma.
文先生认为，学校球场的设施不符合相关安全规定，未对球队及相关设施进行有效管理。	Mr. Wen believes the sports field facilities are not in line with safety regulations and the university failed to effectively manage the softball team and relevant facilities.	Mr Wen argued that the facilities on the school pitch did not comply with relevant safety regulations and did not effectively manage the team and associated facilities.	According to Mr. Wen, the facilities of the school stadium did not meet the relevant safety regulations and did not effectively manage the team and related facilities.
学校的过失导致上述事件发生，导致小文身心遭受巨大的痛苦，同时也给其家人带来了较大的痛苦，对此学校应当承担法律责任。	It was negligence of the university that led to the incident, which caused physical and mental distress for Xiaowen and her family, hence the university should take legal responsibility.	The failure of the school resulted in the incident, which caused considerable physical and psychological suffering to the boy and his family, for which the school should be held legally liable.	The fault of the school caused the above incident, which caused Xiaowen to suffer great physical and mental suffering, but also caused greater suffering to his family, for which the school should bear legal responsibility.
对此，校方辩称，学校已经在操场设置了防护网，并张贴了管理规定、训练通知，告知进入操场须与训练场地保持安全距离并提醒注意自身安全，原告也不能证明学校“未尽到安全保障义务”，所以不同意赔偿。	Against these accusations, the university argued that it has set up protective barrier around the sports field and posted management regulations and training notices informing people to keep a safe distance from the training field when entering the sports ground and to be aware of their personal safety, and because the plaintiff couldn’t prove the university “didn’t fulfill safety assurance obligations”, the university refused to pay compensation.	In response, the school argued that the school had installed protective netting in the playground, and posted management regulations, training notices, told the playground to keep a safe distance from the training site and warned of its own safety, and that the plaintiffs could not prove that the school "did not meet its safety and security obligations," so they	In response, the school argued that the school had set up protective nets in the playground and posted regulations and training notices telling it to keep a safe distance from the playground and remind it of its own safety, and that the plaintiffs could not prove that the school had "failed in its safety and security obligations" and therefore did not agree to compensation.
法院审理后认为，事发的场地系涉案大学对公众免费开放的场地，学校虽对操场的管理存在安全保障义务，但这种安全保障义务仅需达到一般的注意义务即可。	After hearing the case, the court believed the venue where the incident took place is open to public for free, and though the university bears safety assurance obligations for the sports ground, the extent of its obligations were merely to have general notices.	The court heard that the site of the incident was a site open to the public by the university in question and that, although the school had a duty of safety and security with respect to the management of the playground, this duty of safety and security should only be met	After the hearing, the Court held that the site was open to the public free of charge by the university concerned, and that although the school had a duty of security in relation to the management of the playground, that duty of security was sufficient only to meet the general duty
事发时学校在操场设置了防护网，已经尽到了适当的安全保障义务，且陈某也按照此前达成的赔偿协议向小文赔偿了医疗费、交通费等各项损失两千余元，双方约定此次纠纷一次性解决。	When the incident took place, there was a protective barrier set up by the university on the sports ground, meaning the appropriate safety assurance obligations were fulfilled, and Chen paid over 2,000 yuan in compensation for Xiaowen’s medical bill, transportation, and other losses according to the compensation agreement reached, so the two parities agreed to settle their dispute once and for all.	At the time of the incident, the school installed a protective net in the playground, and has done its proper safety and security obligations, and Chen has also compensated Xiaowen for medical expenses, transportation costs and other losses of more than 2,000 yuan according to a previous compensation agreement. 事后，小文家长再次主张学校赔偿，于法无据，法院判决驳回了原告的全部诉请。	Afterwards, Xiaowen’s parents’ claims for compensation from the university was found to be groundless, and the court ruled to dismiss all claims of the plaintiff.	Afterwards, the parents again sought compensation from the school, which was unfounded, and the court ruled against the plaintiffs.	Afterwards, Xiaowen's parents again claimed compensation from the school, and the court decision dismissed all of the plaintiffs' claims.
宣判后，双方均未上诉，该判决现已生效。	After neither party decided to appeal, the verdict became effective.	Neither party appealed the judgement, which is now in force.	Following the sentence, neither party appealed and the sentence has now entered into force.
根据我国侵权责任法第37条规定，学校作为公共场所的管理人，负有安全保障义务；在第三人的行为造成他人损害的情况下，第三人承担侵权责任，而未尽到安全保障义务的公共场所管理人应当承担相应的补充责任。	According to Article 37 of Tort Liability Law, as the manager of a public place, the university bears safety assurance obligations; and when actions of a third party cause damages to others, the third party takes tort liability, while manager of the public place that fails to fulfill safety assurance obligations takes complementary liabilities.	According to article 37 of our tort liability law, schools, as managers of public places, have safety and security obligations; in the case of damage caused by the actions of a third person, the third person is liable for infringement, and the manager of a public place who does not meet the safety and security obligations should	According to Article 37 of China's Tort Liability Law, schools, as managers of public places, have the obligation to ensure safety; in the case of damage caused to others by the acts of third parties, third parties bear tort liability, while public place managers who fail to meet the obligation of security shall bear corresponding supplementary responsibilities.
法官称，由于作为公共场所的管理人，最有可能了解整个场所的实际情况、预见可能发生的危险和损害，从而最有可能采取必要措施防止损失的发生或者减轻损害的程度，且避免和减轻损害发生的成本最低，故而法律规定由其承担从事社会活动相应的保障义务。	The judge stated that because manager of the public place is the party most likely to know the actual state of the site, and to foresee potential dangers and harms, it is the most likely party to take necessary measures to prevent losses from happening or reduce damages and to keep the cost of damage prevention or reduction to a minimum, meaning the law requires it to bear the appropriate safety assurance obligations when engaging in social activities.	According to the judge, since, as the manager of a public place, it is most likely to know the actual situation in the place as a whole, to anticipate the danger and damage that may occur, to take the necessary measures to prevent loss or to mitigate the extent of the damage, and to avoid and mitigate the least cost of the damage, the law	According to the judge, since, as the administrator of a public place, it is most likely to know the actual situation of the place as a whole, to anticipate the danger and damage that may occur, and thus to take the necessary measures to prevent the occurrence of loss or mitigate the extent of damage, and to avoid and mitigate the damage at the lowest cost, the
本案中，对于向公众免费开放的操场中不特定的进入人群，学校所负的安全保障义务应与其从事的社会活动相适应，具体而言，主要是应采取基本的安全措施并对于隐蔽性危险负有告知义务。	In this case, for the non-specific group of people entering the sports ground open to public for free, the school’s safety assurance obligation were in line with the social activities it was engaged in, specifically which were primarily to take basic safety measures and to inform people of hidden dangers.	In the present case, the safety and security obligations of the school should be commensurate with its social activities, in particular the obligation to take basic security measures and to inform of hidden dangers, in respect of the non-specific access to the playground, which is open to the public free of charge.	In this case, the school's obligation to ensure safety for unspecified persons entering a playground open to the public free of charge should be commensurate with its social activities, in particular basic safety measures and an obligation to inform of hidden dangers.
司法实践中，也不宜对公共场所管理人苛以过高的安全保障义务。	In juridical practice, it’s not advised to make safety assurance obligations too high or too strict for the managers of public places.	In judicial practice, it is also inappropriate to impose excessive safety and security obligations on managers of public places.	In judicial practice, it is not appropriate to impose excessive security obligations on managers of public places.
如果学校已经采取了设置防护网且尽到告知义务，则可以认定学校不具有过错，不应承担法律责任。	If the university has set up a protective barrier and fulfilled its duty to inform, the university is considered not at fault and does not bear legal responsibility.	If the school has put in place a protective net and has a duty to inform, the school may be found not to be at fault and not liable.	If the school has adopted protective nets and has fulfilled its duty to inform, it can be found that the school is not at fault and should not be held liable.
此外，对于第三人侵权，即使学校等公共场所的管理者未尽到安全保障义务，其承担的责任也是作为一种损害赔偿的补充，根据最新颁布的民法典，管理者承担补充责任后，还可以向第三人追偿。	Furthermore, as to third party tort, even if the manager of public places such as a university doesn’t fulfill its safety assurance obligations, its liability is complementary to damage compensation; according to the new Civil Code, the manager can claim compensation from the third party after assuming complementary liability.	In addition, the liability of the superintendent of a public place, such as a school, is supplemental to the liability of a third person for damages, even if the superintendent of a public place, such as a school, fails to comply with the obligation of safety and security. Under the	In addition, in cases of infringement by third parties, the liability of managers of public places such as schools, even if they fail to meet their safety and security obligations, is supplemented by damages. According to the recently enacted Civil Code, managers can also recover compensation from third parties after assuming additional liability.
故在此类事故中，受害者在已经收到直接侵权人的赔偿后，不应再扩大求偿范围。	Therefore, the victim must not expand the scope of the claim after receiving compensation from the directly liable party in this kind of accident.	In such cases, the victim should therefore not have to extend the scope of the claim after having received compensation from the direct infringer.	Therefore, in such accidents, the victim should not extend the scope of his claim after he has received compensation from the direct infringer.

北京爱乐合唱团创始人杨鸿年逝世，享年86岁-中新网	Yang Hongnian, Beijing Philharmonic Chorus, passes away at age 86 - chinanews.com	Beijing Philharmonic founder Yang Hongyan dies at age of 86 - Xinhua - RT Viral	Yang Hongnian, founder of Beijing Philharmonic Choir, dies aged 86
新京报讯(记者 刘臻)7月26日，北京爱乐合唱团发表讣告，北京爱乐合唱团创始人，中国著名指挥家、音乐教育家，中央音乐学院终身学术委员、指挥系教授杨鸿年，因病医治无效，于2020年7月26日13时55分在北京逝世，享年86岁。	Beijing News (Reporter Liu Zhen) On July 26, the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus published an obituary for its founder Yang Hongnian, who passed away in Beijing at 13:55 on July 26, 2020 at the age of 86, due to an ineffective medical treatment; he was a notable Chinese conductor and music educator, a lifetime academy scholar at the Central Conservatory of Music, and Composition Department professor.	On July 26, 2020, Yang Hongnian, founder of the Beijing Philharmonic Choir, a renowned Chinese conductor, music educator, lifelong academic member of the Central Conservatory of Music, and professor of the conduct department, died in Beijing at 13: 55 on July 26, 2020 at the age of 86.	Yang Hongnian, founder of the Beijing Philharmonic Choir, a famous Chinese conductor and music educator, tenured academic member of the Central Conservatory of Music and professor of conductors, died at 13: 55 on July 26, 2020 in Beijing.
图片来自北京爱乐合唱团官网。	Image from the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus official website.	Photo by Beijing Philharmonic Choir.	Photo courtesy of Beijing Philharmonic Choir.
杨鸿年出生于1934年，江苏南京人，自幼酷爱音乐。	He was born in 1934 in Nanjing, Jiangsu, and even in childhood was a lover of music.	Yang Hongnian was born in 1934 in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, and loved music since childhood.	Yang Hongnian was born in 1934 in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province.
1951年任南京人民广播电台合唱队指挥，1951年秋考入上海华东师大音乐系，师从杨嘉仁教授及德国指挥家希兹曼学习指挥，向前苏联专家阿尔扎玛诺夫学习曲式、复调。	In 1951, he took up a chorus conductor position at Nanjing People’s Radio; in autumn of 1951, he enrolled at the East China Normal University music department to study composition under Professor Yang Jiaren and German conductor Heisman, and then studied musical forms and polyphony under Soviet musical expert Arzamanov.	In the fall of 1951, he was admitted to the East China Division of Music in Shanghai, where he studied under Professor Yang Jiaren and the German conductor Gizmller.	In 1951 he served as the conductor of the choir of Nanjing People's Radio. In the autumn of 1951 he was admitted to the music department of East China Normal University in Shanghai. He studied conducting under Professor Yang Jiaren and German conductor Hitzman.
1958年任教于北京艺术师范学院音乐系，1973年调至中央音乐学院作曲系、指挥系任教。	In 1958, he began teaching at the Beijing Normal University of Arts Department of Music, and in 1973, he transferred to the Department of Composition and Conducting at the Central Conservatory of Music.	In 1958, he taught at the Beijing Normal University of the Arts and Music, and in 1973 he was transferred to the Central Conservatory of Music.	In 1958, he taught at the Music Department of Beijing Normal College of Art and in 1973 transferred to the Department of Composition and Conducting of the Central Conservatory of Music.
杨鸿年于1983年创办北京爱乐合唱团。	In 1982, Yang Hongnian established the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus.	Yang Hongnian founded the Beijing Philharmonic Choir in 1983.	Yang Hongnian founded the Beijing Philharmonic Choir in 1983.
三十余年来，他秉承“爱和奉献”的宗旨，率领这支合唱团唱遍世界各地，并在国内外重要比赛中获得了几十项大奖。	For more than three decades, he embodied the principles of “love and dedication” as he led the chorus in performances all over the globe and won dozens of prestigious awards in major competitions in China and abroad.	For more than 30 years, he has led the choir around the world and won dozens of awards in important competitions at home and abroad, adhering to the tenet of "love and dedication."	For more than 30 years, he has led this choir around the world and won dozens of awards in important competitions at home and abroad.
曾先后指挥中央乐团合唱队、中央民族歌舞团、东方歌舞团、上海合唱团等30余个团体的演出，并举行多场交响音乐会及合唱音乐会。	He directed performances for more than 30 ensembles including the Central Philharmonic Chorus, the China National Ethnic Song and Dance Ensemble, Oriental Song and Dance Company, and Shanghai Chorus, and also put on many symphony and chorus performances.	He has performed with more than 30 groups, including the Central Orchestra Chorus, the Central National Song and Dance Company, the Oriental Song and Dance Company, and the Shanghai Chorus.	He has conducted more than 30 groups such as Central Orchestra Choir, Central Chinese Song and Dance Company, Oriental Song and Dance Company and Shanghai Choir, and held many symphonic concerts and choral concerts.
著作有《乐队训练学》、《合唱训练学》、《二部歌曲写作》、《儿童歌曲集》(上下册)及论文《论合唱音准问题》、《论管弦乐的音响层次布局》，以及译作《合唱配器法》及《德彪西的和声语言》等。	He authored such books as “Orchestra Training”, “Chorus Training”, “The Writing of Two-Part Compositions”, “A Collection of Children’s Songs” (Volumes 1 & 2), his essays include “On Issues of Chorus Intonation” and “On the Sound Hierarchy of Orchestral Music”, and his translated works include “Choral Orchestration”, “Debussy’s Language of Harmony”, and so on.	It has been published in the following books: "Band Training," "Chorus Training," "Two Songs to Write," "Children's Songs Collection," "On the Problems of Chorus Tone," "On the Sound Layout of Orchestral Music," and translated into Chinese as "The Chorus Accessory Law" and "Debuss	His works include "Band Training," "Choral Training," "Two-part Song Writing," "Children's Songbook" (volume) and treatises "On the Choral Intonation Problem," "On the Sound Level Layout of Orchestra," as well as translations of "Choral Orchestrator Law" and "Debussy's Harmonic Language."

今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。	In an interview with a reporter from Ecns.cn, 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandfathers used to fish in the Longxi River, and that he had been fishing with his father since the age of 11, shaking his boat, and traveling along the Longxi River from Liangping, Chongqing to Changshou, journeys that would last for over ten days every time he left his home, and he relied on fishing to make a living. 以色列加强对疫情反复的防控-中新网	Israel Strengthens Measures to Prevent Epidemic from Recurring-Ecns.cn	Israel to tighten control over repeated outbreaks - Xinhua - RT News	Israel Strengthens Prevention and Control of Repeated Epidemics
2020-07-26 04:56:44 来源：光明日报 作者：王思硕 责任编辑：王思硕	2020-07-26 04:56:44 Source: Guangming Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Editor: Wang Sishuo	2020-07-26 04: 56: 44 Source: Guangming Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Responsible Editor: Wang Sishuo	2020-07-26 04: 56: 44From: Guangming Daily Author: Wang SishuoResponsible Editor: Wang Sishuo
以色列加强对疫情反复的防控	Israel strengthens measures to prevent epidemic from recurring	Israel to tighten control over repeated outbreaks	Israel steps up prevention and control of recurrent outbreaks
新冠肺炎疫情暴发初期，以色列的防控措施成效明显。	At the beginning of the epidemic outbreak, Israel's prevention and control measures were effective.	In the early years of the coronary pneumonia epidemic, Israeli control measures were effective.	In the early stages of the COVID-19 outbreak, Israel's prevention and control measures were effective.
然而，随着防控措施的逐渐解禁，近期以色列国内的新冠肺炎确诊人数有明显上升之势，以色列政府已多次采取紧急措施加强对疫情的防控。	However, with the gradual lifting of the ban, the number of confirmed cases in Israel has recently increased significantly, and the Israeli government has taken several emergency measures to strengthen its epidemic prevention and control.	However, with the gradual release of preventive measures, there has been a marked increase in the number of new coronary pneumonia diagnoses in Israel in the recent past, and the Government of Israel has taken several urgent steps to strengthen	However, with the gradual lifting of prevention and control measures, the number of confirmed cases of coronavirus in Israel has recently increased significantly, and the Israeli government has taken several urgent measures to strengthen prevention and control of the epidemic.
2月28日，以色列本土确诊第一例新冠肺炎病例，以迅速采取了关闭所有出入境口岸，暂停非必要行业，学校改为网上授课，限制公共交通和非必要社交活动，封锁疫情严重城市，军警联合维护防控举措等。	On February 28, the first case was confirmed in Israel and prompt measures were taken to close all entry and exit points, suspend non-essential industries, and urge all schools to take classes online; moreover, they restricted public transportation and non-essential social activities, sealed off cities with severe outbreaks, and combined military and police efforts to maintain effective control and prevention measures.	On 28 February, the first case of coronary pneumonia was confirmed in mainland Israel, resulting in the rapid closure of all entry and exit points, suspension of non-essential trades, conversion of schools to online instruction, restrictions on public transport and non-essential social activities, blockades of heavily affected cities, and joint	On February 28, the first case of coronavirus was confirmed in Israel, which quickly adopted measures such as closing all entry and exit ports, suspending non-essential industries, changing schools to online classes, restricting public transportation and non-essential social activities, blocking cities with severe epidemics, and jointly maintaining prevention and control measures.
这一系列措施很快取得了积极成效，至5月中旬，以色列单日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例一度回落至个位数。	This series of measures quickly yielded positive results, and by mid-May, the daily number of confirmed cases in Israel dropped to the single digits.	This series of measures quickly yielded positive results, and by mid-May, the number of new coronary pneumonia diagnoses in Israel had dropped to single digits in a single day.	These measures quickly yielded positive results, and by mid-May, the number of new confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Israel fell to single digits in a single day.
随着疫情得到控制，以色列各项防控措施全面解封，自6月以来，新冠肺炎新增确诊人数逐渐反弹。	As the outbreak was brought under control, the blockade was completely lifted and the number of new confirmed cases has gradually seen a recurrence since June.	As the epidemic was brought under control, Israeli control measures were fully implemented, and since June, the number of new confirmations of coronary pneumonia has gradually rebounded.	Since June, the number of new confirmed cases of COVID-19 has gradually rebounded as the outbreak has been brought under control and Israeli prevention and control measures have been fully closed.
特别是进入7月后，疫情扩散蔓延速度不断加快。	In particular, in July, the spread of the epidemic has accelerated since the beginning of the month.	The spread of the epidemic has been accelerating, especially since July.	Especially since entering July, the spread of the epidemic has accelerated.
近日来，以色列每日新增病例有8天在1500人以上，截至7月25日发稿时，以当日新增病例达916人。	Recently, the number of new confirmed cases in Israel has been above 1,500 per day for eight days, and by the time of this report on July 25, the number of new confirmed cases reached 916.	In recent days, there have been more than 1,500 new cases in Israel in eight days, and 916 new cases were reported as of July 25.	In recent days, there have been more than 1,500 new cases per day in Israel for eight days, with 916 new cases as of July 25.
截至7月25日，以色列已有确诊病例59745人，死亡人数448人。	As of July 25, there were 59,745 confirmed cases and 448 death cases in Israel.	As of July 25, there were 59,745 confirmed cases and 448 deaths in Israel.	As of 25 July, Israel had 59,745 confirmed cases and 448 deaths.
面对疫情的迅猛反弹，以色列政府多次采取紧急措施加强对疫情的防控。	In the face of this rapid recurrence, the Israeli government has taken several emergency measures to strengthen epidemic prevention and control.	In response to the rapid response to the epidemic, the Israeli Government has taken several urgent steps to strengthen the control of the epidemic	Faced with the rapid backlash against the outbreak, the Israeli government has repeatedly taken urgent measures to strengthen its prevention and control.
7月6日，在确诊病例数突破3万后，以色列政府关闭了健身房、游泳池、酒吧、夜总会等公共娱乐场所，同时出台了限制公共交通政策，规定每辆公交车的乘客最多不能超过20人。	On July 6, after the number of confirmed cases exceeded 30,000, the Israeli government closed gyms, swimming pools, bars, nightclubs and other public entertainment venues, and introduced a policy of limiting public transport to a maximum of 20 passengers per bus.	On 6 July, after the number of confirmed cases exceeded 30,000, the Israeli government closed down public entertainment venues such as gyms, swimming pools, bars, and nightclubs, and introduced a public transport policy that limited the number of passengers per bus to a maximum of 20.	On 6 July, after the number of confirmed cases exceeded 30,000, the Israeli government closed public entertainment venues such as gyms, swimming pools, bars, and nightclubs, and introduced a policy of restricting public transportation to a maximum of 20 passengers per bus.
17日，以政府宣布了包括周末实施“封城”等在内的一系列新的限制措施，规定在每周五17时至每周日5时期间实施“封城”。	On July 17, the government announced a series of new restrictions, including a "city lockdown" on weekends, from 17:00 every Friday to 5:00 every Sunday.	On 17 May, the government announced a series of new restrictions, including the imposition of "city closures" over the weekend, which would be implemented from 17: 00 on Fridays to 17: 00 on Sundays.	On May 17, the Israeli government announced a series of new restrictions, including the imposition of "closures" on weekends, between 17: 00 on Fridays and 5: 00 on Sundays.

同时，以色列民众未对疫情的严重性予以足够重视，没能与政府在抗击疫情方面形成合力。	As yet, the Israeli public is not fully aware of the seriousness of the epidemic and fails to cooperate with the government in fighting against it.	At the same time, the Israeli people did not pay sufficient attention to the severity of the epidemic and did not join forces with the government to combat it.	At the same time, the Israeli population did not pay enough attention to the seriousness of the epidemic to create synergy with the Government in its fight against it.
在以色列疫情出现反复后，许多民众因政府防控措施影响自身经济利益而上街抗议游行。	In spite of the epidemic’s recurrence in Israel, many people have taken to the streets in protest at the government's control measures that affected the public economic interests.	Following repeated outbreaks in Israel, many people took to the streets to protest against government control measures affecting their own economic interests.	Following repeated outbreaks in Israel, many people took to the streets to protest against government control measures affecting their own economic interests.
7月11日，上万人在特拉维夫举行示威游行，认为抗疫政策影响经济。	On July 11, tens of thousands of people demonstrated in Tel Aviv, arguing that anti-epidemic policies were affecting the economy. 此外，许多民众在户外活动时也未遵守佩戴口罩、保持两米安全社交距离等规定，为避免因未佩戴口罩被警察罚款，不少民众仅将口罩戴在下巴上或者挂在手腕上。	In addition, many people did not comply with the rules to wear masks and maintain a safe social distance of two meters when going outdoors, and many people only wore masks on their chins or hung them on their wrists to avoid being fined by the police for not wearing them.	In addition, many people do not observe the requirement to wear a mask during outdoor activities and maintain a safe two-metre social distance, and in order to avoid being fined by the police for not wearing the mask, many people simply wear the mask on their chin or on their wrists.	In addition, many people in outdoor activities do not comply with the wearing of masks, maintain a safe social distance of two meters, in order to avoid police fines for not wearing masks, many people only wear masks on the chin or on the wrist.
疫情反复期间，学校是新冠病毒扩散的重灾区，而据记者近日对此间幼儿园走访发现，幼儿园的老师和学生均未按政府要求佩戴口罩，也没有相互保持两米安全社交距离，为大量师生感染病毒埋下隐患。	During the epidemic recurrence, schools have been the most affected places by the COVID-19; according to a recent reporter’s visit to a kindergarten, it was found that teachers and students did not wear masks as required by the government, nor did they keep a safe social distance of two meters, thus creating a potential risk for a large number of teachers and students to be exposed to the virus. 梁云文化大院成立于2012年，成为宁夏第一家农村“非物质文化遗产陈列馆”，也是固原市非物质文化遗产保护示范大院。	The Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard was established in 2012 and became the first rural "Intangible Cultural Heritage Exhibition Hall" in Ningxia, as well as a demonstration courtyard for protecting intangible cultural heritage in Guyuan. There is a line in Kite, “If you hadn’t caught me, I would have nearly forgetten my identity as a member of Nationalist Party of China”, which shows how spies should not be presented as elites. ”	But in Liu Yunlong's view, such a person is not suitable for spying. "Definitely the soaring opera, their two special tacit agreement, they have a great influence on me. "	Director Cao Fei used the term "drag play" to describe Li Liqun and Liu Yunlong's rival play. "Absolutely drag play, they two particularly tacit understanding, this kind of understanding on them is very impactful to me. 高手之间互不抢戏，导演也不去搅戏，当演员都在角色之中并保证自己人物状态的时候，不仅可以从人物角度出发去塑造角色，还能给观众带来更多的观看可能性，殷飞说这样的戏才够出彩。	Masters don’t steal the show from others, and directors never disrupt a performance; all the actors were immersed in the characters, allowing them to not only craft the roles from the perspective of their characters, but also create more possibilities for the audience, and Yin Fei praised such performances as marvelous. 柳云龙也主动提出，“我们要有人情味。这个人情味就是指我身边的人一定有好的有坏的，坏的人是敌人，但也要把他们发展起来，我们的队伍也要壮大起来。”	Liu Yunlong also said, “We should care about humanity.” This means that there must be good and bad people, and the villains are enemies, but they should be presented well, and the good guys should also be presented properly. ”	Liu Yunlong also offered, "We want to have a sense of humanity. This sensibility means that the people around me must have good and bad, bad people are the enemy, but also to develop them, our team must also grow up." 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。	The Lancet published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with 1.4 billion population and the size similar to Europe or the U.S., has effectively contained COVID-19 outbreak at this stage, with no mass transmission again, and that it has the domestic pandemic under control to a great extent. 据导演大鹏介绍 ，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意 ” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。	According to Da Peng, inspiration came from “accidents”, a series of family accidents during production, which changed the original production plan; the use of real-life performances without scripts was finally recorded as a film, creating a film far different from what he originally imagined. According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious" originated from "a divine intention." During the shooting period, the family suddenly changed a series of changes, so that the original shooting plan had to be changed, life without a script ended up being recorded as a film, but released tension beyond design.

影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。	The film will focus on the front line of the fight against the epidemic in Wuhan, feature Wuhan medical personnel and the medical aid teams from the various provinces as characters, and from the perspective of different personalities, use unique narratives and highly impactful cinematic language to provide a panoramic view of the moving story of the deep spirit of dedication and sacrifice among China’s medical personnel in the fight against the epidemic. 上半年电信网络诈骗犯罪上升七成 最高检总结特点-中新网	Telecommunication fraud crimes increase by 70% in the first half of the year, the Supreme People's Procuratorate summarizes features - China News	In the first half of the telecommunication network fraud crime rose 70 -	Telecommunications network fraud crime rose 70 percent in the first half of the year
中新网7月26日电 据最高检网站消息，今年上半年，全国检察机关共起诉诈骗犯罪58101人，同比上升35%。	July 26 (China News) According to the website of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, in the first half of this year, the procuratorial organs across the country prosecuted a total of 58,101 people for fraud crimes, a year-on-year increase of 35%.	In the first half of this year, the national prosecution office prosecuted 58,101 fraud crimes, up 35 year-on-year.	On July 26, according to the Supreme Inspection website news, in the first half of this year, the national procuratorate prosecuted 58,101 people for fraud crimes, up 35 year-on-year.
特别是妨害疫情防控犯罪中，诈骗犯罪多发，检察机关起诉诈骗犯罪人数占全部妨害疫情防控犯罪人数的43.4%。	Especially among crimes obstructing the pandemic prevention and control, there are many fraudulent crimes, accounting for 43.4% of the total number of crimes obstructing pandemic prevention and control.	In particular, the number of fraud-related offences is high, with the Public Prosecution Service prosecuting 43.4 per cent of all fraud-related offences.	In particular, among the crimes against epidemic prevention and control, fraud crimes are more frequent. The number of fraud crimes prosecuted by the procuratorate accounts for 43.4 percent of the total number of crimes against epidemic
最高人民检察院有针对性地开展指导，目前已发布的十批涉疫情防控典型案例中，涉及诈骗罪的共9起。	The Supreme People's Procuratorate has provided targeted guidance and has now released ten batches of typical cases involving pandemic prevention and control, including a total of 9 cases of fraudulent crime.	The Supreme People's Procuratorate has targeted guidance, and has issued nine of the ten typical cases related to epidemic prevention and control.	The Supreme People's Procuratorate has carried out targeted guidance, and has issued ten batches of typical cases involving epidemic prevention and control, involving a total of nine fraud crimes.
从上半年检察机关办案情况看，涉及诈骗犯罪的名目繁多，上至国家宏观政策，下至老百姓衣食住行，包括涉疫情诈骗、“医托”诈骗、“保健品”诈骗、“招生中介”诈骗、“套路贷”诈骗、骗取国家补贴诈骗、民族资产解冻诈骗等等，不断“推陈出新”，范围涉及教育、医疗、就业、养老、社保、征地拆迁、精准扶贫、金融信贷等多个领域，不仅给被害人造成经济损失，也严重影响经济社会发展。	From the cases handled by the procuratorial organs in the first half of the year, a wide range of fraudulent crimes are involved, ranging from national macro policies to people's basic necessities of life: typical cases include pandemic-related fraud, "hospital scalping”, "health care products", "enrollment agencies", "loan fraud", defrauding people of state subsidies, fraud regarding unfreezing national assets, and so on, but the new emerges out of the old constantly, and fraud involving education, medical care, employment, pensions, social security, land acquisition and relocation, targeted poverty alleviation, financial credit, and other areas has emerged, which has not only caused economic losses to the victims, but also seriously affected economic and social development.	From the first half of the year, the procuratorate dealt with a large number of fraud-related crimes, ranging from the national macro policy to the general public, including epidemic-related fraud, "medical treatment" fraud, "health goods" fraud, "enrollment intermediary" fraud, "loan arbitrage" fraud, fraud of obtaining state subsidies, and national asset thawing fraud.	In the first half of the year, the procuratorate handled many cases involving fraud crimes, ranging from the national macro policy, down to people's food, clothing and housing, including epidemic-related fraud, "medical care" fraud, "health care products" fraud, "enrollment intermediary" fraud, "routine loan" fraud, fraudulent state subsidies fraud, national assets thawing fraud and so on.
特别是一些电信网络诈骗突破国界、地域和人员的限制，具有涉众、跨境、远程、电子支付等特征，不特定受害群体多，危害大。	In particular, some telecommunication fraud even crosses national boundaries or geographical and personnel restrictions, which involves victims without specific features and cause harm through cross-border, remote, and electronic payment.	In particular, some telecommunication network frauds break through national borders, geographical boundaries and personnel restrictions, have the characteristics of people, cross-border, remote, electronic payment, etc., and are not specific to specific groups of victims	In particular, some telecommunications network frauds break through national borders, geographical areas and personnel restrictions, have the characteristics of people involved, cross-border, remote, electronic payment, not specific victim groups, large harm.
如，有的成立专门公司，租用高档写字楼，设立多个部门或岗位，利用合法的网络平台宣传、招聘，对招聘人员进行培训和考核，采用企业运作模式管理，披着“合法外衣”，迷惑性更强。	For example, some set up companies in rented high-grade office buildings, providing multiple departments or positions that use legitimate online platforms for promotion, and which recruits, trains, and assesses its employees; management models of enterprise operation, cloaked in "legality", makes it even more confusing.	For example, some companies have set up specialized companies, rented upscale office buildings, set up multiple departments or posts, used legal network platforms to advertise, recruit, train and evaluate recruiters, and adopted business operation model management, wearing the "legal veneer," more confusing.	For example, some set up specialized companies, rent high-grade office buildings, set up multiple departments or posts, using legitimate network platform publicity, recruitment, training and assessment of recruiters, using enterprise operation mode management, clothed in a "legitimate cloak," more confusing.
依法惩治和防范犯罪，及时向社会公众和有关部门发出预警，是检察机关义不容辞的责任。	It is the compelling duty of the procuratorial organs to punish and prevent crime in accordance with the law, and to issue timely warnings to the public and relevant authorities.	It is incumbent upon the Public Prosecutor's Office to punish and prevent crimes in accordance with the law and to provide timely early warning to the public and relevant authorities.	It is incumbent upon the procuratorate to punish and prevent crimes in accordance with law, and issue timely warnings to the public and relevant departments.

迤那镇所在的威宁县，因纬度低、海拔高，光照充足、昼夜温差大，所产苹果含糖量高、口感好，在周边地区具有一定知名度，但也因为个头小、斑点多，一直没能卖出个好价钱，没能形成产业规模。	Thanks to its low latitude, high altitude, abundant sunlight and big day-night temperature differences, the apples produced in Weining County have high sugar content and great taste, which have given them a certain notoriety in certain areas, yet the apples don’t sell for a good price because they are small in size and spotty, which is hwy they haven’t moved beyond this region.	The town is located in Weining County, because of its low latitude and high altitude, good light, large day and night temperature difference, high sugar content and good taste of the apple produced, has a certain popularity in the surrounding area, but also because of its small size and spots, it has not been able to sell a good price, and has not been able to form an	Weining County, where the town is located, because of low latitude, high altitude, sufficient light, large temperature difference between day and night, high sugar content, good taste, has a certain reputation in the surrounding area, but also because of small size, spots, has not been able to sell a good price, failed to form an industrial scale.
迤那镇曾是个“包谷洋芋度春秋”的贫困乡镇，10年前当地贫困发生率高达25.8%。	Yina Township used to suffer from poverty, “getting through the year with corn and potatoes”, and 10 years ago, the local poverty rate was 25.8%. 本报讯 记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。	Reported by Shang Rui: A few days ago, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University made major progress in “capturing carbon dioxide with the membrane separation method”, meaning they have successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane fabrication technology which greatly improves the membrane material’s performance in capturing carbon dioxide.	Recently, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University made significant progress against the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide," successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, and greatly improved the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.	Recently, Tianjin University atmospheric environment and bioenergy team has made significant progress in "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method," successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, greatly improving the carbon dioxide capture performance of film materials.
相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。	The relevant research findings are published as the cover story by Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology, an international periodical.	The results were published as a cover article in the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.	The results were published as a cover article in the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.
“温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。	The greenhouse effect is a major environmental problem standing in the way of human development, while carbon dioxide is the prime culprit for the greenhouse effect.	The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, while carbon dioxide emissions are responsible for the "greenhouse effect."	The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem afflicting human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are responsible for the "greenhouse effect."
如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。	How to effectively capture and utilize carbon dioxide emissions from human activities is the focus of attention for scientists.	How to capture and harness human-emitted carbon dioxide efficiently is a focus for scientists.	How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is a major concern for scientists.
“膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。	The membrane separation method is a new carbon dioxide capture technology which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of the membrane material, and it is energy-efficient and easy to use.	"Membrane separation method" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, it is to separate carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane material, with efficient energy saving and simple operation.	"Membrane Separation Method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane material, which has the characteristics of efficient energy saving and simple operation.
如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。	How to make the membrane material “take deep breathes” and improve gas separation efficiency was the hurdle of capturing carbon dioxide with the membrane separation method.	How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck of capturing carbon dioxide using membrane separation method.	How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck difficulty of using membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.
天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。	The Tianjin University research team investigated the impact of different solvents on the membrane’s performance in gas separation through innovative thinking and repeated experiments.	Tianjin University's scientific research team innovates and explores the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation properties through repeated experiments.	Tianjin University scientific research team innovative ideas, through repeated experiments, to investigate the effect of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance.
实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。	According to experiment results, if N-Methyl pyrrolidone is used as the fabrication solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotube in the membrane material produced is more even, making it more breathable, which effectively improves the membrane material’s gas separation performance and speed.	Experimental results showed that N-methylpyrrolidone was used as a preparation solvent, resulting in a more uniform distribution of carbon nanotubes in the membrane material and "more breathable," effectively increasing the gas separation efficiency and rate of the	Experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable," effectively improving the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material
用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。	Fabricated with this new technology, the carbon dioxide separation performance of this mixed matrix membrane is close to the theoretical upper limit of this kind of membrane material.	The carbon dioxide separation performance of mixed matrix membranes prepared with this new technique is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of the current type of membrane	Mixed matrix membranes prepared with this new technology have carbon dioxide separation properties close to the current theoretical separation limit of such membrane materials.

志愿填报前 先弄懂啥是专业级差	Understanding university major point deductions before choosing your preferred majors	Before voluntarily filling in the report, it is a professional grade difference.	Know before volunteering Is professional grade difference
每年填报高考志愿，都有学生或者家长因为对于志愿填报中涉及的名词不了解，进而影响志愿填报。	Each year, when we fill out our preferred majors on the NCEE (National College Entrance Examination), there are always students and parents who don’t understand the terminology involved, which can directly affect how you select your preferred majors.	Each year, students or parents who do not know the terms involved in the voluntary entry will be asked to volunteer.	Every year, there are students or parents who do not understand the terms involved in the volunteer registration, which can affect the volunteer registration.
今年，北京交通大学、北京科技大学、北京邮电大学、北京林业大学、北京化工大学5所高校联合发布2020年招生政策，取消专业级差。	This year, Beijing Jiaotong University, Beijing University of Science and Technology, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, Beijing Forestry University, and Beijing University of Chemical Technology issued a joint admissions policy for 2020 which eliminates major point deductions.
