专业级差是什么意思，在志愿填报中有何重要意义？	What are “major point deductions”, and how do they impact your choice of major?	What does it mean to be professional and what is the significance of volunteering?	What does professional grade mean and what is important in volunteering?
专业分配规则有三种方式	The three methods of major allocation	Professional allocation rules in three ways	There are three ways to assign specialization rules
专家提醒，填报志愿前，一定要详读心仪学校的《招生章程》，了解高校的录取规则，包括调档比例，专业分配规则等。	Experts say that before filling out your preferred majors, you should carefully read the school’s “Admissions Guidelines” to learn about the college’s admissions regulations, including enrollment ratios, major allocation, and so on.	Experts remind that before filling in the volunteer, be sure to read the admissions charter of your favorite school in detail, and understand the admission rules of colleges and universities, including transfer rates and professional allocation rules.	Experts remind that before filling in the volunteer, be sure to read the admissions charter of your favorite school, understand the admission rules of universities, including transfer ratio, professional allocation rules and so on.
专业分配规则，是指高校调档之后，对于专业录取主要有专业优先、分数优先、专业级差三种方式。	Major allocation refers to the three primary methods of admitting students to particular majors, which are major priority, score priority, and major point deductions, after a student enrolls at a university.	Professional allocation rules, refers to the college transfer, for professional admission mainly have professional priority, grade priority, professional grade difference three ways.	Major allocation rules, refers to the college transfer, there are major priority, score priority, professional grade difference three ways of admission.
高校具体使用哪一种方式，会在《招生章程》中明确。	The specific method used by a particular university will be stated clearly in the “Admissions Guidelines”.	In particular, it is stated in the Charter of Admission.	The specific method used by universities will be specified in the Admissions Charter.
但也有一些高校的录取原则是总分优先，专业之间没有级差。	However, some universities use balanced prioritization, and do not apply point deductions for different majors.	However, there are also a number of higher education institutions that have an overall score of plus or minus.	However, there are also some universities where the admission principle is total priority and there is no grade difference between majors.
就是说将录取范围内考生按照总分排队，当分数未达到第一专业志愿录取分数线时，则看是否达到了第二专业志愿录取分数线，以此类推直到录取到最后一个专业志愿，各专业志愿之间不设级差。	This means that all students who qualify for enrollment are ordered by a balanced total score, and if their score falls below enrollment requirements for their first preferred major, the university looks at whether the student qualifies for the second preferred major, and so on until the student’s final preferred major, none of which involves point deductions for any major.	This means that when the score does not meet the voluntary entry score line for the first major, the entry score line for the second major is met, and so forth.	In other words, candidates within the scope of admission will be lined up according to the total score, when the score does not reach the first major volunteer admission score line, then see whether the second major volunteer admission score line is reached, and so on until the admission to the last major volunteer, there is no grade difference between
所谓“专业级差”，是院校在安排考生专业时，按招生章程中公布的一个或几个分数值，来确定选报不同专业志愿考生的录取专业，这种分数值就是“专业级差”。	“Major point deductions”, as they are called, are when universities apply one or several values calculated through a formula published in the “Admission Guidelines” to determine a student’s admission in a particular selected major; this value is called a “major point deductions”.	The so-called "professional grade difference" is the number of points announced in the admissions charter to determine the number of students selected to volunteer in different majors, which is the "professional grade difference."	The so-called "professional grade difference" is when universities arrange candidates for major, according to the admission charter published one or several score values, to determine the selection of different professional volunteer candidates for admission major, this score value is "professional grade difference."
也就是院校在录取考生第一专业志愿和非第一专业志愿时的分数差额，各专业志愿间级差分数，如3分、2分、1分等。	This refers to the point deduction that occurs between the student’s preferred major and another major, expressed by a point value, such as 3 points, 2 points, or 1 point.	The difference is the difference between the scores of the first professional volunteer and the non-first professional volunteer, the difference between the scores of each professional volunteer, such as 3, 2 and 1.	That is, the difference in the score between the first professional volunteer and the first professional volunteer, the difference between the professional volunteer scores, such as 3 points, 2 points, 1 point.
举例来说。	Consider this example:	Take, for example.	For example.
假设学生小明报考A高校，考了560分，其专业志愿分别为：计算机、国际贸易、自动化、机械工程、电子商务，A高校的专业录取实行专业级差的办法，级差分为2分、1分、1分、0分。	Xiaoming, a student, applies to University A with an NCEE score of 560 and major preferences listed in this order: Computing, International Trade, Automation, Mechanical Engineering, and E-commerce, after which University A applies major point deductions of 2, 1, 1, and 0 points.	Assuming that students apply to A university, they have 560 points. Their professional volunteers are: computer, international trade, automation, mechanical engineering, e-commerce, and the professional admission of A university has a professional grade difference method. The difference is divided into 2 points, 1 point, 1 point and 0 points.	Assuming that the student Xiao Ming applied for the A college and took the exam with 560 points, their professional volunteers were: computer, international trade, automation, mechanical engineering, e-commerce. The professional grade difference is divided into 2 points, 1 point, 1 point and 0 points.
在进行专业分配时，如果小明的第一专业志愿符合专业录取要求且专业有计划余额，那么小明被录取到“计算机”专业；若计算机未被录取，则他的分数将会被减去2分，按558分的成绩同第一专业志愿报考“国际贸易”的考生排序，确定是否符合专业录取条件；倘若仍不能满足，分数再减去1分(即557分)进行第三专业志愿“自动化”的录取；若依旧不能满足，分数再被减去1分(即556分)进行第四专业的录取，后续专业如果仍不能满足其专业志愿，将不再减分，以此类推。	When allocating majors, if Xiaoming meets the admission requirements for his first preferred major of Computing and the major has remaining vacancies, he is admitted to the Computing major; if he is not admitted to the Computing major, he is considered for his second preferred major of International Trade with 2 points deducted from his NCEE score, at 558, and his qualifications are considered for that major; if he again fails to qualify, 1 point is deducted (for a total of 557), and he is considered for his third preferred major; if he further fails to qualify, 1 more point is deducted (for a total of 556), and his qualifications are considered for his fourth preferred major, and if he fails to qualify this time, no points are deducted when he is considered for his fifth preferred major, and so on.	In the case of a professional assignment, if the first professional volunteer of Xiaoming meets the professional admission requirements and the professional has a planned balance, Xiaoming is admitted to the "computer" major; if the computer is not accepted, his score will be subtracted by 2 points, ranked according to the score of 558 points with the first professional volunteer registration "international trade" test, to determine whether the professional admission requirements are met; if it is still not satisfied, the score is subtracted by 1 point (or 557 points) for the third professional voluntary "automatic" admission; if it is still not satisfied, the score is subtracted by 1 point (or 556 points) for the fourth professional admission, and if the subsequent professional is not satisfied	At the time of major assignment, if Xiao Ming's first professional volunteer meets the requirements for professional admission and the major has a planned balance, then Xiao Ming is admitted to the "computer" major; if the computer is not accepted, his score will be subtracted by 2 points, according to the score of 558 points with the first professional volunteer candidate for "international trade," to determine whether they meet the requirements for professional admission; if still not met, the score is subtracted by 1 point (i.e. 557 points) for the third professional volunteer "automated" admission; if still not met, the score is subtracted by 1 point (i.e. 556 points) for admission to the fourth major, if the subsequent major still does not meet its professional
不同大学专业级差设置不同	Different universities have different point deductions	Different University Professional Grades Set Differently	Different university level settings
随着平行志愿的普及，现在很多高校都已经取消了专业级差，但今年仍有部分高校还保留了这一方法，从各校公布的《招生章程》来看，今年主要有20多所大学设置了专业级差。	As balanced major preferences become more popular, many universities have already stopped using major point deductions, but some universities still use this method, and from the “Admissions Guidelines” published by each school, we know that this year, major point deductions are applied at over 20 universities.	With the introduction of parallel volunteerism, many universities have now abolished the professional grade difference, but some universities have retained the method this year. From the "admissions charter" published by the universities, more than 20 universities have set professional grade difference this year.	With the popularity of parallel volunteerism, many universities have now abolished the professional grade difference, but this year some universities still retain this method, from the university announced the "Admission Charter," this year, mainly more than 20 universities set professional grade difference.

有的高校在每个专业都设有级差，比如宁夏大学，档案已投到该校的考生，根据考生填报专业志愿的顺序依次递减1分后按分数排序录取。	Some apply the same point deductions to every major, such as Ningxia University, where an applicant can expect to find 1 point deducted for each major in the order of major preference.	Some universities have a grade difference in each major, such as Ningxia University, and the files have been sent to the students of the school, and the students are ranked according to the number of points in the order in which they file their professional volunteers.	Some universities have grade differences in each major, such as Ningxia University, files have been sent to the candidates at the school, according to the order in which candidates fill out their professional volunteer, decreasing by 1 point and then sorted by score.
而有的大学在不同的专业之间，设置了不同的专业级差。	Other universities use different fixed point values for different universities.	And there are universities that set different professional grades between different majors.	And some universities set different grades between different majors.
比如集美大学，专业志愿级差总分值为4分，即第一专业志愿与其他专业志愿级差为3分，其他专业志愿间不设级差，视为平行志愿，其他专业志愿与调剂专业志愿间专业级差为1分。	Jimei University, for example, applies a total deduction of 4 points, meaning there is a difference of 3 points between a student’s first preferred major and other preferred majors, among preferred majors after the first there is no further deduction by preference (meaning they receive equal deductions), and there is a 1 point difference between preferred majors after the first and non-preferred majors.	For example, at Jimei University, the total difference between professional volunteer level is 4 points, that is, the difference between first professional volunteer and other professional volunteer level is 3 points.	For example, Jimei University, the total score of professional volunteer grade difference is 4 points, that is, the first professional volunteer and other professional volunteer grade difference is 3 points, there is no grade difference between other professional volunteers, considered as parallel volunteer, other professional volunteer and conditioning professional volunteer grade difference is 1 point.

疫情期间，外出务工困难，为帮助在档困难职工缓解生活压力，云南省总安排1300余万元送温暖资金，按照全国级在档困难职工每户2000元、省级在档困难职工每户1500元标准，对6000余户全国级和1000余户省级在档困难职工实施专项送温暖慰问活动。	During the epidemic, seeking work outside the home has been difficult, so to help alleviate pressure on the livelihoods of the employment-challenged, the Yunnan Province Central Party Committee has arranged a total of 13 million yuan in “Delivering Comfort” aid, providing 2,000 yuan to every household in the national employment-challenged database and 1,500 yuan to every household in the provincial employment-challenged database, aid that reached a total of 6,000 employment-challenged households nationally and 1,000 employment-challenged households in the province through the special program.	During the outbreak of the epidemic, in order to help the difficult workers in the stage to relieve the pressure of life, Yunnan Province has arranged a total of more than 13 million yuan to send warm funds, in accordance with the national level in the standard of 2,000 yuan per household in the stage of hardship workers, and the provincial level in the stage of hardship workers 1500 yuan per household.	During the epidemic, it was difficult for workers to go abroad. In order to help workers in difficult positions relieve the pressure of life, Yunnan Province arranged more than 13 million yuan to send warm funds, according to the standard of 2,000 yuan per household for workers in difficult positions at the national level and 1,500 yuan per household for workers in difficult positions at the provincial level.
同时，省总与人社部门和智联招聘等各类互联网招聘平台对接，将招聘信息推送给困难职工，并提供就业咨询、就业指导等服务。	At the same time, the Yunnan Province Central Party Committee, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, zhaopin.com, and other online job recruitment sites worked together to push job recruitment information to the employment-challenged, provide employment consulting and guidance, and provide other services.	At the same time, the province has docked with various Internet recruitment platforms such as the people's department and Zhilian recruitment, pushing recruitment information to difficult workers and providing employment advice and career guidance services.	At the same time, the Provincial General Manager connects with various Internet recruitment platforms such as human resources departments and Zhilian recruitment, pushes recruitment information to difficult workers, and provides employment advice and career guidance services.
过渡到为人父母的时期是新任父母们面临的最紧张的调适期之一，无论是与个体自我的关系还是与他者的关系。针对这种过渡时期的代际关系之间的双向关联的研究非常有限，而且相互关系的复杂性也会根据生活居住情境的不同而变化。本研究旨在探索（1）过渡为家长期间，夫妻婚姻关系和与对方父母的冲突两者之间的双向关联性，以及（2）和父亲同住对上述关系的调适影响作用。本文的研究对象是359名已婚母亲，采用了三波前瞻性长期性研究设计。使用二元调整量表和斯特赖克调整清单量表来评估婚姻关系以及与对方父母的冲突关系。研究相互关系时使用的是交叉时滞平面分析，确定这些关系是否随着生活情境的不同而呈现出不同的模式时使用的是多群组分析。两个交叉－时滞模型表明，在怀孕中期至后期，婚内问题和与对方父母的冲突之间存在着双向关系。同时，多群组分析表明，在妊娠期间与父母同住的受试组中，与对方父母的冲突会引发婚内问题；而不与父母同住的受试组中，在怀孕后期到产后期，与对方父亲之间的关系冲突可能强化婚姻问题。这些研究发现揭示了代际冲突的交叉时滞关联性。医疗保健专业人员有必要确保在过渡为父母的过程中，代际关系是积极有利的。本研究丰富了我们对于和父亲同住这个因素对婚姻关系的作用的认知，并能指导基于特定文化的多维度干预方式的未来发展。	The transition to parenthood is one of the most stressful intra- and interpersonal adjustment periods for new parents.Bidirectional associations among intergenerational relationships during the transition to parenthood have received limited attention, and the complexity of reciprocal relationships varies in accordance with living arrangements.The objectives of this study were to explore (1) the bidirectional associations between marital relationships and conflicts with in-laws during the transition to parenthood and (2) the moderation of patrilineal coresidence on the aforementioned relationships.A three-wave prospective longitudinal design was adopted for 359 married mothers.The Dyadic Adjustment Scale and Stryker Adjustment Checklist were used to assess marital relationships and conflicts with parents-in-law.Cross-lagged panel analysis was applied to examine reciprocal relationships, and multigroup analyses were employed to determine whether these relationships exhibited different patterns in accordance with the individuals' living arrangements.The two cross-lagged models revealed the presence of a bidirectional relationship between marital distress and conflicts with parents-in-law during the mid- to late pregnancy stages.Meanwhile, the multigroup analyses suggested that conflicts with parents-in-law triggered marital distress during pregnancy in the coresidence group, whereas conflicts with fathers-in-law could intensify marital distress during late pregnancy to the postpartum period in the noncoresidence group.These findings shed light on cross-lagged associations with intergenerational conflicts.Healthcare professionals need to ensure that intergenerational relationships are positive during the transition to parenthood.This study enriches our understanding of the effect of patrilineal coresidence and can guide the future development of interventions based on culturally specific multidimensional approaches.	The transition to parenthood is one of the most stressful adjustment periods for new parents, be it with the individual self or with others.Research on the two-way relationship between this transitional intergenerational relationship is limited, and the complexity of the relationship varies according to the living-in-residence context.The purpose of the study is to explore (1) the two-way correlation between marital relationships and conflict with the other parent during the transition to parenthood, and (2) the effect of living with the father on the adjustment of the relationship.This paper looked at 359 married mothers, using three-wave forward-looking long-term study designs.The binary adjustment scale and the Strik adjustment list scale were used to assess marital relationships and conflicting relationships with each other's parents.Interrelationships are studied using intersectional time-lag plane analysis, and multicluster analysis is used to determine whether these relationships present different patterns depending on the life context.Two intersectional time-lag models show a two-way relationship between marital problems and conflict with each other's parents in the middle to late stages of pregnancy.At the same time, a multicluster analysis showed that conflict with the other parent in the subject group, who lived with the parent during pregnancy, could cause marital problems, while conflict with the father in the subject group, who did not live with the parent, could reinforce marital problems in the latter part of the pregnancy toThese findings reveal the intersecting time-lag correlations of intergenerational conflict.Health care professionals need to ensure that intergenerational relationships are positively beneficial in the transition to parenthood.This study enriches our understanding of the role of living with one's father in marital relationships and can guide the future development of culturally specific, multidimensional interventions.	The transition to parenthood is one of the most stressful adjustment periods new parents face, both with their individual selves and with others.Research into two-way intergenerational relationships during such transitions is very limited, and the complexity of interrelationships varies depending on the context in which they live.The aim of this study is to explore (1) the two-way correlation between marital relationships and conflicts with each other's parents during the transition to parenthood, and (2) the adaptive influence of living with the father on these relationships.The paper studied 359 married mothers using a three-wave prospective long-term study design.Use the Binary Adjustment Scale and Strike Adjustment Checklist Scale to assess marital relationships and conflicting relationships with each other's parents.Interrelationships are studied using cross-lag plane analysis, and multi-group analysis is used to determine whether these relationships exhibit different patterns depending on life situations.Two cross-lag models show a two-way relationship between marital problems and conflict with each other's parents in the middle to late stages of pregnancy.At the same time, the multi-group analysis showed that conflict with each other's parents during pregnancy could lead to marital problems, while conflict with each other's father during late pregnancy and late childbirth could reinforce marital problems in those who did not.These findings reveal intersectional time-lag correlations between generational conflicts.There is a need for health care professionals to ensure that intergenerational relationships are positively beneficial during the transition to parenthood.This research enriches our understanding of the role of living with fathers in marital relationships and can guide the future development of multi-dimensional interventions based on specific cultures.
线性回归模型被广泛应用于精神卫生和卫生服 务相关研究。然而，经典线性回归分析是假设该数据 为正态分布的，但是很多研究所获得的数据并不符合 这种假设。解决该问题的方法之一是采用不要求数据 为正态分布的半参数模型。但是，半参数模型对离散 数据相当敏感，因此在处理包含离散值的数据时产生 的估计值是不可靠的。在这种情况下，一些研究者在 删减这些极端值后再进行分析，但是，删减数据的事 先法则（ad-hoc rules）是基于主观标准的，所以不同 的调整方法就会产生不同的结果。等级回归为处理包 括离散值的非正态分布数据提供了更为客观的方法。本文采用虚拟和实际数据来阐述这个非常有用的处理 离散值的回归方法，并与采用经典回归模型和半参数 回归模型所得出的结果进行比较。	Linear regression models are widely used in mental health and related health services research.However, the classic linear regression analysis assumes that the data are normally distributed, an assumption that is not met by the data obtained in many studies.One method of dealing with this problem is to use semi-parametric models, which do not require that the data be normally distributed.But semi-parametric models are quite sensitive to outlying observations, so the generated estimates are unreliable when study data includes outliers.In this situation, some researchers trim the extreme values prior to conducting the analysis, but the ad-hoc rules used for data trimming are based on subjective criteria so different methods of adjustment can yield different results.Rank regression provides a more objective approach to dealing with non-normal data that includes outliers.This paper uses simulated and real data to illustrate this useful regression approach for dealing with outliers and compares it to the results generated using classical regression models and semi-parametric regression models.	Linear regression models are widely used in studies related to mental health and health services.However, classical linear regression analysis assumes the normal distribution of the data, but many studies do not match this assumption.One way to solve this problem is to adopt a half-parameter model that does not require the data to be normal distributions.However, the semi-parameter model is quite sensitive to discrete data and therefore the estimates generated when processing data containing discrete values are not reliable.In this case, some researchers can then delete these extreme values, but the ad-hoc rules are based on subjective criteria, so different adjustment methods produce different results.Graded regression provides a more objective way to process non-regular distributive data, including discrete values.This paper uses virtual and actual data to illustrate this very useful regression method for dealing with discrete values and to compare the results obtained using classical regression models and semi-parameter regression models.	Linear regression models are widely used in research related to mental health and health services.However, classical linear regression analysis assumes that the data are normally distributed, but the data obtained in many studies do not conform to this assumption.One way to solve this problem is to use semi-parametric models that do not require data to be normally distributed.However, semi-parametric models are quite sensitive to discrete data, so estimates produced when processing data containing discrete values are unreliable.In this case, some researchers analyze these extremes after deleting them, but ad-hoc rules are based on subjective criteria, so different adjustment methods produce different results.Hierarchical regression provides a more objective approach to processing non-normally distributed data including discrete values.This paper uses virtual and real data to illustrate this very useful regression method for dealing with discrete values and compares the results with classical regression models and semi-parametric regression models.
低收入伴侣的关系教育（RE）干预的结果有好也有坏。对于经历了积极变化的伴侣而言，项目模型的哪些方面起到了积极促进变化的作用尚不清楚。很多低收入的伴侣参加政府资助的关系教育，同时对社会和社区的支持等方面的资源获取和利用却十分有限。项目模型通常提供了相关的资源来补充关系教育中的具体技巧训练。本文研究的是收入，社会支持，家庭功能三者之间的关系，也研究社会支持对家庭功能结果的调和作用。研究对象为参加关系教育的856对低收入伴侣，来自多种族。分析包括三个独立的二元模型，用于研究相关的处在在基线的元素之间的关联性，和也包括立刻跟踪关系教育干预的结果。研究结果显示参与者报告的社会支持和家庭功能之间的关系表现在：(a) 社会支持和和男性、女性的基线家庭功能都有相关性； (b) 男性基线社会支持受女性基线家庭功能影响; (c) 男性和女性的社会支持变化分数对他们自身的家庭功能变化分数有积极影响。但是社会支持并不是家庭功能变化的重要调节因素。关系教育如何实施和相关研究在研究启示部分有所讨论。	Results are mixed for relationship education (RE) interventions with low-income couples.For couples who experienced positive changes, it is not clear what aspects of program models contributed to change.Many low-income couples attend government-funded RE with limited access to social and community resources.Program models often provide related resources complimentary to RE skill-building.We examined the relationship between income, social support, and family functioning for low-income, ethnically diverse couples (N = 856) who attended RE, as well as the mediating effects of social support on family functioning outcomes.Analyses included three separate dyadic models that examined associations among constructs at baseline and immediately following the RE intervention.Results demonstrated relationships between participants' reported social support and family functioning such that (a) social support was associated with baseline family functioning for both men and women; (b) men's baseline social support was influenced by women's baseline family functioning; and (c) men's and women's social support change score had a positive influence on their own family functioning change score.However, social support was not a significant mediator of change in family functioning.Implications for RE practice and research are also discussed.	Relationship education (RE) interventions by low-income partners have had both good and bad outcomes.For partners who have experienced positive change, it is not clear which aspects of the project model have played a positive role in promoting change.Many low-income partners participate in government-funded relationship education, while access to and use of resources, including social and community support, is limited.Project models usually provide relevant resources to complement specific skills training in relationship education.This paper examines the relationship between income, social support, and family function, as well as the role of social support in reconciling family function outcomes.The study looked at 856 pairs of low-income partners who participated in relationship education and came from a multiracial backgroundThe analysis consists of three independent binary models that examine the correlation between the relevant elements at the baseline and also include the immediate tracking of the results of the relational education intervention.The results showed that the relationship between social support and family function reported by the participants was: (a) social support was correlated with both male and female baseline family function; (b) male baseline social support was influenced by female baseline family function; and (c) male and female social support change scores had a positive impact on their own family function change scores.But social support is not an important regulator of changes in family function.How relational education is implemented and related research is discussed in the study revelations section.	Relationship education (RE) interventions for low-income partners have mixed results.For partners who have experienced positive change, it is not clear which aspects of the project model act as positive agents of change.Many low-income partners participate in publicly funded relationship education, while access to and use of resources such as social and community support is limited.Project models often provide relevant resources to complement specific skills training in relationship education.This paper examines the relationship between income, social support, and family function, as well as the mediating effect of social support on family function outcomes.The study looked at 856 low-income couples who participated in relationship education and came from multiracial backgrounds.The analysis consists of three independent binary models used to study correlations between relevant elements at the baseline, and also includes immediate tracking of the results of relational education interventions.The results of the study showed that the relationship between social support and family function reported by participants showed that: (a) social support was correlated with baseline family function for both men and women; (b) male baseline social support was influenced by baseline family function for women; and (c) male and female social support change scores had a positive impact on their own family function change scores.But social support is not an important regulator of changes in family functioning.How relationship education is implemented and related research is discussed in the Study Inspiration section.
信号通路中风险基因的构成可能可以解释酒精依赖风险基因协同的神经生物学作用。识别酒精依赖的风险基因和风险基因通路。我们采用基因富集 (gene-set-rich) 分析方法对酒精依赖进行了基于通路的全基因组关联分析 (GWAS)。在包括1409名欧裔美国人(European-American，EA)酒精依赖者和1518 名EA健康对照者的探索性样本人群中检测了近一百万个基因标志物。此外，将681名非裔美国人 (African-American, AA) 病例和508名AA健康受试者作为重测样本。我们发现了几个与酒精依赖显著相关的可重复的全基因组风险基因和风险通路。在多重比较Bonferroni校正后，“细胞- 细胞外基质相互作用”通路(EA样本中 一些基因和生物信号传导过程可能与酒精依赖的风险相关，本研究的发现为此提供了新的证据。	The organization of risk genes within signaling pathways may provide clues about the converging neurobiological effects of risk genes for alcohol dependence.Identify risk genes and risk gene pathways for alcohol dependence.We conducted a pathway-based genome-wide association study (GWAS) of alcohol dependence using a gene-set-rich analytic approach.Approximately one million genetic markers were tested in the discovery sample which included 1409 European-American (EA) alcohol dependent individuals and 1518 EA healthy comparison subjects.An additional 681 African-American (AA) cases and 508 AA healthy subjects served as the replication sample.We identified several genome-wide replicable risk genes and risk pathways that were significantly associated with alcohol dependence.After applying the Bonferroni correction for multiple testing, the 'cellextracellular matrix interactions' pathway (p<2.0E-4 in EAs) and the PXN gene (which encodes paxillin) (p=3.9E-7 in EAs) within this pathway were the most promising risk factors for alcohol dependence.There were also two nominally replicable pathways enriched in alcohol dependence-related genes in both EAs (0.015≤p≤0.035) and AAs (0.025≤p≤0.050): the 'Na+/Cl- dependent neurotransmitter transporters' pathway and the 'other glycan degradation' pathway.These findings provide new evidence highlighting several genes and biological signaling processes that may be related to the risk for alcohol dependence.	The formation of risk genes in signal pathways may explain the neurobiological role of alcohol-dependent risk gene coordination.Identify risk genes and risk genetic pathways for alcohol dependence.We conducted a pathway-based genome-wide association analysis (GWAS) of alcohol dependence using gene-set-rich analysis.Nearly one million genetic markers were tested in an exploratory sample group that included 1,409 European-American (EA) alcohol-dependent people and 1,518 EA health controllers.In addition, 681 African American (AA) cases and 508 AA healthy subjects were retested.We identified several repeatable genome-wide risk genes and risk pathways that were significantly associated with alcohol dependence.After multiple comparisons of Bonferroni correction, the "cell-cell extracellular matrix interaction" pathway (some of the gene and biosignaling processes in the EA sample may be related to the risk of alcohol dependence) provides new evidence for this finding.	The composition of risk genes in signaling pathways may explain the synergistic neurobiological effects of alcohol dependence risk genes.Identify risk genes and risk gene pathways for alcohol dependence.We performed a pathway-based genome-wide association analysis (GWAS) of alcohol dependence using gene-set-rich analysis.Nearly one million genetic markers were tested in an exploratory sample population that included 1,409 European-American (EA) alcohol addicts and 1,518 EA health controls.In addition, 681 African American (AA) cases and 508 healthy AA subjects were retested.We identified several repeatable genome-wide risk genes and risk pathways that are significantly associated with alcohol dependence.The findings of this study provide new evidence for the "cell-extracellular matrix interaction" pathway (some genetic and biological signaling processes in EA samples may be associated with alcohol dependence risk) after multiple comparisons with Bonferroni correction.
含利妥昔单抗化疗方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤致急性肺损伤患者26例临床分析. 通过总结分析弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（DLBCL）患者应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤的临床特点、治疗及预后，提高对该病的认识并指导临床治疗。选择本院2013年1月至2018年9月收治的26例应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案并出现急性肺损伤的DLBCL患者，对其临床特征、影像学表现、化疗疗程、治疗效果及预后进行分析。患者主要临床症状为发热、咳嗽及胸闷; 其中12例患者低氧血症, 3例患者I型呼吸衰竭; 胸部CT以双肺弥漫性磨玻璃影为主要表现，部分患者合并少量胸腔积液; 发病时间主要分布在2-4个疗程, 症状出现距方案中利妥昔单抗输注时间在8-49 d; 25例患者治疗有效后日常生活无明显受限, 1例患者治疗无效死亡。弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤早期无典型临床症状, 早期发现及早期激素治疗对取得良好治疗效果至关重要。	To summarize and analyze the clinical characteristics, treatment and prognosis of acute lung injury in patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) after chemotherapy with rituximab chemotherapy, so as to improve the understanding of the disease and guide the clinical treatment.Twenty-Six patients with DLBCL were treated with rituximab chemotherapy and developed to acute lung injury in Third Hospital of Peking University from January 2013 to September 2018 were selected.The clinical features, imaging findings, chemotherapy course, therapeutic effect and prognosis were analyzed.The main clinical symptoms of patients were fever, cough and chest tightness, among which 12 patients showed hypoxia and 3 patients showed respiratory failure type I.The mainly manifested chest CT was diffusive glass grinding in both lungs, and some patients were complicated with a small amount of pleural effusion.The onset chemotherapy time was mainly distributed in 2 to 4 courses, the time between the onset of symptoms and the infusion of rituximab was 8 to 49 days.25 patients shows no obvious limitation in daily life after effective treatment, and 1 patient died of ineffective treatment.There are no typical clinical symptoms in the early stage of acute lung injury after rituximab chemotherapy in DLBCL.Early detection and early hormone therapy are very important to achieve good therapeutic effect.	26 clinical analyses of patients with diffuse B-cell lymphoma with acute pulmonary injury due to treatment of dilute B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL). By summarizing the clinical characteristics, treatment and prognosis of acute pulmonary injury after application of dilute B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) patients.From January 2013 to September 2018, we selected 26 DLBCL patients with Ritalin monoantimicrobial regimen and acute lung injury to conduct an analysis of their clinical characteristics, imaging performance, chemotherapy regimen, efficacy and prognosis.The main clinical symptoms are fever, cough and chest tightness; 12 cases of hypoxia, 3 cases of type I respiratory failure; CT in the chest is mainly manifested by the double lung diffuse grinding glass shadow, some patients combine a small amount of chest cavity fluid; the onset of the disease is mainly distributed in 2-4 treatments, the symptoms appear distance from the plan of single anti-infusion time in 8-49 d; 25 patients have no obvious limitations in daily life after treatment, and 1 patient has no effective treatment.Diffuse B-cell lymphoma After the application of Rituximab monoantimicrobial regimen, there are no typical clinical symptoms of acute lung injury early. Early detection and early hormone treatment are essential to achieve good	Clinical analysis of 26 patients with acute pulmonary injury caused by diffuse large B cell lymphoma (DLBCL) using chemotherapy regimen containing rituximab to improve understanding of the disease and guide clinical treatment.From January 2013 to September 2018, 26 DLBCL patients with acute pulmonary injury treated with chemotherapy regimen containing rituximab were selected to analyze their clinical characteristics, imaging performance, chemotherapy regimen, treatment effectiveness and prognosis.The main clinical symptoms of patients are fever, cough and chest tightness; 12 patients with hypoxemia, 3 patients with type I respiratory failure; chest CT is mainly manifested by double lung diffuse grinding glass shadow, some patients combined with a small amount of chest effusion; the onset time is mainly distributed in 2-4 courses of treatment, symptoms appear within 8-49 d from the time of infusion of rituximab in the plan; 25 patients have no obvious limitation of daily life after effective treatment, 1 patient died of ineffective treatmentDiffuse large B-cell lymphoma Early atypical clinical symptoms of acute lung injury following chemotherapy regimens containing rituximab, early detection and early hormone therapy are essential for good therapeutic outcomes.
探讨影响多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者总生存期的非遗传学相关因素。回顾性分析2011年11月至2019年10月就诊于南京医科大学附属江宁医院血液科的具有完整随访资料的51例MM患者的临床资料。对其非遗传学影响因素进行分析，以总生存时间作为预后评价标准。用Kaplan-Meier法进行生存分析，并采用Log-rank检验对预后相关影响因素进行单因素分析，采用Cox回归模型进行多因素分析。51例患者中，男29例，女22例，随访至2019年12月，死亡21例，存活30例。单因素分析显示，患者年龄、疾病分期、规范治疗、新药的使用、维持治疗、高钙血症、球蛋白、白蛋白和血红蛋白等因素与患者的总生存时间有关，年龄＜65岁、ISS分期Ⅰ和Ⅱ期、规范治疗、使用新药、血钙正常或低于正常水平、球蛋白正常或低于正常水平以及白蛋白≥35 g/L或血红蛋白≥100 g/L的患者的总生存期明显延长（P＜0.05）。多因素分析显示，是否维持治疗、血钙≥2.6 mmol/L及血红蛋白＜100 g/L是影响MM预后的独立危险因素。血钙≥2.6 mmol/L、血红蛋白＜100 g/L及不进行规律维持治疗的患者预后不良。	To explore the non-genetic factors of overall survival in patients with multiple myeloma (MM).Kaplan-Meier survival curve, Log-rank test and Cox regression model were used to carry out univariate and multivariate retrospective analysis on clinical and laboratory parameters of 51 patients who were newly diagnosed with MM and had complete follow-up data in the Department of Hematology, the Affiliated Jiangning Hospital of Nanjing Medical University from November 2011 to October 2019.Fifty-one patients included 29 males and 22 females.Followed up to December 2019, 21 cases died and 30 cases survived.The univariate analysis showed that the overall survival time of the patients was influenced by age, disease stage, standard treatment, new drugs, maintenance treatment, hypercalcemia, globulin, albumin, and hemoglobin.The overall survival time of patients with age <65 years old, ISS stage I and II, standardized treatment, new drugs, normal or below normal blood calcium, normal or below normal globulin, albumin ≥35 g/L or hemoglobin ≥100 g/L was prolonged significantly (P<0.05).The multivariate analysis showed that maintenance treatment, hypercalcemia (≥2.6 mmol/L), and hemoglobin (<100 g/L) were independent risk factors influencing the prognosis of MM patients.Patients with blood calcium ≥2.6 mmol/L, hemoglobin <100 g/L, and who do not undergo regular maintenance therapy show a poor prognosis.	Exploring non-genetic related factors that influence the total survival of patients with multiple myeloma (MM).Retrospective analysis of clinical data of 51 MM patients with complete follow-up data in the hematology department of Jiangning Hospital, affiliated to Nanjing Medical University, from November 2011 to October 2019.Its non-genetic influencers are analysed for total survival time as a prognostic evaluation criterion.The Kaplan-Meier method is used for survival analysis, and the Log-rank test is used for single-factor analysis of prognostic relevant influencers and multi-factor analysis using the Cox regression model.Of the 51 patients, 29 were men and 22 were women, followed up with 21 deaths and 30 survivors by December 2019.The single-factor analysis showed that the age of the patient, disease staging, standard treatment, use of new drugs, maintenance treatment, hypercalcemia, globulin, alboprotein and haemoglobin were related to the total survival time of the patient, with the age of 65 years, ISS staging and, standard treatment, use of new drugs, normal or below-normal levels of calcium, normal or below-normal levels of globulin, and the total survival time of alboprotein 35 g / L orMulti-factor analysis showed that maintenance treatment, blood calcium 2.6mmol / L and hemoglobin 100 g / L were independent risk factors affecting MM prognosis.Patients with blood calcium 2.6mmol / L, haemoglobin 100 g / L and patients without regular maintenance treatment have poor prognosis.	Explore non-genetically related factors that influence overall survival in patients with multiple myeloma (MM).Retrospective analysis of clinical data of 51 MM patients with complete follow-up data at the Hematology Department of Jiangning Hospital affiliated to Nanjing Medical University from November 2011 to October 2019.Non-genetic influencers are analyzed using total survival time as a prognostic evaluation criterion.The Kaplan-Meier method is used for survival analysis, and the log-rank test is used for single-factor analysis of prognosis-related influencing factors, and the Cox regression model is used for multi-factor analysis.Of the 51 patients, 29 were men and 22 were women, followed up to December 2019, 21 died and 30 survived.The single-factor analysis showed that the total survival time of patients was significantly extended in patients with age 65 years, ISS stages and, standard treatment, use of new drugs, normal or below normal levels of blood calcium, normal or below normal levels of globulin and albumin 35 g / L or hemoglobin 100 g / L (P 0.05).Multi-factor analysis shows that maintenance therapy, calcium 2.6mmol / L and hemoglobin 100g / L are independent risk factors affecting MM prognosis.Poor prognosis in patients with blood calcium 2.6mmol / L and hemoglobin 100g / L without regular maintenance therapy.
摘要: 本文曾在2019年剑桥眼科专题研讨会进行讲演。HS Dua从Dompe、Croma、Santen、Allergan和Thea获得酬金和差旅费, 并拥有NuVision biotherapies和GlaxoSmithKline的股份。NuVision Biotherapies是文中提到的Omnigen的制造商。化学性眼损伤 (Chemical eye injury, CEI) 是严重威胁视力和生命的急症, 通常发生在家里或工作场所, 前者一般较轻, 而后者较重, 并且双眼受累。严重的工作意外伤害还涉及其他身体部位的损伤, 可能与吸入或吞入化学物质有关。碱烧伤导致组织皂化反应并且渗透组织的程度深。酸损伤会导致组织快速凝固, 阻止渗透并使损伤局限。刺激性物质——如酒精可造成表层上皮剥脱。严重的化学损伤会影响整个眼前节结构, 造成虹膜、瞳孔及晶状体异常。眼压受到的影响不一, 可能会降低或升高, 或从一开始的眼压情况迅速转变为另一种。脉络膜视网膜血管病变被认为继发于眼前节炎症, 而不是因为CEI的直接作用。与结构及功能相关的最终结果取决于致伤物、暴露时间、治疗手段及其干预的速度。在确定双眼PH值后, 通过大量和持久的眼部冲洗以防止进一步损伤, 以及寻找和清除所有微粒物质是关键。其他治疗原则包括对眼部的全面评估、控制炎症、促进愈合以及后遗症和并发症的预防及管理。眼内压易被忽视, 但必须对其进行评估和管理。管理通常需要多学科的合作。	Chemical eye injury (CEI) is an acute emergency which can threaten sight and life.These commonly occur at home or the workplace with the former being generally mild and the latter more severe and bilateral.Major workplace accidents involve other parts of the body and can be associated with inhalation or ingestion of the chemical.Alkali injuries cause damage by saponification of tissue and deeper penetration as a consequence.Acid injuries cause rapid coagulation of tissue, which impedes penetration and limits damage.Irritants such as alcohols, cause superficial epithelial denudation.Severe chemical insult can affect all anterior segment structures causing iris, pupil and lens abnormalities.Eye pressure is variably affected and can be low or high or start as one and rapidly change to the other.Chorioretinal changes in the form of vasculopathy are seen and ascribed to be secondary to anterior segment inflammation rather than due to the direct effect of CEI.Final outcome related to structure and function is determined by the injurious agent, duration of exposure, nature of treatment and the rapidity with which it is instituted.Prevention of further damage by profuse and prolonged eye wash, after ascertaining pH of both eyes, together with exploration and removal of all particulate matter, is the key.Other management principles include a complete and thorough assessment, control of inflammation, facilitation of healing and prevention and management of sequelae and complications.Intraocular pressure is often forgotten and must be assessed and managed.Management often requires a multidisciplinary approach.	Abstract: This article was presented at the Cambridge Eye Symposium 2019.HS Dua receives honorariums and travel expenses from Dompe, Croma, Santen, Allergan and Thea and owns shares in NuVision biotherapies and GlaxoSmithKline.NuVision Biotherapies is the manufacturer of Omnigen mentioned in the article.Chemical eye injury (CEI) is a serious threat to vision and life, usually occurring at home or in the workplace, where the former is generally lighter, while the latter is heavier and suffering from both eyes.Serious work accident injuries also involve damage to other body parts that may be linked to inhalation or ingestion of chemicals.Alkaline burns cause tissue saponization to react and penetrate deep into the tissue.Acid damage causes tissue to solidify quickly, preventing penetration and limiting the damage.Stimulating substances - such as alcohol can cause superficial peeling.Severe chemical damage can affect the entire immediate ganglion structure, causing iris, pupil and lens abnormalities.The effects of eye pressure vary, and may be reduced or increased, or rapidly shift from initial eye pressure to another.Vascular lesions in the retina of the chorus are thought to be secondary to frontal inflammation and not due to the direct role of CEI.The end result associated with structure and function depends on the injured person, the time of exposure, the means of treatment and the speed of interventionAfter determining the pH of both eyes, rinsing through a large and persistent eye area to prevent further damage, as well as finding and removing all particulate matter, is key.Other treatment principles include a comprehensive assessment of the eye, control of inflammation, promotion of healing and prevention and management of sequelae and complications.They are easy to ignore, but they must be assessed and managed.Management usually requires multidisciplinary cooperation.	Abstract: This article was presented at the 2019 Cambridge Ophthalmology Symposium.HS Dua receives fees and travel expenses from Dompe, Croma, Santen, Allergan and Thea and owns shares in NuVision biotherapies and GlaxoSmithKline.NuVision Biotherapies is the manufacturer of Omnigen mentioned in the article.Chemical eye injury (CEI) is a serious vision and life threatening emergency, usually occurring at home or at work. The former is usually milder and the latter is heavier and involves both eyes.Serious work accident injuries also involve damage to other parts of the body and may be related to inhalation or ingestion of chemicals.Alkali burns cause tissue saponification and penetrate deep into the tissue.Acid damage causes tissue to solidify quickly, preventing penetration and limiting damage.Irritant substances such as alcohol can cause superficial epithelium peeling.Severe chemical damage can affect the entire annular joint structure, resulting in iris, pupils and lens abnormalities.Eye pressure is affected differently and may decrease or increase, or change quickly from one condition to another.Choroid retinopathy is thought to be secondary to eye joint inflammation, not due to direct action of CEI.The final outcome related to structure and function depends on the cause of injury, exposure time, treatment and the speed of intervention.After determining the eye pH, extensive and persistent eye flushing to prevent further damage as well as locating and removing all particulate matter is key.Other treatment principles include comprehensive assessment of the eye area, control of inflammation, promotion of healing and prevention and management of sequelae and complications.Intraocular pressure is often overlooked but must be evaluated and managed.Management often requires multidisciplinary cooperation.
细胞焦亡是一种依赖半胱氨酸天冬氨酸蛋白酶（Caspase-1/4/5/11）的程序性死亡方式，主要特征是炎症小体激活，细胞膜破裂，形成孔洞，细胞内容物释放。细胞焦亡作为一种新型的细胞死亡方式广泛参与呼吸系统的疾病，如肺纤维化、急性肺损伤/呼吸窘迫综合征、支气管发育不良、慢性阻塞性肺疾病和哮喘等。本文综述细胞焦亡的发生机制以及在不同呼吸系统疾病中的作用，以期为呼吸系统疾病的治疗提供新思路。	Pyroptosis is a programmed death mode dependent on Caspase-1/4/5/11, which is caused by activation of inflammasome, accompanied by cell membrane rupture, pore formation and cell content release.As a new type of cell death, it is widely involved in respiratory diseases, such as pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung injury, bronchopulmonary dysplasia, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and asthma.This article reviews the mechanism of pyroptosis and its role in different respiratory diseases, in order to provide new ideas for the treatment of respiratory diseases.	Cellular scorching is a procedural form of death that relies on a cysteine aspartic acid aspartate protease (Caspase-1 / 4 / 5 / 11), characterized by small inflammatory cell activation, cell membrane rupture, hole formation, andCellular scorch death is a novel form of cell death involving a wide range of respiratory diseases such as pulmonary fibrosis, acute pulmonary injury / respiratory distress syndrome, stunted bronchodynamic development, chronic obstructive pulmonThis paper provides an overview of the mechanisms by which cell scorch occurs and its role in different respiratory diseases, with a view to providing new ideas for the treatment of respiratory diseases.	Cell apoptosis is a procedural form of death that relies on cysteine aspartate protease (Caspase-1 / 4 / 5 / 11) and is characterized by inflammatory cell activation, cell membrane rupture, formation of cavities, and release of cell content.Cellular apoptosis is widely involved in respiratory diseases such as pulmonary fibrosis, acute pulmonary injury / respiratory distress syndrome, bronchial dysplasia, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and asthma as a novel form of cell death.This paper reviews the mechanism of cell scorching and its role in different respiratory diseases with a view to providing new ideas for the treatment of respiratory diseases.
探讨并分析多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者在硼替佐米化疗期间发生带状疱疹的危险因素。收集2015年1月到2019年１月于甘肃省人民医院接受以硼替佐米为主的化疗方案治疗的85例MM患者的临床资料, 依据是否发生带状疱疹分为病例组和对照组。对其临床特点、治疗和转归及发生带状疱疹的危险因素进行回顾性分析。85例使用硼替佐米化疗的MM患者中, 20例发生了带状疱疹, 发生率约为23.5%。单因素分析显示, 年龄≥65岁、治疗前淋巴细胞减少、治疗前中性粒细胞减少、ECOG评分≥2、使用环磷酰胺、未给予预防性抗病毒治疗与带状疱疹发生相关（P＜0.05）。多因素logistic回归分析显示, 治疗前淋巴细胞减少、环磷酰胺的使用、未给予预防性抗病毒治疗是发生带状疱疹独立的危险因素（P＜0.05）。MM患者带状疱疹发生率高, 治疗前淋巴细胞减少、环磷酰胺的使用、未给予预防性抗病毒治疗是发生带状疱疹重要的危险因素, 临床医生需引起重视。	To explore and analyze the risk factors of herpes zoster in patients with multiple myeloma (MM) during the chemotherapy with bortezomib.Clinical data of 85 MM patients treated with bontizomib from January 2015 to January 2019 were selected and divided into case group and control group accroding to the occurred of herpes zoster.The clinical characteristic, treatment outcome and related factor of herpes zoster were retrospective analyzed.Twenty of the 85 patients with MM treated with bortezomib developed herpes zoster occurred (23.5%).Single-factor analysis showed that age≥65 years, lymphocytopenia occurred before treatment, neutropenia occurred before treatment, ECOG score≥2, application of cyclophosphamide, absence of preventive antiviral therapy were associated with the genesis of herpes zoster (P＜0.05).Multivariate logistic regression analysis showed that lymphocytopenia occurred before treatment, the application of cyclophosphamide and the absence of preventive antiviral therapy were the independent risk factors for herpes zoster (P＜0.05).The incidence of herpes zoster is high in the multiple myeloma patients treated with bortezomib.Lymphocytopenia occurred before treatment, the application of cyclophosphamide, and the absence of prophylactic antiviral therapy are the important risk factors for herpes zoster, for which the clinicians should attach great importance.
