shepherdRetrospective analysis of their clinical characteristics, treatment and metastases and risk factors for the occurrence of herpes zoster.Of the 85 MM patients who had used imidazole-based chemotherapy, 20 had shingles, with a prevalence of about 23.5 per cent.A single-factor analysis showed that age 65, pre-treatment reduction of lymphocytes, pre-treatment reduction of neutrophils, ECOG score 2, use of cyclophosphamide, failure to give preventive antiviral treatment was associated with herpes zoster (PMulti-factor logistic regression analysis showed that pre-treatment reduction of lymphocytes, use of cyclophosphamide, and failure to give preventive antiviral treatment were independent risk factors for herpes zoster (P 0.05The high incidence of herpes in MM patients, the reduction of pre-treatment lymphocytes, the use of cyclophosphamide, and the failure to give preventive antiviral treatment are important risk factors for the occurrence of herpes z	Study and analysis of risk factors for shingles during bortezomib chemotherapy in patients with multiple myeloma (MM).We collected clinical data on 85 MM patients treated with bortezomib-based chemotherapy regimen at Gansu Provincial People's Hospital from January 2015 to January 2019, divided into case groups and control groups based on whether or not shingles occurred.Retrospective analysis of clinical characteristics, treatment and fate and risk factors for shingles.Of the 85 MM patients treated with bortezomib, 20 developed shingles, with an incidence rate of about 23.5.One-factor analysis showed that age 65 years, pre-treatment lymphocytopenia, pre-treatment neutropenia, ECOG score 2, use of cyclophosphamide, absence of preventive antiviral therapy were associated with shingles (P 0.05).Multi-factor logistic regression analysis showed that pre-treatment lymphocytopenia, use of cyclophosphamide, failure to administer preventive antiviral therapy were independent risk factors for shingles (P 0.05).The incidence of shingles in MM patients is high, before treatment of lymphocytopenia, the use of cyclophosphamide, not given preventive antiviral therapy is important risk factors for shingles, clinicians need to pay
成人朗格汉斯组织细胞增多症患者的临床实验特征以及影响预后的因素分析. 观察分析成人朗格汉斯组织细胞增生症（LCH）患者的临床实验特征及预后因素. 回顾性分析2010年1月至2019年8月就诊于本院且经组织病理学确诊的成人LCH患者38例的临床特征和实验室检查特征，并对患者的临床预后进行深入分析. 38例LCH患者中位年龄为41（21-65岁）岁，男女比约为2∶1。38例LCH患者中，出现多系统累及占44.7%，31.6%的患者具有危险器官(肝脏、肺、造血系统或脾脏)累及，最常见受累器官为骨骼（21/38，55.3%），最常见的临床症状为疼痛（19/38，50.0%）。实验室检查显示，贫血、血小板减少、中性粒细胞减少、淋巴细胞减少、单核细胞增多、C反应蛋白升高、血沉升高以及铁蛋白升高的发生率分别为10.5%、2.6%、5.3%、15.8%、28.9%、28.6%（6/21）、55.3%（10/18）及55.3%（9/17）。中位随访时间为53个月，共5例患者死亡。单系统受累患者10年总生存（OS）率为100%，显著优于多系统受累患者（70.1%）（P=0.0078）。无危险器官受累患者的预后显著优于有危险器官受累的患者，患者10年OS率分别为100%和60.6%（P=0.0007）。进一步分析发现，除多系统受累与危险器官受累为不良预后因素外，初诊时外周血单核细胞增多以及铁蛋白升高与较差的预后显著相关. 多系统受累与危险器官受累、初诊时外周血单核细胞增多以及铁蛋白升高是成人LCH患者重要的预后不良因素。	To observe the clinical and laboratory characteristics of adult Langerhans cell histiocytosis(LCH) patients and to analyze the influencing factors of its prognosis.The clinical and laboratory charac-teristics of 38 adult LCH patients treated in our hospital from January 2010 to August 2019 were retrospective analyzed, and the clinical prognosis of the patients was analyzed.The median age of 38 patients was 41 (21-65) years old, and the ratio of male and female was about 2∶1.Among 38 patients, 44.7% (17/38) were involved in multiple systems, and 31.6% (12/38) were involved in high-risk organs (including liver, lung, hematopoietic system or spleen).The bone involvement was the most common (21/38, 55.3%), and the most common clinical symptom was pain (19/38, 50.0%).The result of laboratory showed that anemia (4/38，10.5%), thrombocytopenia (1/38，2.6%), neutropenia (2/38，5.3%), lymphopenia (6/38，15.8%), monocytosis (11/38，28.9%), C-reactive protein increasing (6/21，28.6%), erythrocyte sedimentation rate increasing (10/18, 55.3%), and ferritin protein increasing (9/17, 55.3%).The median follow-up time was 53 months, and a total of 5 patients were died.The 10-year overall survival rate of patients with single-system involvement was 100%, which was significantly higher than that of patients with multiple-system involvement (70.1%) (P=0.0078).The prognosis of patients without risk-organ involvement was better than that of patients with risk-organ involvement (10-year overall survival rate: 100% vs 60.6%) (P=0.0007).Further analysis showed that in addition to multiple-system involvement and risk-organ involvement, the increase of peripheral blood monocyte cells and the increase of ferritin protein were also associated with poorer prognosis of the patients.The multiple system involve-ment and risk-organ involvement, the increasing of monocyte cells and the increasing of ferritin protein were the independent risk factors of adult LCH patients.	Of the 38 cases of LCH, 44.7 had multi-system accumulation, 31.6 had dangerous organs (liver, lungs, hematopoietic system or spleen), the most common organ was bone (21 / 38, 55.3) and the most common clinical symptom was pain (19 / 38, 50.0)Laboratory tests showed rates of anaemia, platelet reduction, neutrophil reduction, lymphocyte reduction, mononucleotide expansion, C-reactive protein increase, blood siltation increase and iron protein increase of 10.5, 2.6, 5.3, 15.8, 28.9, 28.6 (6 / 21), 55.3 (10 /The median follow-up was 53 months, with a total of five patients dying.The overall 10-year survival rate (OS) for single system patients was 100, significantly better than for multi system patients (70.1) (P 0.0078).The prognosis for patients with non-hazardous organs was significantly better than for those with dangerous organs, with a 10-year OS rate of 100 and 60.6 (P 0.000Further analysis found that, in addition to MSA and dangerous organ burden, increased peripheral blood monocytes at first diagnosis and increased ferritin were significantly associated with poor prognosis. MSA was associated with increased peripheral blood monocytes at first diagnosis, increased peripheral blood monocytes at first diagnosis, and increased ferritin at first diagnosis were important progn	Clinical characteristics and prognosis factors of adult patients with Langehans histiocytosis (LCH). Retrospective analysis of clinical characteristics and laboratory characteristics of 38 adult patients with LCH diagnosed with histopathology at our hospital between January 2010 and August 2019. In-depth analysis of clinical prognosis. The median age of 38 patients with LCH was 41 (21-65 years old), with a ratio of 2: 1 men to women.Of the 38 patients with LCH, 44.7 had multisystem involvement, 31.6 had involvement of dangerous organs (liver, lungs, hematopoietic system or spleen), the most common organ involved was bone (21 / 38, 55.3) and the most common clinical symptom was pain (19 / 38, 50.0).Laboratory tests showed that rates of anemia, thrombocytopenia, neutropenia, lymphocytopenia, monocytosis, elevated C-reactive protein, elevated blood sedimentation and elevated ferritin were 10.5, 2.6, 5.3, 15.8, 28.9, 28.6 (6 / 21), 55.3 (10 / 18) and 55.3 (9 / 17)The median follow-up time was 53 months and a total of five patients died.The 10-year total survival (OS) rate for single-system patients is 100, significantly better than for multi-system patients (70.1) (P 0.0078).The prognosis of patients with non-hazardous organ involvement was significantly better than that of patients with dangerous organ involvement, with 10-year OS rates of 100 percent and 60.6 percent (P 0.0007), respectivelyFurther analysis found that in addition to multisystem involvement and risk organ involvement as adverse prognostic factors, peripheral blood mononucleosis and ferritin elevation at initial diagnosis were significantly associated with poor prognosis.
从一个人的社会网络对某关系的认可程度已可以预测这种关系的结局。还有一些研究表明，依恋行为可以缓冲各种因素（例如抑郁）对人际关系的负面影响。本研究样本包括858对已婚夫妇，我们在SEM框架内使用行为者-伴侣相互依存模型来探究来自父母和朋友方面的不同意对自己和伴侣的婚姻关系质量的影响。我们还研究每个配偶的依恋行为是否能够减缓这些影响。结果表明，不管男性和女性，某一方本人的依恋行为减轻了父母和朋友的不同意对他们自我报告的关系质量的影响。伴侣的依恋行为减轻了自己朋友对男女自我报告的关系质量的不同意的影响；此外，伴侣的父母和朋友的不同意造成的主要影响在该测试中作用不大。该发现支持的结论是伴侣双方的依恋行为有缓冲作用，即对来自社会网络成员的不同意对伴侣关系结果的负面影响方面能发挥作用。临床意义进行了讨论。	The degree of approval for a relationship from one's social network has been shown to predict relationship outcomes.Additional research has shown that attachment can buffer the negative effects of various factors (e.g., depression) on relationships.Using an actor-partner interdependence model in an SEM framework, we research the effects of disapproval from parents and friends for one's relationship on marital relationship quality for self and partner in a sample of 858 married couples.We also examine whether each spouse's attachment behaviors can moderate these effects.Results indicated that one's own attachment behaviors moderate the effects of their own parents' and friends' disapproval on their self-reported relationship quality for both men and women.Partner's attachment behaviors moderate own friend's disapproval on self-reported relationship quality for men and women; additionally, the main effect of partner's friends' and parents' disapproval became nonsignificant with that test.The findings provide evidence that attachment behaviors of both partners play a role in buffering the negative effects of the social network disapproval on relationship outcomes.Clinical implications are discussed.	The degree to which a relationship is recognized by a person's social network can predict its outcome.There are also studies showing that attachment behavior can cushion the negative effects of factors such as depression on relationships.This study sample includes 858 married couples, and we used the actor-partner interdependence model within the SEM framework to investigate the impact of disagreements from parents and friends on the quality of their relationship with their partner.We also looked at whether each spouse's attachment behavior can mitigate these effects.The results showed that, regardless of male and female, a party's own attachment behavior mitigated the impact of parental and friendly disagreement on the quality of their self-reported relationship.Partner attachment behavior mitigated the impact of their friend's non-consent on the quality of the self-reported relationship between men and women; furthermore, the main effect of the partner's parental and friend's non-consent played little role in the test.The finding supports the conclusion that there is a buffer between partner attachment behaviour and that there is a role to play in the negative impact of disagreement from members of social networks on partner outcomes.Clinical significance was discussed.	The degree of acceptance of a relationship from a person's social network can predict the outcome of such a relationship.Other studies have shown that attachment behavior can cushion the negative effects of various factors (such as depression) on relationships.In this study sample, which included 858 married couples, we used the actor-partner interdependence model within the SEM framework to explore the impact of disagreement from parents and friends on the quality of their relationship with their partner.We also looked at whether each partner's attachment behavior could slow those effects.The results showed that regardless of male or female, one party's own attachment mitigated the effect of parental and friend disagreement on the quality of their self-reported relationship.The attachment behaviour of a partner mitigates the effect of one's own friends disagreeing with the quality of self-reported relationships between men and women; moreover, the main effect of disagreeing with the partner's parents and friends is not significant in the testThe findings support the conclusion that both partners' attachment behavior has a buffer effect, i.e. a role in the negative impact of disagreement from members of social networks on partnership outcomes.The clinical significance was discussed.
临床实践指南, 如关注于创伤性应激治疗的指南, 可以在提升包容性和公平性方面发挥重要作用。在对14项明确提及儿童的国际创伤治疗指导文件综述的基础上, 我们对这些指南可以变得更具包容性和公平性的两个领域进行了反思; a) 儿童文化背景的体现, b) 儿童表达其声音的机会。尽管有几条准则提到应根据儿童的文化需求量身定制治疗方法, 但关于这一点如何实现的指导却很少。而且, 在产生和评估国际证据基础的各个阶段, 似乎仍然有强烈的西方白人眼光。现有指南还意味着在指南开发过程中未咨询18岁以下的青年。为了促进包容性和公平性, 我们建议了未来国家指南制定工作的五个要素。对于目前代表性不足的群体, 与其一同以及针对目前代表性不足的群体来促进研究和指南开发, 应该是我们领域的高度优先事项。我们国家, 地区和全球专业协会在 (继续) 促进这一领域的对话和行动方面处于优势地位。	Clinical practice guidelines, such as those focusing on traumatic stress treatment, can play an important role in promoting inclusion and equity.Based on a review of 14 international trauma treatment guidance documents that explicitly mentioned children, we reflect on two areas in which these guidelines can become more inclusive and equitable; a) representation of children's cultural background and b) children's opportunity to have their voice heard.While a few guidelines mentioned that treatment should be tailored to children's cultural needs, there was little guidance on how this could be done.Moreover, there still appears to be a strong white Western lens across all stages of producing and evaluating the international evidence base.The available documentation also suggested that no young people under the age of 18 had been consulted in the guideline development processes.To contribute to inclusion and equity, we suggest five elements for future national guideline development endeavours.Promoting research and guideline development with, by, and for currently under-represented communities should be a high priority for our field.Our national, regional and global professional associations are in an excellent position to (continue to) stimulate conversation and action in this domain.	Clinical practice guidelines, such as those focusing on traumatic stress treatment, can play an important role in promoting inclusiveness and equity.On the basis of a synthesis of 14 international guidance documents on trauma treatment that explicitly refer to children, we reflect on two areas in which these guidelines can be made more inclusive and equitable; a) the representation of children's cultural backgrounds; and b) the opportunity for children to make their voices heard.While several guidelines mention that treatments should be tailored to the cultural needs of children, there is little guidance on how this can be achieved.Moreover, there appears to still be a strong white Western perspective at all stages of the generation and assessment of the international evidence base.Existing guidance also means that young people under the age of 18 are not consulted during its development.To promote inclusiveness and equity, we recommend five elements for future national guidance development.Promoting research and guidance development with and for currently underrepresented groups should be a high priority in our field.Our national, regional and global professional associations are in a prime position to (continue) promote dialogue and action in this area.	Clinical practice guidelines, such as those focusing on traumatic stress treatment, can play an important role in promoting inclusiveness and equity.Based on a review of 14 international trauma treatment guidance documents that explicitly refer to children, we reflect on two areas where these guidelines could be made more inclusive and equitable; a) representation of children's cultural context; and b) opportunities for children to make their voices heard.Although several guidelines mention that treatments should be tailored to the child's cultural needs, there is little guidance on how this can be achieved.Moreover, there still seems to be a strong white Western perspective at all stages of generating and evaluating the international evidence base.The existing guidelines also mean that young people under 18 years of age were not consulted during the development of the guidelines.To promote inclusiveness and equity, we have proposed five elements for future national guidance development.Promoting research and guidance development with and for currently underrepresented groups should be a high priority in our field.Our national, regional and global professional associations are well placed to (continue) promote dialogue and action in this field.
对人工全膝关节置换术（total knee arthroplasty，TKA）及人工全髋关节置换术（total hip arthroplasty，THA）的围术期血液管理（perioperative blood managment，PBM）措施进行综述。全面阅读并总结近年国内外关于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 措施的进展，结合四川大学华西医院临床实践经验，从优化造血、减少失血和输血三方面深入评价并分析各种措施的优劣，为临床选择提供依据。目前用于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 方式较多，其中优化造血主要包括围术期应用铁剂及促红细胞生成素；减少失血措施包括使用止血带、术中进行控制性降压及围术期应用抗纤溶药物；自体输血主要包括预存自体输血、血液稀释法自体输血以及术中自体血液回输；而异体输血则为治疗贫血的最终手段。其中术前应用促红细胞生成素联合铁剂进行血液动员，术中控制性降压减少失血，再结合多模式氨甲环酸的应用可以取得满意效果。TKA 及 THA 围术期应根据患者身体及经济情况，个性化选择单一或多种血液管理措施以减少失血及异体输血需求，加速患者术后康复。	To review the perioperative blood management (PBM) of total knee arthroplasty (TKA) and total hip arthroplasty (THA).Recent researches on PBM for TKA and THA were comprehensively read and summarized.Then the advantages and disadvantages of various measures together with the clinical experience of West China Hospital of Sichuan University were evaluated from three aspects, including optimizing hematopoiesis, reducing blood loss and blood transfusion, which could provide a basis for clinical selection.There are many PBM methods in TKA and THA, among which the optimization of hematopoiesis mainly includes the application of perioperative iron and erythropoietin.Measures to reduce bleeding include the use of tourniquet, intraoperative controlled hypotension, and perioperative antifibrinolytic agents.Autologous blood transfusion includes preoperative autologous blood donation, hemodilution and cell salvage.Allogeneic blood transfusion is the ultimate treatment for anemia.The application of erythropoietin combined with iron therapy for blood mobilization before surgery together with intraoperative controlled hypotension for bleeding control and the multiple use of tranexamic acid can achieve satisfactory clinical results.In the perioperative period of TKA and THA, single or multiple use of different blood management measures should be considered carefully according to the physical and economic conditions of patients individually, so as to reduce the blood loss and allogeneic blood transfusion optimally, and finally accelerate the recovery of patients.	An overview of peroperative blood management (PBM) measures for total knee arthroplasty (TKA) and total hip arthroplasty (THA).Copyright Sichuan University. All Rights Reserved.At present, there are many PBM methods for TKA and THA, including optimized hematopoietic application of iron and erythropoietin during perinatal surgery. The measures to reduce blood loss include the use of tourniquets, controlled blood pressure reduction during surgery and antifibrillary application of antifibrolysis drugs during perinatal surgery.Preoperative use of erythropoietin combined with iron agents for blood mobilization, controlled pressure reduction during surgery to reduce blood loss, combined with multi-mode aminocyclic acid application can achieve satisfactory resultsTKA and THA perioperative period should be based on the patient's physical and financial condition, and single or multiple blood management measures should be personalized to reduce the need for blood loss and alloy transfusion, and	Review of perioperative blood management (PBM) measures for total knee arthroplasty (TKA) and total hip arthroplasty (THA).We thoroughly read and summarize the progress of PBM measures on TKA and THA at home and abroad in recent years, combined with the clinical practice experience of West China Hospital of Sichuan University, in-depth evaluation and analysis of the advantages and disadvantages of various measures in terms of optimizing hematopoiesis, reducing blood loss andCurrently used for TKA and THA PBM way more, including optimization of hematopoietic mainly includes the perioperative application of iron and erythropoietin; measures to reduce blood loss include the use of tourniquet, controlled blood pressure reduction during surgery and perioperative application of anti-fibrolytic drugs; autologous blood transfusion mainly includes pre-existing autologous blood transfusion, blood thinning autologous blood transfusion and intraoperative autologous bloodPreoperative application of erythropoietin combined with iron agents for blood mobilization, intraoperative controlled blood pressure reduction to reduce blood loss, combined with the application of multimodal aminocyclic acid can achieve satisfactory resultsTKA and THA perioperative period should be based on the patient's physical and financial situation, individual choice of single or multiple blood management measures to reduce blood loss and allogeneic blood transfusion needs, accelerate patient recovery after surgery
比较骨填充网袋椎体成形术（Vesselplasty）与经皮椎体后凸成形术（percutaneous kyphoplasty，PKP）治疗 Kümmell 病的临床疗效。2015 年 1 月—2018 年 12 月收治 63 例 Kümmell 病患者，其中 28 例采用 Vesselplasty 治疗（Vesselplasty 组），35 例采用 PKP 治疗（PKP 组）。两组患者性别、年龄、病程、骨密度 T 值、骨折节段及术前疼痛视觉模拟评分（VAS）、Oswestry 功能障碍指数（ODI）、伤椎前缘高度、后凸 Cobb 角等一般资料比较，差异均无统计学意义（  两组患者均获随访，随访时间 12～36 个月，平均 24.2 个月。Vesselplasty 组手术时间、术中透视时间、骨水泥注射量、骨水泥弥散面积率均明显小于 PKP 组（  Vesselplasty 和 PKP 治疗 Kümmell 病疗效相似，均能有效缓解患者疼痛症状，改善生活质量，部分恢复伤椎高度，矫正椎体后凸。但前者具有手术时间短、术中透视时间少、骨水泥渗漏少等优势。	To investigate the effectiveness of Vesselplasty and percutaneous kyphoplasty (PKP) in treatment of Kümmell disease.Between January 2015 and December 2018, 63 patients with Kümmell disease were treated.Among them, 28 cases were treated with Vesselplasty (Vesselplasty group) and 35 cases were treated with PKP (PKP group).There was no significant difference in gender, age, disease duration, bone mineral density (T value), fracture distribution, and preoperative pain visual analogue scale (VAS) score, Oswestry Disability Index (ODI), anterior height of injured vertebrae, and kyphosis Cobb angle between the two groups (  All patients of the two groups were followed up 12-36 months, with an average of 24.2 months. The operation time, intraoperative fluoroscopy time, bone cement injection volume, and diffusion area ratio of bone cement were significantly lower in the Vesselplasty group than in the PKP group (  Vesselplasty and PKP have similar effectiveness in the treatment of Kümmell disease. They can effectively relieve the pain symptoms, improve the quality of life, partially restore the height of injured vertebrae, and correct kyphosis. But the Vesselplasty has the advantages of shorter operation time, less intraoperative fluoroscopy time, and less bone cement leakage.	Comparing the clinical efficacy of bone-filled veselplasty with percutaneous kyphoplasty (PKP) treatments for Kmmell disease.From January 2015 to December 2018, 63 patients were treated with Kmmell disease, 28 with Vesselplasty and 35 with PKP.Comparison of general information such as sex, age, course of disease, bone density T value, fracture segment and preoperative pain visual simulation score (VAS), Oswestry dysfunction index (ODI), pre-spinal height, posterior cobb angle, etc., is not statistically significant (both patients were followed up for 12 to 36 months with an average of 24.2 months.Vesselplasty group surgery time, time in the procedure, bone cement injection, bone cement dispersion area rate is significantly less than PKP group (Vesselplasty and PKP treatment Kmmell disease similar results, can effectively relieve the patient's pain symptoms, improve the quality of life, partially restore the vertebral height, correct the vertebral posterior convexity.However, the former has the advantages of short surgical time, less time in surgery, and less bone cement leakage.	Comparing the clinical effectiveness of Vesselplasty and percutaneous kyphoplasty (PKP) in the treatment of Kmmell disease.From January 2015 to December 2018, 63 patients with Kmmell disease were treated, of which 28 were treated with Vesselplasty (Vesselplasty group) and 35 with PKP (PKP group).Compared with general data such as gender, age, course of disease, bone density T value, fracture segment and preoperative pain visual simulation score (VAS), Oswestry dysfunction index (ODI), injury leading edge height, kyphosis Cobb angle, the difference was not statistically significant (both groups were followed up for 12-36 months with an average of 24.2 months).Vesselplasty group surgery time, intraoperative perspective time, bone cement injection volume, bone cement dispersion area rate is significantly lower than PKP group (Vesselplasty and PKP treatment of Kmmell disease similar effect, can effectively relieve patients pain symptoms, improve quality of life, partially restore the height of the injured vertebrae, correct the kyphosis of the vertebraeBut the former has the advantages of short surgical time, less intraoperative perspective time, less bone cement leakage and so on.
本系统综述考查了欧洲寻求庇护者和难民人群移民后变量对其心理健康的影响。它主要关注移民后应激源的影响 (包括庇护过程的时长和停留时间, 居住状态和社会融合) 以及它们对创伤后压力障碍, 焦虑和抑郁的影响。本研究综述了22个研究。在22项研究中的9项中, 庇护过程的时长和停留时间被发现是最常被提及的心理健康困难因素。七项研究报告了风险因素与心理健康之间的显著相关, 并且被居住状态调节。相反, 法律地位的影响与其他移民后因素更加复杂地联系在一起。它被发现可以作为其他移民后变量的标志, 包括孤独, 歧视, 沟通或语言问题。家庭相关困难还被发现与停留时间和法律地位有关, 同时还认为其他移民后变量居住和停留时间对心理健康的影响更大。	The present systematic review examined post-migration variables impacting upon mental health outcomes among asylum-seeking and refugee populations in Europe.It focuses on the effects of post-settlement stressors (including length of asylum process and duration of stay, residency status and social integration) and their impact upon post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.Twenty-two studies were reviewed in this study.Length of asylum process and duration of stay was found to be the most frequently cited factor for mental health difficulties in 9 out of 22 studies.Contrary to expectation, residency or legal status was posited as a marker for other explanatory variables, including loneliness, discrimination and communication or language problems, rather than being an explanatory variable itself.However, in line with previous findings and as hypothesised in this review, there were statistically significant correlations found between family life, family separation and mental health outcomes.	This system provides an overview of the impact of the migration of asylum-seekers and refugees in Europe on their mental health.It focuses on the impact of post-migrant stressors (including the length and duration of the asylum process, residency status and social cohesion) and their impact on post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.This study takes a look at 22 studies.In 9 of the 22 studies, the length of the asylum process and the length of stay were found to be the most commonly cited mental health difficulties.Seven studies reported significant correlations between risk factors and mental health and were regulated by residency status.Conversely, the impact of legal status is more complexly linked to other post-immigration factors.It was found to be a sign of other post-immigrant variables, including loneliness, discrimination, communication or language problems.Family-related difficulties were also found to be related to length of stay and legal status, while other post-immigrant variables such as residence and length of stay were considered to have a greater impact on	This systematic overview examines the impact of post-migration variables on the mental health of asylum-seekers and refugees in Europe.It focuses on the impact of post-migration stressors (including length and duration of asylum process, residence status and social integration) and their impact on post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.This study summarizes 22 studies.In 9 out of 22 studies, the length and duration of the asylum process were found to be the most commonly cited mental health difficulties.Seven studies reported significant correlations between risk factors and mental health, and were modulated by residential status.Conversely, the effects of legal status are more complexly linked to other post-immigration factors.It has been found to be a sign of other post-migration variables including loneliness, discrimination, communication or language problems.Family-related difficulties were also found to be related to length of stay and legal status, while other post-migration variables such as residence and length of stay were found to have a greater impact on mental
乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）的发现为慢性乙型肝炎（CHB）的诊断、预防和治疗提供了科学基础。新生儿乙型肝炎疫苗的普种极大地降低了我国人群乙型肝炎表面抗原（HBsAg）阳性率，基于干扰素和/或核苷（酸）类似物的抗病毒治疗，可有效抑制HBV复制、改善肝脏炎症坏死和肝纤维化，从而减少肝硬化和肝细胞癌的发生。然而，现有治疗手段很难实现到HBsAg转阴的临床治愈目标。近年来，针对HBV生命周期的直接抗病毒药物及针对机体抗病毒应答的免疫调节药物进入研发活跃期。设计良好、执行规范、分析正确、解读恰当的临床试验，是决定乙型肝炎临床治愈新药能否研发成功的关键。希望肝脏病学、临床药理学及方法学专家通力合作，采用新型临床试验设计、新型终点指标、新型数据管理和质控技术，共同促进乙型肝炎临床治愈新药研发进程。	The discovery of hepatitis B virus (HBV) has provided a scientific basis for the diagnosis, prevention and treatment of chronic hepatitis B (CHB).The universalization of neonatal hepatitis B vaccine has greatly reduced the HBsAg positive load rate of the Chinese population.Antiviral therapy based on interferon and / or nucleos(t)ide analogues had effectively inhibited HBV replication, improved liver inflammation, liver fibrosis, and reduced the incidence of liver cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma.However, the existing treatment methods can achieve the clinical cure goal of negative HBsAg.In recent years, direct antiviral drugs for HBV life cycle and immunomodulatory drugs for antiviral response have entered an active stage of research and development.Clinical trials that are well-designed, standardized, analyzed, and interpreted are the key to the success of the research and development of a clinical cure for hepatitis B.It is hoped that the experts in hepatology, clinical pharmacology and methodology will work together to promote the research and development process of new drugs for clinical cure of hepatitis B by adopting new clinical trial design, new endpoint indicators, new data management and quality control technology.	The discovery of Hepatitis B virus (HBV) provides the scientific basis for diagnosis, prevention and treatment of chronic hepatitis B (CHB).The prevalence of hepatitis B vaccine for newborns has greatly reduced the positive rate of surface antigen (HBsAg) in our population. Antiviral treatment based on interferon and / or nucleoside (acid) analogues can effectively inhibit HBV replication and improve liver inflammatory necrosis and liver fibrosis, thus reducing the occurrence of cirrhHowever, it is difficult to achieve the clinical cure goal of HBsAg.In recent years, direct antiviral drugs for the HBV life cycle and immunomodulatory drugs for the body's antiviral response have entered the R DWell-designed, well-executed, well-analyzed and properly interpreted clinical trials are the key to determining the success of hepatitis B clinical cure drug development.It is hoped that experts in liver pathology, clinical pharmacology and methodology will work together to promote the development of new hepatitis B clinical cures by adopting new clinical trial design, new endpoint indicators, new data management and quality control technology.	The discovery of the hepatitis B virus (HBV) provides the scientific basis for the diagnosis, prevention and treatment of chronic hepatitis B (CHB).The prevalence of neonatal hepatitis B vaccine greatly reduces the prevalence of hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) in our population. Antiviral therapy based on interferon and / or nucleoside (acid) analogues can effectively inhibit HBV replication, improve liver inflammatory necrosis and liver fibrosis, thereby reducing the incidence of cirrhosis and hepatocHowever, existing treatments are difficult to achieve the clinical goal of HBsAg trans-negative treatment.In recent years, direct antiviral drugs targeting the life cycle of HBV and immunomodulatory drugs targeting the body's antiviral response have entered the active phase of developmentWell-designed, well-executed, correctly analyzed and properly interpreted clinical trials are key to the success of the development of new drugs for hepatitis B clinical treatment.We hope that experts in hepatology, clinical pharmacology and methodology will work together to promote the development of new drugs for the clinical cure of hepatitis B by adopting new clinical trial design, new endpoint indicators, new data management and quality control technologies.
比较穿骨隧道缝合固定和锚钉固定修复肘关节恐怖三联征中外侧副韧带复合体（lateral collateral ligament complex，LCLC）损伤的疗效。回顾分析 2012 年 6 月—2018 年 1 月收治的 50 例肘关节恐怖三联征患者临床资料，其中 22 例采用锚钉固定（锚钉组）、28 例采用穿骨隧道缝合固定（穿骨隧道组）修复 LCLC。两组患者性别、年龄、骨折侧别、受伤至入院时间以及冠状突骨折、桡骨头骨折及肘关节恐怖三联征分型等一般资料比较，差异均无统计学意义（  两组患者均顺利完成手术，手术时间及术中出血量比较差异均无统计学意义（  治疗肘关节恐怖三联征时，采用穿骨隧道固定或锚钉固定修复 LCLC 均可获得满意疗效。	To compare the effectiveness of transosseous tunnel fixation and drilling fixation for repair of lateral collateral ligament complex (LCLC) in treatment of terrible triad of elbow (TTE).A clinical data of 50 patients with TTE between June 2012 and January 2018 were retrospectively analyzed.The LCLC was repaired with transosseous tunnel fixation in 22 patients (transosseous tunnel fixation group) and with drilling fixation in 28 patients (drilling fixation group).There was no significant difference between the two groups (  The operation of two groups were successfully completed. There was no significant difference in the operation time and intraoperative blood loss between the two group (  Both transosseous tunnel fixation and drilling fixation can achieve good results in repair of LCLC for TTE.	Compare the efficacy of bone-piercing tunnel stitching fixation and anchoring fixation to repair damage to the lateral collateral ligament complex (LCLC) in elbow-horror triad.Review and analyze clinical data of 50 elbow joint horror triad patients treated from June 2012 to January 2018, 22 of which were fixed by anchor nails (anchor studs) and 28 by piercing tunnel sutures (piercing tunnel sets) to repair LCLC.Comparison of gender, age, fracture side part, injury to hospital time, and coronary fracture, skull fracture, and elbow horror triad, is not statistically significant.	Compare the efficacy of perforated tunnel suture fixation and anchor fixation in repairing lateral collateral ligament complex (LCLC) damage in elbow terror triple.Review and analyze the clinical data of 50 patients admitted from June 2012 to January 2018, including 22 with anchor fixation (anchor fixation group) and 28 with bone-tunnel suture fixation (bone-tunneling group) to repair LCLC.The difference between the two groups of patients is not statistically significant when comparing general data such as sex, age, fracture side, injury to hospital admission time and coronary protrusion fracture, hip fracture and elbow terror triplotype.
分析利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, DLBCL）患者的疗效，并探讨难治复发患者的高危因素. 对2012年12月-2018年12月东南大学附属中大医院血液科收治的72例初治DLBCL患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析，分析DLBCL患者应用利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案化疗的缓解率。同时进行生存分析，探讨影响难治复发的高危因素. 72例患者中，45例获得CR，11例获得PR，总缓解率77.78%，其中难治复发患者25例，复发率34.2%。单因素分析显示， B症状、低Hb水平、高NLR、低LMR、高β 利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案治疗DLBCL的缓解率较高，但仍有约1/3的患者难治复发。B症状、低Hb、高β	To analyze the efficacy of rituximab combined with CHOP/EPOCH regimen for treatment of diffuse large B-cell lymphoma（DLBCL） patients, and to explore the high risk factors of refractory and relapsed patients.The clinical data of 72 patients with de novo DLBCL from December 2012 to December 2018 in the Department of Hematology, Zhongda Hospital Affiliated to Southeast University were retrospectively analyzed.The remission rate of DLBCL patients treated by rituximab combined with CHOP/EPOCH was analyzed, and survival analysis was conducted to explore the risk factors influencing refractory recurrence.45 cases among 72 patients achieved complete remission (CR), 11 cases achieved partial remission (PR), the total remission rate was 77.78%.25 cases (34.2%) refractory and relapsed.Single factor analysis showed that the B symptoms, low Hb, high NLR, low MLR, high β The remission rate of DLBCL patients treated by rituximab combined with CHOP/EPOCH regimen is high, but about one third of the patients still show refractory and relapsed.B Symptoms, anemia, high β	Analysis of the efficacy of diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) treatment in patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL), and discussion of the risk factors for patients with refractory relapses. Review of clinical data of 72 initial DLBCL patients admitted to the hematology department of the Central Hospital of Southeast University from December 2012 to December 2018.At the same time, a survival analysis was conducted to investigate the high risk factors affecting relapse. 对髋关节镜治疗髋臼盂唇损伤的常见手术方式进行综述，为临床治疗提供参考。查阅近年国内外髋关节镜治疗髋臼盂唇损伤的手术方式和临床结果相关文献，进行分析和总结。在髋关节镜开展的早期，对撕裂的盂唇进行清理是主要治疗方案。目前的治疗原则是根据盂唇撕裂程度决定手术方式，包括髋臼盂唇清理术、髋臼盂唇修复术、髋臼盂唇重建术以及髋臼盂唇加强术等。髋关节镜手术已成为治疗盂唇损伤的主流技术，条件允许时应首选髋臼盂唇修复术，在盂唇无法修复时则采用髋臼盂唇重建术。	To review the surgical methods of arthroscopy in the treatment of acetabular labrum injury, and to provide reference for clinical treatment.The literature about the surgical methods and clinical results of hip arthroscopy in the treatment of acetabular labrum injury was reviewed and analyzed.In the early stages of hip arthroscopy, the removal of the torn labrum is the primary treatment option.The current principles of treatment are based on the specific circumstances of a torn labrum, including acetabular labrum debridement, acetabular labrum repair, acetabular labrum reconstruction, and acetabular labrum augmentation.Hip arthroscopy has become the preferred technique for the treatment of acetabular labrum injury.Labral repair is still the first choice, and labral reconstruction is used when acetabular labrum injury cannot be repaired.	An overview of common surgical practices in hip arthroscopy for the treatment of epilepsy lip injury, providing a reference for clinical treatment.Check out recent international and international literature on surgical procedures and clinical results for hip arthroscopy treatment of craniopagus lip injury, for analysis and summary.In the early days of hip arthroscopy, cleaning up a torn jaw lip was the main treatment option.Current treatment principles are based on the extent of lip laceration, including lip cleansing, lip prosthetics, lip reconstruction, and lip enhancement.Hip arthroscopic surgery has become a mainstream technique for treating craniopagus lip damage, with conditions permitting the use of craniopagus lip prosthetics and craniopagus lip reconstruction in cases where craniopag	A review of common surgical methods used for hip arthroscopic treatment of sinus-lip injuries is provided as a reference for clinical treatment.Review recent domestic and international literature on surgical methods and clinical results of hip arthroscopic treatment of lip injury.In the early days of hip arthroscopy, cleaning up a torn labial lip was the main treatment option.The current treatment principle is based on the degree of lip tear surgery, including lip clean-up, lip repair, lip reconstruction and lip reinforcement.Hip arthroscopic surgery has become the dominant technique for treating lip injuries. Lip prosthetics should be preferred where possible, or lip reconstruction if not possible.
系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。但是，聚焦于成人家庭成员的家庭和健康相关研究很多都只关注亲密关系，也就是婚姻关系。成人维护的有强大影响力的家庭关系中还有很多其他的关系都被忽视了，而且随着年龄变大，越会对亲密关系更关注。本文对家庭和成人健康相关文献进行系统性研究，72篇筛选出的文章依次按照主题进行解码，找到这个领域内的主要核心主题。结果表明有六大主题，其包括：家庭关系质量，家庭结构，健康和保健方面的行为因素，心理身体调节因素，看护情况，和老年人健康。研究结果支持在成人健康方面的研究中较少得到代表的家庭成员，而不仅仅是亲密伴侣。	A systemic approach to researching families and health should capture the complex network within which family members are embedded, including multiple family relationships and larger systems of health care.However, much of the families and health research focused on adult family members has focused solely on intimate partnerships, usually the marital relationship.This neglects the remainder of the powerfully influencing family relationships adults retain, and may increasingly focus on as they age.We conducted a systematic review of the families and adult health literature, retaining 72 articles which were subsequently thematically coded to highlight main foci of this area of research.Results highlight six themes, which include family relationship quality, family composition, behavioral factors in health and health care, psychophysiological mediators, caregiving, and aging health.Findings support an underrepresentation of family members, other than the intimate partner, in research on adult health.	A systematic approach to family and health should capture the complex web in which family members are intertwined, which includes multiple family relationships and a larger health-care system.But much of the research focused on the families of adult family members and health-related research focuses only on intimate relationships, that is, relationships.There are many other relationships that are overlooked in the powerful family relationships that adults maintain, and as they get older, more attention is paid to intimate relationships.This article provides a systematic study of family and adult health-related literature, and 72 selected articles are decoded by theme to find the main core themes in this area.The results showed six main themes, including: quality of family relationships, family structure, behavioral factors in health and health care, mental and physical regulation, caregiving, and the health of the elderly.The findings support family members who are less represented in adult health studies, not just intimate partners.	A systematic approach to studying family and health should capture complex networks where family members are intertwined, including multiple family relationships and larger health systems.However, many family and health-related studies that focus on adult family members focus only on intimate relationships, i.e. marital relationships.Many other powerful family relationships maintained by adults are neglected, and as they get older, they tend to pay more attention to intimacy.This paper conducts a systematic study of literature related to family and adult health, with 72 selected articles decoded by theme to identify the main core topics in the field.The results showed six broad themes, including: quality of family relationships, family structure, health and health-related behavioural factors, psycho-physical conditioning factors, caregiving, and elderly health.The findings support family members who are less represented in adult health studies than just intimate partners.
长期摄入大量乙醇导致肠源性内毒素血症，活性氧、高浓度的三磷酸腺苷及尿酸激活焦亡系统，进而通过切割Gasdermin-D打孔机制导致肝细胞死亡，同时伴有白细胞介素-1β、白细胞介素-18等炎性因子的释放。这一系列的过程激活免疫系统，介导级联炎症反应，促进酒精性肝病从脂肪变性到炎症、纤维化的进展。	Long-term intake of large amounts of ethanol leads to enterogenous endotoxemia.Reactive oxygen species, high concentrations of adenosine triphosphate and uric acid activate the pyroptosis system, which then cleaves the pore formation mechanism of gasdermin-D, leading to the death of liver cells, accompanied by the release of interleukin-1β, interleukin-18, and other inflammatory factors.This series of processes activates the immune system, mediates a cascade of inflammation, and promotes the development of alcoholic liver disease from steatosis to inflammation and fibrosis.	The long-term intake of a large amount of ethanol causes enterogenic endotoxin haematosis, reactive oxygen, high concentrations of adenosine triphosphate and uric acid activated coke death systems, resulting in liver cell death through cutting of the Gasdermin-D perforation mechanism, accompanied by the release of inflammatory factors such as IL-1 and IL-18.This series of processes activates the immune system, mediates cascading inflammatory responses and promotes the progression of alcoholic liver disease from fat degeneration to inflammation, fibrosis.	Chronic intake of high levels of ethanol leads to enterogenic endotoxemia, where reactive oxygen, high concentrations of adenosine triphosphate and uric acid activate the scorched apoptosis system, leading to hepatocyte death by cutting Gasdermin-D perforation mechanisms, accompanied by release of inflammatory factors such as interleukin-1 and interleukinThis series of processes activates the immune system, mediates cascading inflammatory responses and promotes the progression of alcoholic liver disease from fat degeneration to inflammation, fibrosis.
家庭层面的冲突和家庭的凝聚力是公认的衡量青少年心理健康的指标。但是，传统研究方法侧重于家庭和家庭之间在凝聚力和冲突方面的差异，通常会忽略某个具体家庭内部的日常变异性，而后者可能会提供重要的新信息。本研究的参与者来自家中有两个照料者的家庭的照顾者共151名（女性占95.3％），以及他们的青春期孩子（女性占61.5％），我们使用的数据来自他们持续21天的每日记录中的数据，用以测试家庭功能的每日变化是否与青少年的幸福感的每日变化相关，以及青少年的幸福感是否取决于家庭功能的平均水平。我们采用多层次模型来研究家庭凝聚力和家庭冲突，他们与青少年生气，沮丧和焦虑情绪以及快乐，生活满意度以及生活中的意义和目的之间的相互关联。研究得出在凝聚力和冲突方面，每天都表现出有意义的变化。青少年报告的凝聚力和冲突与六个青春期结果之间有特殊的家庭内部的关联。使用父母方面报告的家庭功能数据的模型所产生的关联要少于使用青少年方面报告的数据的模型。本研究还有几个发现。跨层次的交互作用表明，家庭内的凝聚力差异仅与生活在家庭内聚力平均水平以下的家庭的青少年抑郁有关。总而言之，这项研究提供了令人信服的证据，表明家庭生活每天都会表现出有意义的差异性，而且每日的差异都会对青少年的幸福感具有重要的影响。	Family-level conflict and cohesion are well-established predictors of adolescent mental health.However, traditional approaches focusing on between-family differences in cohesion and conflict may overlook daily intrafamily variability that might provide important new information.We used data from a 21-day daily diary protocol in a sample of 151 caregivers (95.3% female) and their adolescent child (61.5% female) in two-caregiver families to test whether daily changes in family functioning are associated with daily changes in adolescent well-being and whether adolescent well-being depends on average levels of family functioning.We examined family cohesion and conflict in relation to adolescent angry, depressed, and anxious mood, as well as happiness, life satisfaction, and meaning and purpose in life in multilevel models.Both cohesion and conflict exhibited meaningful daily variation.Adolescent-reported cohesion and conflict had unique within-family associations with all six adolescent outcomes.Models using parent reports of family functioning yielded fewer associations than models with adolescent reports; however, several findings remained.Cross-level interactions indicated that within-family variations in cohesion were only associated with adolescent depression in families with lower average levels of cohesion across days.In sum, this study provides compelling evidence that families exhibit meaningful variability from day to day and that daily variation has important implications for adolescent well-being.	Conflict at the family level and family cohesion are recognized indicators of adolescent mental health.However, traditional research methods that focus on differences in cohesion and conflict between families and families often ignore the daily variability within a particular household, which may provide important new information.The study involved 151 caregivers (95.3 women) from families with two caregivers at home and 61.5 adolescent children. We used data from their daily records for 21 days to test whether the daily changes in family function are related to the daily changes in the happiness of adolescents and whether the happiness of adolescents depends on the average family function.We used multilayered models to study family cohesion and family conflict, their correlation with adolescent anger, frustration and anxiety and happiness, life satisfaction, and meaning and purpose in life.Studies have shown meaningful changes in cohesion and conflict every day.There is a particular intra-family correlation between adolescent reported cohesion and conflict and six adolescent outcomes.Models using data on family function reported by parents produce fewer correlations than models using data reported by adolescents.There are several other findings from this study.Interactions across levels show that differences in cohesion within households are related only to adolescent depression in families living below the average level of family cohesion.Taken together, the study provides compelling evidence that family life shows meaningful differences every day, and that daily differences can have a significant impact on adolescent happiness.	Conflict at the family level and family cohesion are recognized indicators of adolescent mental health.However, traditional research methods, which focus on differences in cohesion and conflict between families and families, often overlook everyday variability within a particular household, which may provide important new information.This study included 151 caregivers (95.3 female) from households with two caregivers and their adolescent children (61.5 female). We used data from their daily records lasting 21 days to test whether daily changes in family function correlated with daily changes in adolescent happiness and whether adolescent happiness depended on average family functioning.We used a multilevel model to study family cohesion and family conflict, their correlation with adolescent anger, depression and anxiety, as well as happiness, life satisfaction, and meaning and purpose in life.The study concluded that meaningful changes were shown on a daily basis in terms of cohesion and conflict.Adolescents report particular intra-family associations between cohesion and conflict and six adolescent outcomes.Models using data on family functioning reported by parents produce fewer correlations than models using data reported by adolescents.There are several more findings from this study.Cross-level interactions suggest that differences in cohesion within families are only associated with adolescent depression in families living below the average level of family cohesion.Overall, the study provides compelling evidence that family life shows meaningful differences every day, and that daily differences can have a significant impact on teens' happiness.
探讨10-18岁新诊断急性淋巴细胞白血病（ALL）患者的临床疗效及预后影响因素, 为临床选择治疗方案提供依据。回顾性分析济南市第二妇幼保健院2008年1月-2015年12月收治119例10-18岁新诊断ALL患者的临床资料, 包括基线临床特征、诱导治疗缓解效果、远期疗效、复发及死亡情况, 并对临床预后影响因素进行单因素和多因素评价。接受ALL-2005方案与ALL-2009方案治疗的患者经诱导治疗后第5周达完全缓解比例比较无显著性差异（P＞0.05）。119例患者随访5年累积无事件生存率和总生存率分别为（63.41±3.65）%和（68.95±4.01）%、7年分别为（61.86±3.72）%和（67.22±3.59）%。接受ALL-2005方案和ALL-2009方案治疗的患者随访累积无事件生存率和总生存率、总复发率、髓外复发率、复发时间及存活率比较均无显著性差异（P＞0.05）；髓外复发组存活率显著高于骨髓复发组（P＜0.05）；晚期复发组存活率显著高于早期复发组（P＜0.05）。单因素分析结果显示, 年龄、性别、诱导治疗效果、危险度及融合基因是患者临床预后影响因素（P＜0.05）；而Cox回归模型多因素分析结果显示, 男性、诱导治疗未缓解及高危是患者预后不良独立危险因素（P＜0.05）。合并BCR-ABL 10-18岁新诊断ALL患者采用ALL-2009方案治疗后较ALL-2005方案的生存率略有提高, 更适用于合并BCR-ABL	To investigate the clinical efficacy of ALL-2005 and ALL-2009 regimen and factors influencing prognosis of newly diagnosed ALL patients aged between 10-18 years old to provide some reference for clinical diagnosis and treatment.The clinical data including baseline clinical characteristics, induction chemotherapy effect, long-term clinical efficacy, recurrence rate and mortality of induction therapy of 119 newly diagnosed ALL patients aged between 10-18 years old from January 2008 to December 2015 were analyzed retrospectively, and the influencing factors of clinical prognosis were evaluated by univariate and multivariate analysis.The complete remission rate at the 5th week after induction therapy was not significantly different between ALL-2005 and ALL-2009 regimen groups (P＞0.05).The cumulative event-free survival rate and overall survival rate of 119 cases after 5-year follow-up were (63.41±3.65)% and (68.95±4.01)% respectively, and after 7-year follow-up were (61.86±3.72)% and (67.22±3.59)% respectively.The cumulative event-free survival rate and overall survival rate were not significantly different between ALL-2005 and ALL-2009 regimen groups (P＞0.05).The total recurrence rate, extramedullary recurrence rate, recurrence time and survival rate were not significantly different between ALL-2005 and ALL-2009 regimen groups (P＞0.05).The survival rate of extramedullary recurrence group was significantly higher than bone marrow recurrence group (P＜0.05).The survival rate in late term recurrence group was significantly higher than in early term recurrence group (P＜0.05).The mortality of ALL-2005 regimens was not significantly different from that of ALL-2009 regimen group (P＞0.05).Univariate analysis showed that age, sex, induction therapy, risk and fusion gene all were the factors influencing clinical prognosis (P＜0.05).Multivariate analysis by Cox regression model showed that male, non-remission after induction therapy and high risk were the independent risk factors for poor prognosis in patients (P＜0.05).The survival rate of patients with BCR-ABL The survival rate of newly diagnosed ALL patients aged between 10-18 years old treated with ALL-2009 regimen was slightly higher than that of ALL-2005 regimen, it is more suitable for the ALL patients with BCR-ABL	Discuss the clinical efficacy and prognostic factors of newly diagnosed acute
