BCR-ABL
本研究旨在验证以下假设,即父母对孩童应对能力的培养(SOC)与孩子的情绪调节能力之间的关系是长期的。样本来自256位父母,其孩子年龄在5至12岁之间(儿童平均年龄= 8.36,SD = 2.03,男性54.7%;父母平均年龄= 34.49,SD = 6.20,女性59%)。参与者被要求在起始阶段和12个月时填写在线问卷,以供收集有关人口统计学信息,育儿行为和儿童情绪调节能力方面的数据。纵向性的结构方程模型(SEM)分析的结果表明,在基线测量的父母SOC预测了孩子12个月后测量到的在情绪调节方面的适应和调适不良的结果。更具体地说,父母的积极培养孩子应对策略方面的建议预测了孩子情绪调节方面的适应性,而父母缺乏对孩童应对能力的培养则预测了孩子在情绪调节方面的不良调适能力。此外,在家长积极培养应对策略与儿童情绪调节适应性之间的纵向联系中,儿童性别起了调节作用:尽管这种联系很小,对女孩来说相对微小,而对于男孩则较大,并且具有统计学的显著意义。本项研究结果强调了家长的SOC的重要性,因为它有可能提高5至12岁儿童的情绪调节能力。	This study examined the hypothesis that parent socialization of coping (SOC) would have a longitudinal relation with child emotion regulation abilities.Participants included a sample of 256 parents of 5- to 12-year-old children (child M age = 8.36, SD = 2.03, 54.7% male; parent M age = 34.49, SD = 6.20, 59% female).Data on demographic information, parenting behaviors, and child emotion regulation abilities were collected via online questionnaires at baseline and 12 months.Results from longitudinal structural equation modeling (SEM) analyses suggested that parent SOC, measured at baseline, predicted child adaptive and maladaptive emotion regulation, measured 12 months later.More specifically, parental engagement coping suggestions predicted child's adaptive emotion regulation, whereas parental disengagement coping suggestions predicted child's maladaptive emotion regulation.Further, child gender emerged as a moderator in the longitudinal association between socialization of engagement coping and child adaptive emotion regulation: Whereas this association was small and marginally significant for girls, it was large and statistically significant for boys.Results highlight the importance of parent SOC as potentially contributing to emotion regulation abilities of 5- to 12-year-olds.	This study aims to test the hypothesis that the relationship between parental development of a child's coping capacity (SOC) and the child's ability to regulate emotions is long-term.The sample came from 256 parents with children between the ages of 5 and 12 (average age of children 8.36, SD 2.03, male 54.7; average age of parents 34.49, SD 6.20, femaleParticipants were asked to fill out online questionnaires at the beginning stages and at 12 months to collect data on demographic information, parenting behavior and children's ability to regulate emotions.The results of the Longitudinal Structural Equations Model (SEM) analysis showed that the SOC of the parents who took the baseline measurements predicted the outcomes of poor adjustment and adjustment in mood regulation measured in the children after 12 months.More specifically, parents' advice on coping strategies for positive parenting predict the adaptability of a child's emotional regulation, while parents' lack of ability to cope predicts the child's maladaptive ability in emotional regulation.In addition, in the longitudinal link between parents' active nurturing of coping strategies and children's adaptability to emotional regulation, child sex plays a regulating role: although the link is small, it is relatively small for girls and larger for boys and statistically significant.The findings of this study highlight the importance of SOC for parents, as it has the potential to improve emotional conditioning in children between the ages of 5 and 12.	The purpose of this study is to test the hypothesis that there is a long-term relationship between parental development of children's coping abilities (SOC) and children's emotional regulation.The sample was taken from 256 parents with children between 5 and 12 years of age (average age of children 8.36, SD 2.03, 54.7 of men; average age of parents 34.49, SD 6.20, 59Participants were asked to complete online questionnaires at the beginning and 12 months in order to gather data on demographics, parenting behavior, and children's emotional regulation abilities.The results of the longitudinal Structural Equation Model (SEM) analysis showed that parent SOCs measured at baseline predicted maladaptation and maladaptation in emotional regulation measured after 12 months.More specifically, parental advice on coping strategies for actively developing children predicts adaptability in emotional regulation, while parental lack of development of coping skills predicts maladaptability in emotional regulation.In addition, the child's gender plays a role in regulating the longitudinal association between parents actively developing coping strategies and children's emotional adaptation: although small, the association is relatively small for girls and larger for boys, and statistically significant.The results of this study emphasize the importance of parental SOC as it has the potential to improve emotional regulation in children between 5 and 12 years of age.
多发性内分泌肿瘤-IIb型(multiple endocrine neoplasia type-IIb，MEN-IIb)是一种罕见的由RET基因突变引起的常染色体显性遗传病，具有特殊的临床表型，如黏膜神经瘤、类马方综合征体型、甲状腺髓样癌及嗜铬细胞瘤等。临床医生对此病认识不足，诊断往往延迟。2018年11月中南大学湘雅三医院收治了1例MEN-IIb患者，该患者自幼有舌黏膜神经瘤，曾因二尖瓣脱垂及脊柱畸形接受手术治疗，于22岁时被诊断为甲状腺髓样癌并接受手术治疗，但直至28岁发现嗜铬细胞瘤才临床诊断为MEN-IIb。基因检测提示该患者携带一新发RET基因p.M918T杂合突变。在临床工作中早期识别内分泌系统以外的临床表现并进行RET基因筛查是早期诊断及治疗的关键。	Multiple endocrine neoplasia-IIb (MEN-IIb) is a rare hereditary autosomal dominant syndrome caused by mutations in the RET proto-oncogene.It's characterized by medullary thyroid carcinoma (MTC), pheochromocytoma (PHEO), mucosal neuromas, and Marfanoid habitus.Because of the rarity of MEN-IIb and finiteness of clinical cognition, the majority of the patients suffer a delayed diagnosis.A MEN-IIb patient with the lingual mucosal neuromas since childhood was admitted in the Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University in November, 2018.He had surgical history of mitral valve prolapse and spinal deformity.He was diagnosed with MTC and PHEO at the age of 22 and 28, respectively, and received surgical treatments.Sequencing of RET gene revealed a de novo heterozygous p.M918T mutation in the patient.Being aware of the unique clinical phenotype and screening of RET gene mutation may lead to the early diagnosis and better long-term outcome for MEN-IIb.	Multiple endocrine neoplasia type-IIb (MEN-IIb) is a rare autosomal dominant hereditary disease caused by mutations in the RET gene.Clinicians are poorly aware of the disease and diagnosis is often delayed.In November 2018, one case of MEN-IIb was admitted to Xiangya III Hospital of South Central University. The patient had a tongue mucosal neuroma since his infancy. He had undergone surgery for dichlorosarcoma and spinal malformations. He was diagnosed with myeloid thyroid cancer at the age of 22 and underwent surgery, but was not clinically diagnosed with MEN-Genetic testing suggests the patient carries a newly released RET gene p. M918T hybrid mutation.Early identification of clinical manifestations outside the endocrine system in clinical work and RET genetic screening are key to early diagnosis and treatment.	Multiple endocrine neoplasia type-IIb (MEN-IIb) is a rare autosomal dominant disease caused by mutations in the RET gene. It has special clinical phenotypes such as mucosal neuromas, Macrioid syndrome type, thyroid myeloid carcinoma and pheochromocytoma.Clinicians are poorly aware of the disease and diagnosis is often delayed.In November 2018, Xiangya Three Hospital of Central South University treated a patient with MEN-IIb. The patient had lingual mucosal neuroma since childhood. He had undergone surgery for mitral valve prolapse and spinal malformation. He was diagnosed with thyroid medullary cancer at age 22 and underwent surgery.Genetic testing indicates that the patient carries a new RET gene p. M918T hybrid mutation.Early identification of clinical manifestations outside the endocrine system and screening for RET genes are key to early diagnosis and treatment.
复合杂合突变致遗传性凝血因子Ⅴ缺陷症家系的表型与基因型分析. 通过检测复合杂合突变导致遗传性凝血因子Ⅴ（FⅤ）缺陷家系的表型和基因突变分析，探讨其分子发病机制. 检测先证者及其家系成员（共3代10人）血浆凝血酶原时间（PT）、活化部分凝血活酶时间（APTT）、纤维蛋白原（FIB）、FⅤ促凝活性（FⅤ∶C）、FⅤ抗原（FⅤ∶Ag）及其他相关凝血指标以明确诊断。采用DNA直接测序分析F5基因的所有外显子、侧翼、5′和3′非翻译区及家系成员相应的突变位点区域，发现突变位点用反向测序证实。使用ClustalX-2.1-win软件分析突变氨基酸的保守性，PROVEAN和MutationTaster在线生物信息学软件预测突变对蛋白质功能的影响，Swiss-PdbViewer软件在突变位点上进行蛋白质模型和氨基酸相互作用分析. 先证者PT和APTT较正常对照健康体检者显著延长，分别为34.2 vs 13.2 s和119.3 vs 36.0 s；FⅤ∶C和FⅤ∶Ag极度降低，分别为3％和6％。先证者的第二子、第三子、女儿和孙子的PT和APTT略有延长，FⅤ∶C和FⅤ∶Ag均有不同程度的降低，其他家庭成员的相关凝血参数均在正常范围内。先证者6号外显子上存在c.911G> A杂合错义突变，导致p.Gly276Glu；16号外显子上存在c.5343C> G杂合错义突变，导致p.Ser1781Arg。其第二子、第三子和孙子均携带p.Gly276Glu的杂合子，其女儿携带p.Ser1781Arg的杂合子，其他家庭成员均为野生型。保守分析结果表明，Gly276和Ser1781在同源物种中高度保守。2种生物信息学软件的预测结果相同，PROVEAN（得分-6.214和-12.79）表明，该复合杂合突变是一种有害突变；MutationTaster（得分0.976和0.999）提示，这些突变可能引起相应疾病。p.Gly276Glu蛋白质模型分析显示，Glu侧链延长，分子量变大，这将增加它与周围氨基酸之间的空间位阻，影响FⅤ蛋白的正常局部折叠，最终导致蛋白质活性和含量降低。由于尚无16号外显子FⅤ的X射线3D结构文件，本研究无法对p.Ser1781Arg突变蛋白进行空间结构分析. 在本研究中鉴定的新型复合杂合突变（p.Gly276Glu和p.Ser1781Arg）是该家系FⅤ水平下降的主要原因，其中p.Ser1781Arg国内外鲜见报道。	To analyze the molecular pathogenesis by analysis of phenotype and gene mutation in families with hereditary coagulation factor V (FⅤ) defect caused by complex heterozygous mutation.Plasma pro-thrombin time (PT), activated partial thromboplastin time (APTT), fibrinogen (FIB), FⅤ procoagulant activity (FⅤ∶C), FⅤ antigen (FⅤ∶Ag), and other related coagulation indexes were detected in the proband and his family members (3 generations 10 people).Using DNA direct sequencing to analyze all exons, flanks, 5' and 3' untranslated regions of F5 genes and the corresponding mutation site regions of family members, the mutation site was confirmed by reverse sequencing．The conservation of mutant amino acids was analyzed by ClustalX-2.1-win software.The PROVEAN and MutationTaster online bioinformatics software were used to predict the effect of mutation on protein function.Protein model and amino acid interaction at mutation sites was analyzed by Swiss-pdbviewer software.The PT and APTT of the proband were significantly prolonged compared with healthy controls (34.2 vs 13.2 s and 119.3 vs 36.0 s), while FⅤ∶C and FⅤ∶Ag extremely reduced (3% and 6%).The PT and APTT of the second-born, the third son, daughter, and grandson of the proband were slightly prolonged, and the FⅤ∶C and FⅤ∶Ag decreased to varying degrees.The related coagulant parameters of other family members were within normal range.Genetic analysis revealed that the proband had a c.911G>A heterozygous missense mutation on the exon 6 lead to p.Gly276Glu, and a c.5343C>G heterozygous missense mutation on the exon 16 lead to p.Ser1781Arg of the proband.The second-born, the third son, and grandson of the proband carry p.Gly276Glu heterozygotes, and the daughter carries p.Ser1781Arg heterozygotes, while the other family members were wild-type.The results of conservative analysis indicated that p.Gly276 and p.Ser1781 were highly conserved in homologous species.The two bioinformatics software predicted the same results, PROVEAN (score -6.214 and -12.79) indicated that the compound heterozygous mutation was a harmful mutation; MutationTaster (score 0.976 and 0.999) suggested that these mutations might cause corresponding disease.p.Gly276Glu protein model analysis showed that, the Glu side chain was prolonged and the molecular weight became larger, which would increase the steric hindrance between it and the surrounding amino acids, affect the normal local folding of the FⅤ protein, and eventually lead to the decrease of protein activity and content.This paper can not provide analysis of the spatial structure of p.Ser1781Arg mutant protein because of the lack of X ray 3 D structure file of FⅤ exon 16.The new compound heterozygous mutations (p.Gly276Glu and p.Ser1781Arg) identified in this study are the main reasons for the decrease in the FⅤ level of the family, among which p.Ser1781Arg is rarely reported at home and abroad.	Epigenetic and genotypic analysis of the hereditary clotting factor peptide defect family of compound hybrid mutations. Explore the mechanisms of molecular pathogenesis by detecting the phenotypes and genetic mutations of the hereditary coagulation factor peptide defect family of complex hybrid mutations. Detect the progeny and its family members (total of 3 generations of 10 people) Plasma coagulation enzyme time (PT), activation partial clotting activity time (APTT), fibrinogen (FIB), FC activity (FC), FAntigen (FAg) and other relevant coagulation indicators for clear diagnosis.Using direct DNA sequencing, all exons, flanks, 5 and 3 non-translational regions of the F5 gene were analyzed, and the corresponding mutation site regions of the family members were found to be confirmed by reverse sequencing.Using the ClustalX-2.1-win software to analyze the conservativeness of mutant amino acids, PROVEAN and MutationTaster online bioinformatics software to predict the effect of mutations on protein function, and Swiss-PdbViewer software to analyze protein models and amino acid interactions at mutation sites.The PT and APTT of the second, third, daughter and grandson of the forerunner are slightly extended, the FC and FAg are reduced to varying degrees, and the related clotting parameters of other family members are within the normal range.There is a c.911G > A heterogeneous mutation on Exon 6, which causes p. Gly276Glu, and a c.5343C > G heterogeneous mutation on Exon 16, which causes p. Ser1781Arg.The second, third, and grandsons carry the clutter of p. Gly276Glu, the daughter carries the clutter of p. Ser1781Arg, and the rest of the family members are wild.Conservative analysis showed that Gly276 and Ser1781 were highly conservative among homologous species.The predictions of two bioinformatics software were the same, with PROVIAN (scoring -6.214 and -12.79) suggesting that the compound hybrid mutation was a harmful mutation, and MutationTaster (scoring 0.976 and 0.999) suggesting that these mutations may cause the corresponding diseases.The p. Gly276Glu protein model analysis shows that the Glu side chain is extended and the molecular weight is increased, which increases the spatial resistance between it and the surrounding amino acid, affecting the normal local folding of the F protein and ultimately leading to a decrease in protein activity andDue to the absence of X-Ray 3D structure documentation for Exon F 16, it has not been possible to perform spatial structural analysis of the p.Ser1781Arg mutant protein. The new compound hybrid mutations identified in this study (p.Gly276Glu and p.Ser1781Arg) are the main causes of the F level decline in this family, with p.Ser1781Arg rarely reported inside or	Phenotype and genotype analysis of hereditary clotting factor (F) deficiency families caused by complex hybrid mutations. Phenotype and gene mutation analysis of hereditary clotting factor (F) deficiency families by detecting complex hybrid mutations and exploring its molecular pathogenesis. Detection of precursors and family members (3 generations 10 people) Plasma Thrombogen Time (PT), Activated Partial Thrombotic Activase Time (APTT), Fibrinogen (FIB), F Coagulant Activity (F: C), F Antigen (F: Ag) and other relevant clotting indicators for clear diagnosis.Direct DNA sequencing was used to analyze all exons, flanks, 5 and 3 non-translated regions of the F5 gene and corresponding mutation sites of family members, and found mutation sites confirmed by reverse sequencing.ClustalX-2.1-win software analyzes mutant amino acid conservation, PROVEAN and MutationTaster online bioinformatics software predict mutation effect on protein function, Swiss-PdbViewer software performs protein model and amino acid interaction analysis at mutation site. The precursors PT and APTT are significantly longer than normal control health checkups, 34.2 vs 13.2 s and 119.3 vs 36.0 s respectively; F: C and F: Ag are extremely lower, 3 and 6 respectively.The second child, third child, daughter and grandchild of the precursor had slightly longer PT and APTT, F: C and F: Ag decreased to varying degrees, and the relevant coagulation parameters of other family members were within the normal range.There is a c.911G > A hybrid delusion mutation on exon 6 of Precursor, resulting in p. Gly276Glu, and a c.5343C > G hybrid delusion mutation on exon 16, resulting in p. Ser1781Arg.His second son, third son and grandchild all carry p.Gly276Glu hybrids, his daughter carries p.Ser1781Arg hybrids, and other family members are wild-type.The conservative analysis showed that Gly276 and Ser1781 were highly conservative among homologous species.The two bioinformatics software predictions were the same, with PROVEAN (scores -6.214 and -12.79) suggesting that the composite hybrid mutation was a harmful mutation; MutationTaster (scores 0.976 and 0.999) suggesting that these mutations could cause corresponding diseases.p.Gly276Glu protein model analysis shows that the Glu side chain is extended and the molecular weight becomes larger, which will increase the spatial barrier between it and the surrounding amino acids, affect the normal local folding of the F protein, and ultimately lead to decreased protein activity and content.The spatial structure analysis of p.Ser1781Arg mutant protein cannot be performed because there is no X-ray 3D structure file of exon 16 F. The new complex hybrid mutations identified in this study (p.Gly276Glu and p.Ser1781Arg) are the main causes of the decline in F levels in this family, among which p.Ser1781Arg is rarely reported at home and abroad.
2019冠状病毒病(coronavirus disease 2019，COVID-19)目前已在世界范围内暴发流行，是世界性的重大公共卫生问题。严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒2(severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2，SARS-CoV-2)传染性极强，主要侵袭患者的肺，导致呼吸窘迫综合征甚至多器官衰竭。肾也是病毒攻击的主要器官之一，病毒通过血管紧张素转换酶2(ACE2)直接损伤肾小管，并引起细胞因子风暴导致肾损伤，增加患者的死亡风险。早期排查COVID-19患者肾损伤危险因素，检测肾损伤指标，对存在肾损伤的患者及时进行支持治疗及肾脏替代治疗，可降低病死率。	Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is now a major public health problem worldwide.Infectivity of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is extremely strong.The one major target of the virus is the lung, which leads to the deaths of respiratory distress syndrome and multiple organ failure.The kidney is also one of the main organs attacked by viruses, which directly damage the renal tubules through angiotensin converting enzyme-2 and cause cytokine storm, resulting in kidney damage and increasing the risk of death in the patients.Early investigation of risk factors for kidney injury, detection of kidney injury indicators, timely supporting treatment and renal replacement therapy for the existence of kidney injury patients are useful for reducing the mortality rate of COVID-19 patients.	Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is a major public health problem worldwide.Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is highly contagious and mainly attacks the lungs of patients, leading to respiratory distress syndrome and even multiple organ failure.The kidney is also one of the main organs of the virus attack, with the virus directly damaging the kidney tubule through angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and causing cytokine storms leading to kidney damage,Early detection of risk factors for kidney injury in patients with COVID-19, detection of kidney injury indicators, timely support treatment for patients with kidney injury and kidney replacement treatment can reduce mortality.	Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a major public health problem worldwide.Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is highly contagious and attacks primarily the lungs, causing respiratory distress syndrome and even multi-organ failure.The kidneys are also one of the main organs attacked by the virus, which directly damages the renal tubules through angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and causes cytokine storms leading to kidney damage, increasing theEarly detection of COVID-19 patients with kidney damage risk factors, detection of kidney damage indicators, timely support treatment and renal replacement therapy for patients with kidney damage, can reduce the mortality rate.
目的 利用2100生物分析仪结合蛋白芯片获取死后大鼠肝组织蛋白质表达谱，推测其与死亡时间的关系。方法 大鼠腹腔麻醉致死后置于16 ℃环境中，提取死后14个时间点肝组织中的水溶性蛋白质，使用蛋白芯片获取相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的蛋白质表达谱数据，并利用主成分分析（principal component analysis，PCA）、偏最小二乘-判别分析（partial least squares-discriminant analysis，PLS-DA）、Fisher判别对数据进行分析。结果 根据蛋白质表达谱的变化和PLS-DA结果将死亡时间分为A组（0 d）、B组（1~9 d）、C组（12~30 d）。经Fisher判别，模型的训练集及测试集的预测准确率均为100.0%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为100.0%。通过建立B、C组各时间点的Fisher判别模型缩小推断死亡时间窗口，B组中训练集及测试集的预测准确率均为100.0%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为100.0%；C组中训练集及测试集的预测准确率分别为95.2%、78.6%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为88.1%。结论 蛋白芯片检测技术可以快捷简便地获取大鼠死后不同时间点肝组织相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的水溶性蛋白质表达谱，建立PLS-DA及Fisher判别模型对死亡时间进行分类预测判断，有望为死亡时间推断提供新的思路和方法。	Objective To obtain the protein expression profile of rat liver tissue after death by the 2100 bioanalyzer combined with protein chip, and infer the relationship between protein expression profile and postmortem interval.Methods Rats were killed by abdominal anesthesia and placed at 16 ℃.Water-soluble proteins in liver tissues were extracted at 14 time points after death.The expression profile data of proteins with relative molecular weight of 14 000-230 000 were obtained using protein chip, and principal component analysis （PCA）, partial least squares-discriminant analysis （PLS-DA） and Fisher discriminant were used to analyze the data.Results According to the changes of protein expression profile, the postmortem interval was divided into group A （0 d）, group B （1-9 d）, group C （12-30 d） according to the result of PLS-DA.The prediction accuracy of the training set and test set of the model were all 100.0%, and the internal cross-validation of the training set was 100.0% according to Fisher discriminant.The Fisher discriminant model at each time point of group B and C was established to narrow the time window of postmortem interval estimation.The prediction accuracy of the training set and test set were all 100.0%, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set was 100.0% in group B.The prediction accuracy of the training set and test set were respectively 95.2% and 78.6% in group C, and the internal cross-validation of the training set was 88.1%.Conclusion Protein chip detection technology can quickly and easily obtain the expression profile of water-soluble proteins of rat liver tissue with a relative molecular weight of 14 000-230 000 at different time points after death.PLS-DA and Fisher discriminant models are established to classify and predict the postmortem interval, in order to provide new ideas and methods for postmortem interval estimation.	The goal was to use 2100 bioanalyzers combined with protein chips to obtain a posthumous protein expression spectrum of liver tissue in rats, speculatingMethodRat abdominal cavity anesthesia is killed and placed at 16, water-soluble proteins in liver tissue are extracted 14 time points after death, protein chips are used to obtain protein expression spectroscopy data with a relative molecular weight of 14,000-230,000, and data are analyzed using principal component analysis (PCA), partial least squares-discriminant analysis (PLS-DA), and Fisher discrimination.The result is divided into groups A (0 d), B (1-9 d), and C (12-30 d) according to changes in protein expression spectrum and PLS-DA results.Fisher determined that both the model training set and the test set had a forecast accuracy of 100.0 and that the internal cross-check accuracy of the training set was 100.0.By establishing the Fisher differential model for each time point in groups B and C, the inferred death time window is reduced to 100.0 for the training set and test set in group B, 100.0 for the internal cross validation of the training set, 95.2 for the training set and 78.6 for the test set in group C, and 88.1 for the internal cross validation of the trainingConclusion Protein chip detection technology provides quick and easy access to water-soluble protein expression spectra with a relative molecular mass of 14,000-230,000 at various points in liver tissue at different times of death in rats, and the establishment of PLS-DA and Fisher differential models to classify and predict the time of death, which is expected to provide new ideas	A 2100 bioanalyzer combined with protein chips was used to obtain protein expression profiles of post-mortem rat liver tissue and estimate its relationship with time of death.Method After death from abdominal anesthesia, rats were placed in a 16 environment to extract water-soluble proteins from liver tissue at 14 time points after death. Protein chips were used to obtain protein expression spectrum data with relative molecular masses of 14,000-230,000. The data were analyzed using principal component analysis (PCA), partial least squares-discriminant analysis (PLS-DA) and Fisher discrimination.The time of death was divided into groups A (0 d), B (1-9 d), and C (12-30 d) based on changes in protein expression spectrum and PLS-DA results.As determined by Fisher, the prediction accuracy of both the training and test sets of the model is 100.0, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set is 100.0.By building Fisher discriminant models for each time point in Group B and Group C, the prediction accuracy of the training set and test set in Group B was 100.0, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set was 100.0; the prediction accuracy of the training set and test set in Group C was 95.2 and 78.6, respectively, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training setConclusion Protein chip detection technology can quickly and easily obtain water-soluble protein expression profiles of liver tissue with relative molecular mass between 14,000 and 230,000 at different points in time after death in rats, and establish PLS-DA and Fisher discriminant models to determine the time of death by classification, which is expected to provide new ideas and methods for time of death inference
初级卫生保健为实现全民健康覆盖 (UHC) 提供了一种经济有效的途径。然而在许多中低收入国家，初级卫生保健体系非常薄弱，常常无法提供全面的以人为本的综合保健。我们利用半扎根的研究方法分析了 20 个中低收入国家的初级卫生保健体系。通过分析主题内容确定了加强初级保健体系的备选方案。我们发现：(I) 尽管非传染性疾病负担日益沉重，但许多中低收入国家仍缺乏预防服务资金；(ii) 社区卫生工作者通常资源配备不足，无法获得良好的支持，并且缺乏相应培训；(iii) 在所研究的一半国家中，医疗自费超出卫生支出总额的 40％，不利于实现公平；(iv) 公共和私人体系分散、资金不足、腐败以及非正式员工参与不足，阻碍了健康保险计划的实施。14 个国家中，私营部门基本上不受监管。此外，服务基本私有化的国家，社区很少参与初级卫生保健。一些国家权力下放，促使其初级保健分散。当财政激励措施与法规和质量提升相结合，，并且社区参与度增强时，绩效便会有所改善。应该为初级卫生保健的决策制定提供充足的资源，并将政府在初级卫生保健方面的支出至少增加国内生产总值的 1％。还需要制定提升公平的融资方案，加强初级卫生保健管理的问责。初级卫生保健体系的支持对于在截止 2030 年的十年中实现 UHC 至关重要。	Primary health care offers a cost-effective route to achieving universal health coverage (UHC).However, primary health-care systems are weak in many low- and middle-income countries and often fail to provide comprehensive, people-centred, integrated care.We analysed the primary health-care systems in 20 low- and middle-income countries using a semi-grounded approach.Options for strengthening primary health-care systems were identified by thematic content analysis.We found that: (i) despite the growing burden of noncommunicable disease, many low- and middle-income countries lacked funds for preventive services; (ii) community health workers were often under-resourced, poorly supported and lacked training; (iii) out-of-pocket expenditure exceeded 40% of total health expenditure in half the countries studied, which affected equity; and (iv) health insurance schemes were hampered by the fragmentation of public and private systems, underfunding, corruption and poor engagement of informal workers.In 14 countries, the private sector was largely unregulated.Moreover, community engagement in primary health care was weak in countries where services were largely privatized.In some countries, decentralization led to the fragmentation of primary health care.Performance improved when financial incentives were linked to regulation and quality improvement, and community involvement was strong.Policy-making should be supported by adequate resources for primary health-care implementation and government spending on primary health care should be increased by at least 1% of gross domestic product.Devising equity-enhancing financing schemes and improving the accountability of primary health-care management is also needed.Support from primary health-care systems is critical for progress towards UHC in the decade to 2030.	Primary health care provides a cost-effective way to achieve universal health coverage (UHC).However, in many low- and middle-income countries, primary health-care systems are so weak that they often fail to provide comprehensive, people-centred and integrated health care.Using a semi-rooted research methodology, we analysed the primary health-care systems of 20 low- and middle-income countries.The analysis of thematic content identified options for strengthening the primary health-care system.We found that: (i) despite the growing burden of non-communicable diseases, many low- and middle-income countries still lack funding for prevention services; (ii) community health workers are often under-resourced, poorly supported and poorly trained; (iii) out-of-pocket health spending exceeds 40 per cent of total health spending in half of the countries studied, which is not conducive to equity; and (iv) the implementation of health insurance schemes is hampered by fragmented public and private systems, underfunding, corruption and inadequate participation of informal workers.In 14 countries, the private sector is largely unregulated.Furthermore, in countries where services are largely privatized, there is little community participation in primary health care.Some countries have decentralized their primary health care.Performance improves when fiscal incentives are combined with regulatory and quality improvements and community participation is increased.Adequate resources should be made available for decision-making in primary health care and government spending on primary health care should be increased by at least 1 per cent of GDP.There is also a need for more equitable financing programmes and greater accountability in primary health-care management.Support from the primary health-care system is critical to achieving UHC by 2030.	Primary health care provides a cost-effective way to achieve universal health coverage (UHC).In many low- and middle-income countries, however, primary health care systems are very weak and often fail to provide comprehensive, people-centred integrated health care.Using semi-rooted research methods, we analyzed primary health care systems in 20 low- and middle-income countries.The analysis of thematic elements identified options for strengthening the primary health-care system.We found that: (i) despite the growing burden of NCDs, many low- and middle-income countries still lack funding for prevention services; (ii) community health workers are often under-resourced, poorly supported and lack appropriate training; (iii) out-of-pocket spending on health exceeds 40 per cent of total health spending in half of the countries studied, which is detrimental to equity; and (iv) fragmented public and private systems, underfunding, corruption and inadequate participation of informal workers hamper health insurance schemes.In 14 countries, the private sector is largely unregulated.Moreover, in countries where services are largely privatized, there is little community participation in primary health care.Decentralization in some countries has contributed to the decentralization of primary health care.Performance improves when financial incentives are combined with regulatory and quality improvements, and community participation increases.Adequate resources should be provided for decision-making in primary health care and government spending on primary health care should be increased by at least 1 per cent of GDP.Equitable financing programmes are also needed to enhance accountability in primary health-care management.Support from the primary health care system is critical to achieving UHC in the decade ending 2030.
李-佛美尼综合症是一种遗传性的疾病，大概一生中有90%的患癌几率，它要求家庭成员终身接受综合性癌症筛查。本文研究医疗保健对管理李-佛美尼综合症风险和治疗过程中所起的作用，这些风险和治疗均由家长，青少年和成年孩子们来承担着。参与研究的家庭有23个，采用半结构化的访谈。家庭的组成有2-5个家庭成员，每个家庭的较年轻一代人年龄跨度7-40岁。使用草根理论方法，我们针对访谈文稿进行了开放式和集中式解码。家庭成员描述了健康领袖的作用在家庭内如何实现的，还有孩子的成熟，某家庭成员的去世等因素，这些因素都决定了谁承担了什么角色，这些角色在一段时间范围内如何发生变化。他们通常会表达集体性的共同责任，帮助亲戚理解LFS症和实施合适的癌症风险管理。家庭成员通过陪同一起去就医来给与支持以及信息搜集的方式来实现他们的健康作用。健康领袖的作用是代际间的，提供了必要的支持给家庭，特别是在复杂的医疗保健方面的决定。我们的研究结果提供了健康医疗供给方的看法，主要是关于LFS病人和他们的亲戚如何作出特殊的医疗决策和发挥照料者的角色，这些都深受LFS遗传性特性的影响，和这些角色如何随着时间而发生变化。那些可以适应家庭角色动态变化的供给方可以较好地实现亲戚的社会心理和医疗的需要，主要是通过尽力理解承受LFS影响的家庭系统的功能，促进家庭成员们彼此的支持。	Li-Fraumeni Syndrome (LFS) is a hereditary disorder that confers an approximately 90% lifetime risk of cancer and requires comprehensive lifetime cancer screening.We explored healthcare roles for managing LFS-related cancer risks and treatments that were assumed by parents, adolescents, and adult children.Semi-structured interviews were conducted with 23 families.Family groupings were comprised of 2-5 members, with the younger generation in each family ranging in age from 7 to 40 years.Using grounded theory methods, we conducted open and focused coding of interview transcript content.Family members described how the role of health leader was implemented in their family, as well as factors such as maturation of a child or death of a member that determined who assumed particular roles and how these roles shifted over time.They often expressed collective responsibility for helping relatives understand LFS and implement appropriate cancer risk management.Members demonstrated their health role by attending others' medical appointments for support or information gathering.The health leader role was intergenerational and provided the family necessary support in navigating complicated healthcare decisions.Our findings provide insight into healthcare providers regarding how LFS patients and their relatives develop unique medical decision-making and caring roles influenced by the hereditary nature of LFS, and how these roles change over time.Providers who are attuned to family role dynamics may be better able to meet relatives' psychosocial and medical needs by understanding how living with LFS influences the family system's functioning and facilitating members' support for each other.	Lee-Formenny syndrome is a hereditary disease with a roughly 90 chance of developing cancer in a lifetime.This paper examines the role of health care in managing the risks and treatments of Lee-Formeny syndrome, which are borne by parents, adolescents, and adults.Twenty-three families involved in the study used semi-structured interviews.The family is made up of two to five family members, and the younger members of each family are between 7 and 40 years of age.Using a grassroots theoretical approach, we decoded the interview transcripts in an open and centralized manner.Family members describe how the role of a healthy leader is achieved within the family, along with the maturation of the child, the death of a family member, and other factors that determine who takes on what roles and how those roles change over time.They typically express a collective responsibility to help relatives understand LFS and implement appropriate cancer risk management.Family members are accompanied to the hospital for support and information-gathering to achieve their health role.The role of health leaders is intergenerational and provides the necessary support to families, especially in complex healthcare decisions.Our findings provide insights from health care providers, primarily about how LFS patients and their relatives make specific medical decisions and play the role of caregiver, which are strongly influenced by the genetic characteristics of LFS, and how those roles change over time.Providers who can adapt to the changing dynamics of family roles can better meet the psychosocial and medical needs of relatives, mainly by trying to understand the functions of the family system that is affected by LFS, and by promoting mutual support among family members.	Lee-Fermeni syndrome is an inherited disease that has a roughly 90 percent chance of developing cancer over a lifetime and requires family members to undergo comprehensive cancer screening throughout their lives.This paper examines the role of health care in managing the risk and treatment of Li-Fermeni syndrome, which is borne by parents, adolescents and adult children.Twenty-three families participated in the study using semi-structured interviews.Families consist of two to five family members, with younger generations in each family ranging in age from 7 to 40 years.Using a grassroots theoretical approach, we conducted open and centralized decoding of interview transcripts.Family members described how the role of health leader was realized within the family, along with factors such as the maturity of children and the death of a family member, which determined who assumed what roles and how those roles changed over time.They often express collective shared responsibility to help relatives understand LFS and implement appropriate cancer risk management.Family members achieve their health role by accompanying them to a doctor for support and information gathering.The role of health leaders is intergenerational, providing necessary support to families, especially in complex healthcare decisions.Our findings provide insights into health care providers, primarily about how LFS patients and their relatives make specific medical decisions and play caregiver roles, which are heavily influenced by LFS genetic properties, and how these roles change over time.Those providers who can adapt to the dynamics of family roles can better meet the psychosocial and medical needs of relatives, primarily by trying to understand the functioning of family systems affected by LFS and by promoting mutual support among family members.
摘要: 角膜墨染术 (Corneal keratopigmentation KTP) 在治疗角膜混浊的患者有着悠久的历史。由于KTP手术技术的更新与改进以及其并发症的低发生率, 因此通常被考虑用于治疗性或功能性适应症的患者。本文阐述了KTP在美容和功能方面的临床应用, 并讨论了KTP的手术效果及其在实验和组织病理学研究中的特点。	Corneal keratopigmentation (KTP) has a long history of use in management of patients suffering from disfiguring corneal opacities.Due to progresses and modifications in KTP surgical techniques and its low rate of complications, it is taken into consideration to be used in selected groups of patients for therapeutic or functional indications.In this paper we present an overview on clinical applications of KTP in both cosmetic and functional aspects and also, we discuss the outcomes of KTP and its characteristics in experimental and histopathological studies.	Abstract: Corneal keratopigmentation KTP has a long history in treating patients with corneal chaos.Due to the modernization and improvement of KTP surgery techniques and the low incidence of complications, it is often considered for patients with therapeutic or functional indications.This paper describes the clinical applications of KTP in beauty and function and discusses the efficacy of KTP surgery and its characteristics in experimental and histopathological studies.	Corneal keratopigmentation (KTP) has a long history of treating patients with corneal opacity.Due to the updating and improvement of KTP surgical techniques and its low incidence of complications, it is often considered for therapeutic or functional indications.This paper describes the clinical application of KTP in cosmetic and functional aspects and discusses the surgical effects of KTP and its characteristics in experimental and histopathological studies.
从血管外科视角探讨胫骨横向骨搬移技术治疗下肢慢性缺血性疾病时，需满足的血管条件及血管重建的必要性。回顾分析 2014 年 2 月—2019 年 7 月采用胫骨横向骨搬移技术治疗的 59 例下肢慢性缺血性疾病患者临床资料。其中，糖尿病足（diabetic foot，DF）患者 41 例，Wagner 3～4 级、Texas 2～3 级、B～D 期病变；病程 0.7～2.4 年，平均 1.5 年；合并下肢动脉硬化闭塞症（arteriosclerosis obliteran，ASO）5 例。ASO 患者 14 例，病程 1.5～23.4 个月，平均 10.8 个月；Fontaine Ⅳ期、Rutherford Ⅲ～Ⅳ期。下肢血栓闭塞性脉管炎（thromboangiitis obliteran，TAO）患者 4 例，病程 2.1～18.2 个月，平均 12.3 个月；临床分期均为三期。其中，18 例术前胫前或胫后动脉踝肱指数（ankle brachial index，ABI）<0.6，或者影像学检查膝下胫前动脉的 3 条分支均未通达踝部者，行血管重建开通上游血管（DF 合并 ASO 5 例、ASO 12 例、TAO 1 例）。术后通过溃疡创面愈合情况、皮温、疼痛视觉模拟评分（VAS）、ABI、CT 血管造影（CT angiography，CTA）检查等进行疗效评估。DF 患者获随访 8～16 个月，平均 12.2 个月；溃疡创面均愈合，愈合时间 5.1～9.2 周，平均 6.8 周；5 例行血管重建者术后 CTA 观察膝下胫前动脉分支血管再通；胫骨截骨均愈合，愈合时间 5～14 周，平均 8.3 周。ASO 患者获随访 13～25 个月，平均 16.8 个月；溃疡创面愈合时间 6.2～9.7 周，平均 7.4 周；其中 12 例血管重建者术后 CTA 检查显示膝下胫前动脉分支再通；胫骨截骨均愈合，愈合时间 4.5～14.4 周，平均 10.2 周。TAO 患者获随访 12～23 个月，平均 12.3 个月；治疗无效最终行截趾/肢。根据患者是否血管重建分组分析，联合血管重建组术后 6 个月 ABI、VAS 评分、皮温均较术前明显改善（  胫前和/或胫后动脉 ABI≥0.6、影像学检查显示膝下胫前动脉 3 条分支中至少 1 条通达踝部，是胫骨横向骨搬移技术治疗下肢慢性缺血性疾病取得成功的前提条件。DF 是胫骨横向骨搬移技术的适应证，ASO 可选用胫骨横向骨搬移技术，TAO 慎用该技术。	To explore the vascular conditions and the necessity of vascular reconstruction in the treatment of chronic ischemic diseases of lower extremities with tibial transverse transport (TTT) from the perspective of vascular surgery.A clinical data of 59 patients with chronic ischemic disease of lower extremities treated by TTT between February 2014 and July 2019 were analyzed retrospectively.Among them, there were 41 patients with diabetic foot (DF), including Wagner grade 3-4, Texas grade 2-3, and stage B-D lesions; the disease duration ranged from 0.7 to 2.4 years, with an average of 1.5 years, and 5 cases complicated with arteriosclerosis obliteran (ASO).There were 14 patients with ASO (Fontaine stage Ⅳ and Rutherford stage Ⅲ-Ⅳ) with an average disease duration of 10.8 months (range, 1.5-23.4 months).There were 4 patients with thromboangiitis obliteran (TAO) with an average disease duration of 12.3 months (range, 2.1-18.2 months), and the clinical stages were all in the third stage.In 18 patients that ankle brachial index (ABI) of anterior or posterior tibial artery was less than 0.6 before operation, or the blood flow of the three branches of inferior anterior tibial artery did not reach the ankle by imaging examination, vascular reconstruction was performed before TTT (5 cases of DF combined with ASO, 12 of ASO, 1 of TAO).After operation, the effectiveness was evaluated by ulcer wound healing, skin temperature, pain visual analogue scale (VAS) score, ABI, and CT angiography (CTA) examination.The patients with DF were followed up 8-16 months (mean, 12.2 months); the ulcer wounds healed with a healing time of 5.1-9.2 weeks (mean, 6.8 weeks); CTA examination showed that the branches of inferior anterior tibial artery were opened in 5 patients after revascularization; and the tibial osteotomy healed for 5-14 weeks (mean, 8.3 weeks).The patients with ASO were followed up 13-25 months (mean, 16.8 months); the ulcer wounds healed with a healing time of 6.2-9.7 weeks (mean, 7.4 weeks).CTA examination showed that the branches of inferior anterior tibial artery were opened in 12 patients after revascularization; all tibial osteotomy healed, and the healing time was 4.5-14.4 weeks (mean, 10.2 weeks).The patients with TAO were followed up 12-23 months with an average of 12.3 months, and toe/limb amputation was performed after ineffective treatment.The patients were divided into two groups according to whether they were combined with revascularization or not.The ABI, VAS score, and skin temperature in the combined revascularization group significantly improved at 6 months after operation (  The ABI of anterior or posterior tibial artery is more than 0.6, radiological examination shows that at least one of the three branches of inferior anterior tibial artery leads to ankle artery, which is a prerequisite for successful TTT in the treatment of chronic ischemic disease of lower extremities. DF is the indication of TTT. ASO can choose TTT, and TAO should use this technique cautiously.	Vascular conditions to be met and the need for blood vessel reconstruction when examining transverse hip bone removal techniques to treat chronic ischaemic diseases in the lower leg from a vascular surgical perspective.Review and analysis of clinical data of 59 patients with chronic ischemic disease of lower limb treated with transverse hip bone removal from February 2014 to July 2019.There were 41 cases of diabetic foot (DF), Wagner stage 3-4, Texas stage 2-3, B-D lesions; 0.7-2.4 years of disease, average 1.5 years; and five cases of arteriosclerosis obliteran (ASO).14 cases of ASO, 1.5-23.4 months, average 10.8 months; Fontaine, Rutherford.There were four cases of thromboangiitis obliteran (TAO) in patients with a course of 2.1-18.2 months and an average of 12.3 months.Of these, 18 cases of ankle brachial index (ABI) 0.6, or three branches of imaging examination of an ankle anterior artery without access to the ankle, were reconstructed to open upstream blood vessels (DF combined ASO 5, ASO 12, TAO 1).After surgery, the efficacy is assessed by ulcer wound healing, skin temperature, pain visual simulation score (VAS), ABI, CT angiography (CTA) examination, etc.DF patients were followed up for 8 to 16 months, averaging 12.2 months; ulcer wounds were healed, healing time was 5.1 to 9.2 weeks, averaging 6.8 weeks; 5 routine vascular reconstruction after the CTA to see the anterior temporal artery in the knee branched blood vessels rerouted; jaw bone amputations were healed, healing time was 5 to 14 weeks, averagingThe ASO patients were followed up for 13-25 months, averaging 16.8 months; the ulcer wound healed for 6.2-9.7 weeks, averaging 7.4 weeks; the CTA examination of 12 vascular reconstructors showed that the anterior temporal artery in the knee was open again; and the fibula was healed for 4.5-14.4 weeks, averaging 10.2 weeks.TAO patients were followed up for 12 to 23 months, averaging 12.3 months; the treatment was ineffective and ended up amputated.Based on the analysis of the blood vessel reconstruction group, ABI, VAS scores, and Pivot were significantly improved six months after surgery (ABI 0.6 in the anterior and / or posterior arteries and at least 1 in 3 branches of the anterior temporal artery in the knee).DF is the adaptation of the transverse bone transport technology of the tibia, ASO can choose the transverse bone transport technology of the tibia, TAO uses this technology with caution.	Vascular surgery to discuss the need for vascular conditions and vascular reconstruction in the treatment of chronic ischemic disease of lower limbs by transversal bone transfer technology.Review and analyze clinical data of 59 patients with chronic ischemic disease of lower extremities treated with transversal bone transfer technique from February 2014 to July 2019.Among them, 41 patients with diabetic foot (DF), Wagner 3-4, Texas 2-3, B-D lesions; course 0.7-2.4 years, average 1.5 years; combined with lower limb arteriosclerosis obliteran (ASO) 5 cases.14 ASO patients, course 1.5-23.4 months, average 10.8 months; Fontaine, Rutherford.Lower limb thromboangiitis obliteran (TAO) 4 patients, course 2.1-18.2 months, average 12.3 months; clinical stages are three stages.Among them, 18 cases of pre- and post-surgical ankle brachial index (ABI) 0.6, or imaging examination of the knee anterior artery without three branches reaching the ankle, vascular reconstruction opened the upper blood vessels (DF combined ASO 5 cases, ASO 12 cases, TAO 1 case).After surgery, the effectiveness of treatment is evaluated by ulcer wound healing, skin temperature, pain visual simulation score (VAS), ABI, CT angiography (CTA) examination, etc.DF patients were followed for 8-16 months with an average of 12.2 months; ulcer wounds were healed with a healing time of 5.1-9.2 weeks with an average of 6.8 weeks; 5 routine vascular reconstructors observed vascular reconnection of the anterior sacral artery branch of the knee after CTA surgery; tibia osteotomy both healed with a healing time of 5ASO patients were followed up for 13-25 months with an average of 16.8 months; ulcer wound healing time was 6.2-9.7 weeks with an average of 7.4 weeks; 12 cases of vascular reconstruction showed anterior knee artery branch recommunication; tibia osteotomy both healed with a healing time of 4.5-14.4 weeks with an average of 10.2 weeks.Patients with TAO were followed up for 12-23 months, averaging 12.3 months; treatment was ineffective and eventually amputated toes / limbs.ABI, VAS score, and skin temperature in the combined vascular reconstruction group improved significantly over 6 months after surgery (ABI 0.6 in the anterior and / or posterior cranial arteries). Imaging showed that at least one of the three branches of the anterior cranial artery in the knee reaches the ankle.DF is an adaptation of transversal humerus bone transfer technology, ASO can choose transversal humerus bone transfer technology, TAO carefully use this technology.
研究急性早幼粒细胞白血病（APL）患者呼气成分中的挥发性有机化合物（VOC）特征，探讨VOC用于APL诊断及疗效评估的可行性. 以APL患者和健康人为研究对象，采用SPME-GC/MS技术检测受试者呼出气体中的VOC；比较分析APL初诊组、复发组、缓解组和健康组呼气中的VOC成分，使用Kruskal-Wallis方差分析APL不同疾病状态组特征性VOC差异并应用Dunn-Bonferroni检验进行两两比较. 初诊APL患者的二甲基硫醚、甲苯和十二烷值明显高于健康人，而乙醇、正己烷和苯甲醛值明显低于健康人（P<0.05）。与初诊组相比，缓解组二甲基硫醚、甲苯和十二烷明显减少，乙醇、正己烷和苯甲醛明显增加（P<0.05），而复发组的VOC与缓解组正好相反. 二甲基硫醚、甲苯、十二烷、乙醇、苯甲醛和正己烷可作为APL诊断和病情评估的生物标记物。	To analyze the characteristics of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) in expiratory air components of patients with acute promyelocytic leukemia (APL), and assess the feasibility of VOCs for the diagnosis and prognostic evaluation of APL.The VOCs exhaled from the patients with APL and healthy volunteers should be analyzed with SPME-GC/MS, and compared between newly-diagnosed group, relapse group, remission group, and healthy group with Wilcoxon/Kruskal-Wallis one-way analysis of variance and Dunn-Bonferroni test.Dimethyl sulfide, toluene, and dodecane obtained of newly-diagnosed APL patients were significantly higher, while ethanol, n-hexanal, and benzaldehyde were significantly lower than those of healthy people (P<0.05).Compared with the newly-diagnosed group, dimethylsulfide, toluene, and dodecane of the remission group significantly decreased, while ethanol, n-hexanal, and benzaldehyde significantly increased (P<0.05), which was just opposite from the relapse group.Dimethyl sulfide, toluene, dodecane, ethanol, n-hexanal, and benzaldehyde can be used as biomarkers for the diagnosis and prognosis assessment of APL patients.	VOCs in exhalation components in acute preyloid leukemia (APL) patients were studied to explore the feasibility of VOCs for APL diagnosis and efficacy evaluation. VOCs in respiration were tested in APL patients and healthy people using SPME-GC / MS technology; VOCs in APL first-instance, relapse, remission, and health expirations were compared using Kruskal-Wallis variance analysis of APL characteristic VOCs in different disease states and using the Dunn-Bonferoni test.In the mitigation group, dimethyl thioethers, toluene and dodecane were significantly reduced, ethanol, n-hexane and benzaldehyde were significantly increased (P 0.05) compared to the initial treatment group, while the VOC in the relapse group was the opposite of the mitigation group. Dimethyl thioethers, toluene, dodecane, ethanol, benzald	In the study of patients with acute early granulocytic leukemia (APL), the characteristics of volatile organic compounds (VOC) in the breath composition of patients with APL were studied and the feasibility of VOC for APL diagnosis and efficacy evaluation was discussed. Using SPME-GC / MS technology to detect VOC in exhaled gas; comparing VOC in APL initial diagnosis group, relapse group, remission group and healthy group; comparing VOC in APL initial diagnosis group, Kruskal-Wallis variance analysis and Dunn-Bonferroni test.Dimethyl sulfide, toluene and dodecane decreased significantly in the mitigation group compared to the initial group, ethanol, n-hexane and benzaldehyde increased significantly (P 0.05), while VOC in the relapsed group was the opposite from the remission group.
