精神卫生问题的发生、发展及对其管理都需要相对较长的时间，所以相当一部分精神病学研究—— 特别是能够明确回答有关生物、心理和社会因素复杂的相互作用的研究——要求对患者及其生活环境进行跨时长久的多种评估。然而，许多精神病学的研究人员使用不正确的统计方法来分析这一类型的纵向数据，这一问题会导致分析结果中出现无法识别的偏倚而由此得出不正确的结论。本文就纵向数据分析的话题做了介绍。文章探讨了纵向数据分析中使用的不同数据集结构、缺失数据的分类和处理以及使用纵向数据建立多元回归模型时对个体内相关性校正的方法。	The onset, course, and management of mental health problems typically occur over relatively long periods of time, so a substantial proportion of psychiatric research - particularly the research that can provide clear answers about the complex interaction of biological, psychological, and social factors - requires multiple assessments of individuals and the environments in which they live over time.However, many psychiatric researchers use incorrect statistical methods to analyze this type of longitudinal data, a problem that can result in unrecognized bias in analytic results and, thus, incorrect conclusions.This paper provides an introduction to the topic of longitudinal data analysis.It discusses the different dataset structures used in the analysis of longitudinal data, the classification and management of missing data, and methods of adjusting for intra-individual correlation when developing multivariate regression models using longitudinal data.	Given the relatively long time it takes for mental health problems to develop, develop, and manage them, a considerable amount of psychiatric research - especially research that explicitly answers the complex interplay of biological, psychological, and social factors - requires a wide range of assessments of patients and their environment over time.However, many researchers in psychiatry use incorrect statistical methods to analyze this type of longitudinal data, a problem that can lead to an unrecognizable bias in the results of the analysis, leading to incorrect conclusions.The topic of longitudinal data analysis is presented.The paper explores the different data set structures used in longitudinal data analysis, the classification and processing of missing data, and methods of correcting for intra-individual correlation when using longitudinal data to build	Mental health problems occur, develop, and manage over a relatively long period of time, so a significant portion of psychiatric research - particularly those that answer clearly about the complex interplay of biological, psychological, and social factors - requires multiple assessments of patients and their living environment over time and over time.However, many researchers in psychiatry use incorrect statistical methods to analyze this type of longitudinal data, a problem that can lead to unrecognizable biases in analysis results that lead to incorrect conclusions.This article introduces the topic of longitudinal data analysis.The paper explores the different dataset structures used in longitudinal data analysis, the classification and processing of missing data, and methods of in-person correlation correction when building multivariate regression models using longitud
结合针灸针材料特性、新兴连接技术与注塑工艺，并经过力学测试，研制一种通过靠近即可与针灸针连接、外型规则、制作工艺简单的新型电针仪磁力接头。此接头由内层的磁体接头与外层的接头保护套构成，应用新兴导电胶连接简化装置制作工艺，其优势是依靠磁力与针灸针连接、闲置时便于存放且易于切换成工作状态、紧急情况下可迅速断开连接。接头与针灸针依靠磁力安全牢固连接，缩短操作时间，提高工作效率，有效解决目前鳄鱼夹接头存在的问题。	Combined with the material characteristics of acupuncture needle, new connection technology and injection moulding technology, and through mechanical test, a new type of magnetic joint for electroacupuncture instrument, with regular appearance and simple manufacturing process, is developed, which can be connected with acupuncture needle in close range.This joint is composed of the inner magnet joint and the outer joint protective sleeve.The new conductive adhesive is used to simplify the manufacturing process.Its advantages include connection with acupuncture needle by magnetic force, being convenient to store when idle and easy to switch to the working state, and quick disconnection in case of emergency.This joint is connected safely and firmly with acupuncture needle by magnetic force, which shortens the operation time, improves the working efficiency, and effectively solves the problems existing in the crocodile clip connector.	Combining the material characteristics of acupuncture needle, emerging connection technology and injection molding process, and through mechanical testing, we have developed a new electric needle meter magnetic connector that can be connected to acupuncture needle by close proximity, with simple appearance rules and production processThis joint consists of the inner magnet connector and the outer joint protective sleeve, using the new conductive glue connection simplified device production process, the advantages of relying on magnetic and acupuncture needle connection, easy storage in idle and easy to switch to working state, can quickly disconnect in emergency.The connector and acupuncture needle rely on magnetic safety and firm connection, shorten the operating time, improve the efficiency, and effectively solve the problem of the crocodile clip	Combining acupuncture needle material characteristics, emerging connection technology and injection molding technology, and after mechanical testing, developed a new type of electric needle meter magnetic joint that can be connected with acupuncture needle by proximity, shape rules, and production process is simple.This joint consists of the inner magnet joint and the outer joint protective sleeve. It simplifies the device manufacturing process by applying new conductive adhesive connection. Its advantage is that it relies on magnetic force and acupuncture needle connection, easy to store when idle and easy to switch to working state.The joint and needle rely on magnetic safety and secure connection, shorten the operation time, improve work efficiency, effectively solve the current problems of crocodile clip joint.
和高收入的伴侣相比,低收入伴侣之间的关系解体的比率要高得多,这种伴侣关系瓦解包括离婚和与同居的伴侣分手。认识到关系干预措施对关系发展的结果能造成差异,相关措施越来越多地针对此类人群使用。然而,这些干预对低收入伴侣的关系的影响却非常有限。面向低收入伴侣的关系干预措施要想有效且能对其需求有针对性回应,就需要描述类的数据,这些数据能反映这些伴侣自己如何看待他们关系出现的问题,以及和高收入的伴侣使用的代表性的干预措施比起来,他们如何评估他们自己的需要。本研究的样本来自网上招募的5,000个个体,他们在网上寻求关系干预,他们也比较低收入伴侣和较高收入伴侣这两类人群的关系状况和生活状况。结果表明低收入伴侣寻求关系干预时,关系经历着更高水平的痛苦(较低的关系满意度、主要关系问题更严重、关系稳定性也较差),整个生活境况也出现更高水平的紧张程度 (更多孩子在家生活、更不可能有全职的工作、健康状态堪忧)。结果表明在未来开发设计的干预措施应该着眼于低收入伴侣的需求,那些治疗低收入伴侣的医师也都要有准备去处理更高水平的关系紧张程度,导致他们生活环境紧张的多重因素,而这些是平日治疗更富足的伴侣时不常见的。	Compared to higher-income couples, low-income couples experience higher rates of relationship disruption, including divorce and breakup of cohabiting relationships.In recognition of this disparity in relationship outcomes, relationship interventions have increasingly been targeted at this population.However, these interventions have had limited impacts on the relationships of low-income couples.Developing interventions that are effective and responsive to the needs of low-income couples requires descriptive data on the challenges those couples perceive in their own relationships and an assessment of how their needs compare to the more affluent couples typically served by relationship interventions.The current study sampled over 5,000 individuals at the time they were seeking an online relationship intervention and compared the relationship functioning and life circumstances reported by low-income individuals to that of higher-income individuals.Results indicate that low-income individuals seeking a relationship intervention had higher levels of relationship distress (lower relationship satisfaction, more intense primary relationship problems, and less relationship stability), and had greater levels of contextual stress (more children living at home, less likely to be employed full-time, and lower levels of perceived health).Results suggest that future interventions designed to target low-income couples, as well as practitioners working with low-income couples, should be prepared to handle higher levels of relationship distress and contextual stressors than they may typically see in more affluent couples.	Compared to high-income partners, low-income partners have a much higher rate of dissolution of relationships, which includes divorce and separation from partners who live together.Recognizing that relationship interventions can make a difference in the outcomes of relationship development, they are increasingly targeted at such populations.However, the impact of these interventions on the relationships of low-income partners has been very limited.To be effective and responsive to the needs of low-income partners, relationship interventions require descriptive data that reflect how the partners themselves perceive problems in their relationships and how they assess their own needs compared with representative interventions used by high-income partners.The study was based on a sample of 5,000 individuals recruited online to seek relationship interventions, and they also compared the relationship status and living conditions of both low-income and higher-income partners.The results showed that when low-income partners sought relationship interventions, the relationship experienced a higher level of distress (lower relationship satisfaction, greater major relationship problems, and poorer relationship stability), and a higher level of tension in the overall life situation (more children living at home, less likely to work full-time, and poor health).The results suggest that interventions designed in the future should focus on the needs of low-income partners, and that physicians who treat low-income partners should also be prepared to deal with higher levels of relationship tension, the multiple factors that lead to stress in their living environment, which are not common when treating richer partners on weekdays.	Low-income partners have a much higher rate of relationship breakdowns than high-income partners, including divorce and breakup from cohabiting partners.Recognizing that relational interventions can make a difference in relationship development outcomes, interventions are increasingly targeted at such populations.However, the impact of these interventions on relationships with low-income partners has been very limited.For relationship interventions for low-income partners to be effective and responsive to their needs, they need to describe data that reflect how the partners themselves perceive problems in their relationships and how they assess their own needs compared to representative interventions used by high-income partners.A sample of 5,000 individuals recruited online for relationship intervention also compared the relationship status and living conditions of both low-income and higher-income partners.The results showed that when low-income partners sought relationship intervention, the relationship experienced higher levels of distress (lower relationship satisfaction, more major relationship problems, less relationship stability) and higher levels of stress in overall life situations (more children living at home, less likely to have full-time employment, poor health).The results suggest that interventions designed for future development should focus on the needs of low-income partners, and that physicians who treat low-income partners should be prepared to deal with higher levels of relationship stress and multiple factors that contribute to their stressful environment, which are not common in more affluent partners on a daily basis.
随着工业的发展，肌肉骨骼疾患问题日渐凸显，下背痛是主要问题之一，美国和德国已将其纳入职业病范畴。因此确定影响下背痛的职业因素，对工人的负荷水平进行评估，具有重要意义。本文结合已有文献，对下背痛负荷的评价方法进行综述，以期从职业因素层面为制定下背痛的预防策略提供参考。	With the development of industry, musculoskeletal disorders have become increasingly prominent, and low back pain is one of the major problems.The United States and Germany have already included it in the category of occupational diseases.Therefore, it is extremely important to determine the occupational factors affecting low back pain and evaluate the load level of workers.In this paper, combined with the existing literature, the evaluation methods of the load of low back pain were reviewed, in order to provide reference for the development of prevention strategies of low back pain from the perspective of occupational factors.	With the development of industry, musculoskeletal disease has become more prominent, with lower back pain being one of the major problems, and it has been included in occupational diseases in theIt is therefore important to identify occupational factors affecting lower back pain and to assess the load levels of workers.Taking into account the existing literature, this paper provides an overview of how to evaluate lower back pain load, with a view to informing the development of lower back pain prevention strategies at the occupational level.	With the development of industry, musculoskeletal diseases have become increasingly problematic, with lower back pain being one of the main problems, and the United States and Germany have included it in theTherefore, it is important to determine the occupational factors that affect lower back pain and assess the load level of workers.This paper provides a review of the evaluation methods of low back pain load in conjunction with existing literature to inform the development of prevention strategies for low back pain at the occupational level.
研究认为男子童年时期的不良经历（ACEs）和精神创伤症状与其IPV犯罪行为（亲密伴侣暴力）和被虐待经历是有关联的，但是针对暴力实施干预措施时起到阻碍作用的几个重要方面尚未得到深入研究。具体而言，创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）主导了该领域所研究的创伤症状的范围，限制了研究者对创伤的其他表现形式的理解，尤其是男子的创伤。此外，大多数研究只侧重于男性在身体方面的 IPV 犯罪行为，很少聚焦于诸如其他类型的 IPV行为、暴力严重程度或男性受迫害等研究方向。另外，很少有研究关注基于ACE框架的可能性保护因素，例如临床人群的觉知行为。最后，大多数研究的对象还尚未关注到有色人种，尽管一些种族/少数民族群体对IPV的接触率比较高。基于以上原因，本研究调查了IPV的发生频率和严重程度（心理、身体、伤害）与ACES、PTSD、创伤症状学（与PTSD区别开来），还有觉知的自我效能之间的相互关联。样本来自67个有色人种的男子，他们大多数属于低收入，正在参与虐妻行为干预计划。超过一半的样本（51.5%）报告曾经经历过四次或四次以上 ACEs ，有31.1%的被研究对象 满足疑似 PTSD 病人诊断标准。较高的 ACE 分数预测了几乎所有类型的自报 的较高IPV 犯罪率和较高的受害比例。PTSD 症状和复杂性创伤症状的严重程度综合在一起解释了 13% 到 40% 的 IPV 结果，而且每种结果都与某些类型的自报 的IPV 受害和暴力实施频率和严重程度有独特的关联性。觉知的自我效能与犯罪行为和受害经历发生减少，自我报告的心理方面的IPV频率和严重程度呈减少趋势有关。本研究综述了针对非主流的边缘化男性群体所采取的相关临床措施，包括筛查、培训和可能采用的治疗性干预方法。	Adverse childhood experiences (ACEs) and trauma symptoms have been linked with intimate partner violence (IPV) perpetration and victimization among men, yet the field lacks depth in several key areas hampering progress toward violence intervention.Specifically, posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD) dominates the field's scope of trauma symptoms under study, limiting understanding of other manifestations of trauma especially among men.Furthermore, most research focuses exclusively on men's physical IPV perpetration and rarely focuses on other types of IPV, severity of violence, or men's victimization.Also, few studies examine potential protective factors grounded in the ACE framework, such as mindfulness, among clinical populations.Finally, most research has not focused on men of color, despite some racial/ethnic minority groups disproportionate rates of IPV exposure.Therefore, the relationships between IPV frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injury) and ACEs, PTSD, trauma symptomology (separate from PTSD), and mindfulness self-efficacy were examined in a sample of 67 predominantly low-income men of color in a batterer intervention program.More than half of the sample (51.5%) reported exposure to four or more ACEs, and 31.1% met the clinical cutoff for a probable PTSD diagnosis.Higher ACE scores predicted increased rates for nearly all types of self-reported IPV perpetration and victimization.PTSD symptoms and complex trauma symptom severity together explained between 13% and 40% of IPV outcomes, and each was uniquely associated with certain types of self-reported IPV victimization and perpetration frequency and severity.Mindfulness self-efficacy was associated with decreased self-report psychological IPV perpetration and victimization frequency and severity.Clinical implications relevant to marginalized men are reviewed, including screening, training, and potential therapeutic interventions.	Studies have linked men's adverse childhood experiences (ACEs) and trauma symptoms to their IPV offending (intimate-partner violence) and abusive experiences, but several important aspects that act as a disincentive when it comes to violence interventions have not been studied.In particular, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) dominates the range of trauma symptoms studied in this area, limiting researchers "understanding of other manifestations of trauma, particularly in men.In addition, most studies focus only on physical IPV crimes committed by men, with little focus on research directions such as other types of IPV behavior, severity of violence or male persecution.In addition, few studies have focused on potential protective factors based on the ACE framework, such as cognitive behavior in clinical populations.Finally, most of the study's subjects have yet to focus on people of color, although some racial / ethnic minority groups have higher rates of exposure to IPV.For these reasons, the study investigated the correlation between the frequency and severity of IPV occurrence (psychological, physical, injury) and ACES, PTSD, trauma symptomology (distinct from PTSD), and conscious self-efficacy.The sample comes from 67 men of color, most of whom are low-income and are participating in wife-abuse intervention programs.More than half of the sample (51.5) reported having experienced ACEs four or more times, and 31.1 of those studied met the criteria for diagnosis of suspected PTSD in patients.Higher ACE scores predict higher IPV crime and higher victimization rates for almost all types of self-reported crimes.The combination of PTSD symptoms and the severity of complex trauma symptoms explains between 13 and 40 percent of IPV outcomes, and each outcome is uniquely correlated with the frequency and severity of certain types of self-reported IPV victimization and violence.Conscious self-efficacy is associated with a decrease in the incidence of crime and victimization experiences, and a decrease in the frequency and severity of self-reported psychological aspects of IPV.The study provides an overview of relevant clinical interventions, including screening, training and possible therapeutic interventions, for non-dominant and marginalized groups of men.	Studies have linked men's adverse childhood experiences (ACEs) and trauma symptoms to their IPV criminal behaviour (intimate partner violence) and abuse experiences, but several important aspects that act as barriers to violence interventions have not been thoroughly studied.Specifically, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) dominates the range of trauma symptoms studied in the field, limiting researchers' understanding of other manifestations of trauma, particularly in men.In addition, most studies focus only on men's physical aspects of IPV criminal behavior, with little focus on areas of research such as other types of IPV behavior, severity of violence or male persecution.Also, few studies have focused on possible protective factors based on the ACE framework, such as cognitive behavior in clinical populations.Finally, most study participants have yet to focus on people of color, although some racial / ethnic minority groups have relatively high rates of exposure to IPV.For these reasons, this study investigates the correlation between frequency and severity of IPV (psychological, physical, injury) and ACES, PTSD, trauma symptomology (as distinct from PTSD), and conscious self-efficacy.The sample was drawn from 67 men of color, most of whom were low income and were participating in a wife abuse intervention program.More than half of the samples (51.5 percent) reported having experienced four or more ACEs, and 31.1 percent of those studied met diagnostic criteria for patients with suspected PTSD.Higher ACE scores predict higher self-reported IPV crime rates and higher victimization rates for almost all types.The severity of PTSD symptoms and complex trauma symptoms combined explain 13 to 40 percent of IPV outcomes, and each result is uniquely associated with the frequency and severity of certain types of self-reported IPV victimization and violence.Awareness of self-efficacy is associated with a decrease in criminal behaviour and victimization experiences and a decrease in the frequency and severity of self-reported psychological aspects of IPV.This study provides an overview of relevant clinical interventions targeting non-mainstream marginalized groups of men, including screening, training and possible therapeutic interventions.
家庭成员间的紧密联系对青少年的幸福有着重要的影响，有助于他们的身体、心理和社会健康。但是，人们对于这些作用的潜在机制知之甚少。本研究是一项长期性研究，考察了青少年认识的家庭成员间的紧密联系的过程，该过程预测了随着时间的推移，青少年有较多的积极健康行为和较少的消极健康行为。我们尤其是着力弄清楚适应性的和调适性不良的应对策略是否调和了家庭紧密性与青少年方面自我报告的健康状况之间的联系。此研究的数据来自1774名10至17岁的新西兰青少年，他们一年一次完成3次自我报告问卷调查。通过使用纵向调解路径模型，我们测试了T2的适应不良和适应性应对策略是否在T1的家庭紧密性与在T3的总体健康、活力、睡眠充足、身体满意度、物质使用和自我伤害之间起调和作用。研究结果表明，紧密的家庭关系预示着适应性应对能力的水平偏高，而适应性应对能力则预示着健康指标会提高，但疾病指标却没有下降。此外，家庭成员间的紧密联系预示了面对压力挫折时的调适不良情况的降低，这反过来又预示了积极的健康结果水平更高和不良的健康结果偏少。本研究的结果表明，家庭成员的紧密联系对青少年健康有积极影响，它是通过增加使用适应性应对策略，减少使用应对压力挫折时的不良调适策略，或两者兼而有之。这些结果对于以青少年和父母为工作对象的临床治疗师以及开发促进健康计划的相关人员具有重要意义。	Family connectedness has important implications for adolescents' well-being, contributing to their physical, psychological, and social health.However, little is known about the mechanisms underlying these effects.The present longitudinal study examined the process by which family connectedness, as perceived by adolescents, predicted greater positive and fewer negative health behaviors in adolescents over time.In particular, we sought to determine whether adaptive and maladaptive coping strategies mediated the link between family connectedness and adolescents' self-reported health status.Data were obtained from 1,774 New Zealand adolescents aged 10-17 years, who completed a self-report survey three times at one-year intervals.With longitudinal mediation path models, we tested whether maladaptive and adaptive coping strategies at T2 functioned as mediators between family connectedness at T1 and overall health, vitality, sleep sufficiency, body satisfaction, substance use, and self-harm at T3.Findings revealed that family connectedness predicted greater levels of adaptive coping, which, in turn, predicted better health indicators but not decreases in ill-health indicators.Furthermore, family connectedness predicted lower maladaptive coping, which, in turn, predicted higher levels of positive health outcomes and fewer negative health outcomes.Results showed that the positive effect of family connectedness on adolescents' health occurred through increased use of adaptive coping strategies, decreased use of maladaptive coping strategies, or both.These results have important implications for practitioners working with adolescents and parents, as well as for health promotion program developers.	Strong bonds between family members have an important impact on the well-being of adolescents and contribute to their physical, psychological and social health.But little is known about the potential mechanisms of these roles.The study, a long-term study, examined the process of close bonding between family members that teens knew was predicted to have more positive and less negative health behaviors over time.In particular, we focus on finding out whether adaptive and maladaptive coping strategies reconcile family tightness with self-reported health outcomes among adolescents.The data for the study came from 1,774 New Zealand teenagers aged 10 to 17 who completed a self-reported questionnaire three times a year.Using the longitudinal mediation pathway model, we tested whether T2's maladaptive and adaptive coping strategies played a reconciling role between T1 "s family tightness and T3" s overall health, vitality, adequate sleep, physical satisfaction, substance useThe findings show that close family ties signal high levels of adaptive coping abilities, which predict higher health indicators but no decline in disease indicators.In addition, the close bond between family members indicates a reduction in maladaptation in the face of stress setbacks, which in turn indicates higher levels of positive health outcomes and lower levels of poor health outcomes.The findings of this study show that close bonds among family members have a positive impact on adolescent health by increasing the use of adaptive coping strategies, reducing the use of maladaptive strategies when coping with stress setbacks, or both.These results are important for clinical therapists working with adolescents and parents, as well as those involved in developing health promotion programs.	Strong ties between family members have an important impact on the well-being of adolescents and contribute to their physical, psychological and social well-being.However, little is known about the underlying mechanisms of these roles.The present study is a long-term study that examined the process of strong bonds between family members that teens knew, which predicted that teens would have more positive health behaviors and fewer negative health behaviors over time.In particular, we sought to find out whether adaptive and poorly adapted coping strategies reconcile family closeness with self-reported adolescent health.The study used data from 1,774 New Zealand teenagers aged 10 to 17 who completed three self-report questionnaires a year.Using a longitudinal mediation pathway model, we tested whether maladaptive and adaptive coping strategies in T2 reconcile family tightness in T1 with overall health, vitality, adequate sleep, body satisfaction, substance use and self-harm in T3.The results showed that close family ties predicted high levels of adaptive coping ability, which predicted improved health indicators but no decline in disease indicators.In addition, strong ties between family members predict fewer maladaptations in the face of stress setbacks, which in turn predict higher levels of positive health outcomes and fewer adverse health outcomes.The results of this study suggest that close family ties have a positive impact on adolescent health through increased use of adaptive coping strategies, reduced use of poor adaptation strategies when dealing with stress setbacks, or both.These results are important for clinical therapists working with adolescents and parents and those involved in developing health promotion programs.
撒哈拉以南非洲地区的总人口占全球的12%, 其中430万人失明, 1500多万人视力受损。但SSA每一百万人中只有2.5名眼科医生。所以在该地区对眼科医生的培训至关重要。我们设计了一套系统文献综述的方案, MEDLINE、Ovid和Embase OVID并对发表于2019年8月1日至2000年之后的文献进行了检索。我们还检索了Google Scholar和其他眼科机构的网站, 以获取更多信息。本文共纳入49篇参考文献, 并采用叙述的方式对结果进行分析。在11个英语国家, 11个法语国家和2个葡萄牙语的SSA国家中, 有56个针对眼科医生的培训机构。眼科培训课程时长的中位数为4年。大多数课程都进行了地区标准化。在一半以上的眼科培训计划中, 国内的、省内的和国际间的合作是眼科培训的关键特征。尽管可能并不总是循证的, 但该地区的专业细化仍被推动着。现有的SSA地区眼科医疗和外科培训已发表的科学数据很少, 特别是法语和葡萄牙语国家。然而, 通过广泛的审查策略, 我们有可能获得SSA眼科培训宝贵而详细的全貌。眼科医生的培训是一项复杂而又多方面的任务。现有的培训机构面临着合适的选择、能力和资金方面的挑战。许多学习成果需要课程、时间、师资、支持和适当的评估。现代培训方法提供了很多机会。合作是关键。	Sub-Saharan Africa is home to 12% of the global population, and 4.3 million are blind and over 15 million are visually impaired.There are only 2.5 ophthalmologists per million people in SSA.Training of ophthalmologists is critical.We designed a systematic literature review protocol, searched MEDLINE Ovid and Embase OVID on 1 August 2019 and limited these searches to the year 2000 onwards.We also searched Google Scholar and websites of ophthalmic institutions for additional information.We include a total of 49 references in this review and used a narrative approach to synthesise the results.There are 56 training institutions for ophthalmologists in eleven Anglophone, eleven Francophone, and two Lusophone SSA countries.The median duration of ophthalmology training programmes was 4 years.Most curricula have been regionally standardised.National, regional and international collaborations are a key feature to ophthalmology training in more than half of ophthalmology training programmes.There is a drive, although perhaps not always evidence-based, for sub-specialisation in the region.Available published scientific data on ophthalmic medical and surgical training in SSA is sparse, especially for Francophone and Lusophone countries.However, through a broad scoping review strategy it has been possible to obtain a valuable and detailed view of ophthalmology training in SSA.Training of ophthalmologists is a complex and multi-faceted task.There are challenges in appropriate selection, capacity, and funding of available training institutions.Numerous learning outcomes demand curriculum, time, faculty, support, and appropriate assessment.There are opportunities provided by modern training approaches.Partnership is key.	Sub-Saharan Africa accounts for 12 per cent of the global population, with 4.3 million blind and more than 15 million visually impaired.But the SSA has only 2.5 ophthalmologists for every one million people.So training for ophthalmologists in the region is crucial.We designed a systematic literature review program, MEDLINE, Ovid and Embase OVID, and retrieved the literature published from 1 August 2019 to 2000 onwards.We also retrieved the websites of Google Scholar and other ophthalmological institutions for more information.A total of 49 references have been included and the results analysed in a descriptive manner.There are 56 training institutions for ophthalmologists in 11 English-speaking countries, 11 francophone countries and 2 Portuguese-speaking SSA countries.The median duration of eye training courses is four years.Most courses are regionally standardized.National, provincial and international cooperation is a key feature of ophthalmology training in more than half of all eye training programmes.While it may not always be evidence-based, professional refinement in the region has been driven.Little scientific data is available for ophthalmological and surgical training in the SSA region, particularly in French and Portuguese-speaking countries.However, through an extensive review strategy, it is possible to obtain a valuable and detailed full picture of SSA eye training.The training of ophthalmologists is a complex and multifaceted task.Existing training institutions face challenges in terms of choice, capacity and funding.Many learning outcomes require curricula, time, teachers, support and appropriate assessment.Modern training methods offer many opportunities.Collaboration is key.	Sub-Saharan Africa accounts for 12 percent of the world's population, with 4.3 million people blind and more than 15 million visually impaired.But SSA has only 2.5 ophthalmologists per million people.So training eye doctors in the region is crucial.We designed a systematic literature review scheme, MEDLINE, Ovid and Embase OVID, and searched literature published between August 1, 2019 and 2000 onwards.We also searched the websites of Google Scholar and other eye facilities for more information.This paper includes 49 references and analyzes the results in a narrative manner.There are 56 training institutions for ophthalmologists in 11 English-speaking countries, 11 French-speaking countries and 2 Portuguese-speaking SSA countries.The median length of an eye training course is 4 years.Most courses are regionally standardized.National, provincial and international cooperation is a key feature of eye training in more than half of all eye training programs.Although it may not always be evidence-based, professional refinement is being driven in the region.There is little published scientific data available for ophthalmic medical and surgical training in the SSA region, especially in French-speaking and Portuguese-speaking countries.However, through extensive review strategies, it is possible to obtain a valuable and detailed overview of SSA eye training.The training of ophthalmologists is a complex and multifaceted task.Existing training institutions face challenges in terms of suitable options, capacity and funding.Many learning outcomes require curriculum, time, faculty, support and proper assessment.Modern training methods offer many opportunities.Collaboration is key.
骨肉瘤是最常见的骨恶性肿瘤。从20世纪70年代起，人类就开始使用化学治疗药物来治疗骨肉瘤。然而，多药耐药作为影响化学治疗药物疗效的主要不良反应之一，在不同程度上降低了骨肉瘤患者的生存率。Notch信号通路在骨肉瘤细胞增殖中起重要作用，同时通过减少细胞内药物累积、调控上皮-间质转化、导致微RNA失调和细胞凋亡基因的表达紊乱、调节肿瘤干细胞等方面影响肿瘤的耐药性。	Osteosarcoma is the most common malignant tumors of bone.Since 1970s, researchers had used chemotherapy drugs to treat osteosarcoma.However, multidrug resistance is a major adverse reaction that affects the efficacy of chemotherapy drugs, leading to the reduced survival rate of osteosarcoma patients.The Notch signaling pathway plays an important role in osteosarcoma proliferation, which affects tumor resistance by reducing intracellular drug accumulation, regulating epithelial-mesenchymal transition, dysregulating microRNA, disrupting the expression of apoptosis genes, and regulating tumor stem cells.	Osteosarcoma is the most common bone malignancy.Since the 1970s, humans have been using chemotherapy drugs to treat osteosarcoma.However, multi-drug resistance, one of the major adverse reactions affecting the efficacy of chemotherapy drugs, has reduced the survival rate of osteosarcoma patients to varying degreesNotch signaling pathways play an important role in osteosarcoma cell proliferation, affecting tumor resistance by reducing intracellular drug accumulation, regulating epithelial-medial transformation, causing micro-RNA disorders and apoptosis gene expression disorders, and regulating tumor stem cells.	Osteosarcoma is the most common bone malignancy.Chemotherapy drugs have been used in humans since the 1970s to treat osteosarcoma.However, multi-drug resistance, one of the main adverse effects affecting the efficacy of chemotherapy drugs, reduces survival rates in patients with osteosarcoma to varying degrees.The Notch signaling pathway plays an important role in the proliferation of osteosarcoma cells and affects tumor resistance by reducing intracellular drug accumulation, regulating epithelial-stromal transformation, causing microRNA disorders and expression disorders of apoptotic genes, and regulating tumor stem cells.
研究多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者骨髓中结缔组织生长因子（CTGF）水平及其与骨髓瘤溶骨性病变的关系，探讨CTGF在多发性骨髓瘤骨病中的临床意义。选取2019年3月-2020年4月在本院接受治疗的MM患者54例，同时选取28例健康志愿者作为对照组，收集受试者骨髓后分离骨髓上清，采用双抗体夹心酶标免疫分析法（ELISA）检测骨髓上清液中CTGF蛋白表达水平，分析其与临床相关指标之间的关系. MM患者的CTGF水平显著高于健康对照组 （P<0.001）；男性患者CTGF水平明显高于女性患者（P=0.007）；有骨病组的MM患者CTGF水平明显高于无骨病组的患者和对照组（P=0.007，P=0.001）。MM患者的CTGF水平与骨损害的病灶数呈正相关（r=0.52），≥3处骨损害患者骨髓CTGF水平显著高于<3处骨损害患者和无骨损害患者 （P=0.014，P=0.002）。ROC曲线结果表明，CTGF表达水平对于MM骨病的诊断有显著的价值（P<0.001）。MM患者CTGF水平异常高表达与骨髓瘤溶骨性病变的程度相关，能反映MM疾病的进展。	To detect the relationship between CTGF in the bone marrow of MM patients and osteolytic lesion of myeloma, moreover, to investigate the clinical significance of CTGF in MM.Fifity-four MM patients treated in our hospital from March 2019 to April 2020 were enrolled, and 28 healthy volunteers were selected as the control group.The plasma in bone marrow of the patients was collected, and the ELISA was used to detect the level of CTGF in bone marrow plasma and the relationship between its and clinical characteristics were statistically analyzed.The CTGF level of MM patients was significantly higher than those in the healthy control group (P<0.001); the CTGF level in male patients was higher than that in female patients (P=0.007); the CTGF level in MM patients with osteolytic lesions was significantly higher than patients without osteolytic lesions and controls (P=0.007, P=0.001).The CTGF level in MM patients was positively correlated with the number of bone lesions (P<0.001, r=0.52).CTGF levels in patients with ≥3 bone lesions were significantly higher than those with <3 bone lesions and without bone lesions (P=0.014, P=0.002).ROC curve result showed that CTGF expression level shows a significant diagnostic value for MM bone disease (P<0.001).The abnormally high expression of CTGF level in MM patients is related to the degree of myelomas osteolytic lesions and can reflect the progress of MM.	Study of connective tissue growth factor (CTGF) levels in bone marrow in patients with multiple myeloma (MM) and their relationship to myeloma soluble lesions, exploring the clinical significance of CTGF in multiple myeloma osteopathy.In MM patients, CTGF levels were positively correlated with the number of bone-damaged lesions (r 0.52), while in 3 bone-damaged patients, CTGF levels were significantly higher than in 3 bone-damaged patients and those without bone-damaged patients (PThe ROC curve results show that CTGF expression levels are of significant value for the diagnosis of MM osteopathy (P 0.001).The abnormally high levels of CTGF in MM patients are related to the extent of myeloma solubility and reflect the progression of MM disease.	Study the level of connective tissue growth factor (CTGF) in bone marrow in patients with multiple myeloma (MM) and its relationship with osteolytic lesions of myeloma, and explore the clinical significance of CTGF in multiple myeloma bone disease.From March 2019 to April 2020, 54 MM patients were selected, and 28 healthy volunteers were selected as a control group. After collecting the bone marrow, CTGF expression in bone marrow supravaginal cleansing was detected by ELISA. The CTGF level of MM patients was significantly higher than the healthy control group (P 0.001); the CTGF level of male patients was significantly higher than that of female patients (P 0.007); the CTGF level of MM patients with osteopathy was significantly higher than that of patients with osteopathy and the control group (P 0.007, P 0.001).CTGF levels in MM patients were positively correlated with the number of bone lesions (r 0.52), while CTGF levels in bone marrow were significantly higher in 3 bone lesions and those without bone lesions (P 0.014, P 0.002).The results of the ROC curve indicate that CTGF expression levels are of significant value for the diagnosis of MM osteopathy (P 0.001).The abnormally high expression of CTGF in MM patients is correlated with the degree of osteolytic lesions in myeloma and can reflect the progression of MM disease
空气中污染物及病菌的浓度直接影响人类健康。在污染源不变的情况下,有效通风决定了空气质量的优劣。因此,建立有效通风的定量判定指标,并利用此指标对特定区域空气质量进行实时评价,引导居民选择健康的室外活动场所成为迫切需要解决的问题。本研究采用雷诺平均Navier-Stokes(RANS)方法建立了基于计算流体力学(CFD)技术的城市空气污染模拟系统,研究了风速、污染物浓度和污染物扩散效率之间的关系。在此基础上,借助实时气象数据,对城市广场空间不同时段进行了风场模拟及空气质量评价。结果表明: 行人高度(1.5 m)空气中污染物有效扩散的临界风速值为1.0 m·s	The concentration of pollutants and pathogens in the air directly affects human health.When the pollution source remains unchanged, effective ventilation determines air quality.It is therefore critically needed to establish a quantitative determination index for effective ventilation, which can be used for real-time evaluation of air quality in specific areas, so as to guide residents to choose healthy outdoor activity places.In this study, Reynolds average Navier-Stokes (RANS) method was used to establish urban air pollution simulation system by computational fluid dynamics (CFD) technology.The correlations among wind speed, pollutant concentration, and pollutant diffusion efficiency were analyzed.With real-time meteorological data, wind field simulation and air quality evaluation were carried out for different periods of urban square space.The results showed that the critical wind speed value at pedestrian height (1.5 m) for the effective diffusion of pollutants was 1.0 m·s	The concentration of pollutants and pathogens in the air directly affects human health.When the source of pollution is unchanged, effective ventilation determines the quality of the air quality.Therefore, the establishment of quantitative indicators for effective ventilation and its use for real-time assessment of air quality in specific areas to guide the population in choosing healthy outdoor spaces is an urgent problem.Using the Renault Average Navier-Stokes (RANS) method, the study established an urban air pollution simulation system based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) technology, examining the relationship between wind speed, pollutant concentration and pollutant diffusionOn this basis, wind farm simulations and air quality evaluations were conducted at different times of the city square space with the help of real-time weather data.The result: Pedestrian height (1.5m) The critical wind speed of the effective diffusion of pollutants in the air is 1.0m	Concentrations of airborne pollutants and germs directly affect human health.Under the same pollution source, effective ventilation determines the quality of air.Therefore, establishing quantitative indicators for effective ventilation and using these indicators to evaluate air quality in specific areas in real time has become an urgent issue to guide residents in choosing healthy outdoor places.Using the Renault Average Navier-Stokes (RANS) method, this study established a simulation system of urban air pollution based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) technology.Based on this, real-time meteorological data were used to simulate wind fields and evaluate air quality at different times in urban square space.The results show that the critical wind speed value for effective diffusion of pollutants in the air at pedestrian height (1.5m) is 1.0m s
为实现世界卫生组织提出的"2030年消除病毒性肝炎作为重大公共卫生威胁"的目标，慢性乙型肝炎（CHB）治疗药物的研发领域近年正处于快速发展阶段。早期临床试验（包括首次人体试验）关注于受试者的选择、研究设计、给药剂量和方式的选择、剂量爬坡、不良事件/反应（耐受性评价）的监测、观察和报告程序，以及受试者继续给药和停止给药的标准。需要引入定量药理学知识来分析药物的体内暴露量与药效、不良反应的关系，以及纳入探索性指标：乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）RNA、HBV核心相关抗原（HBcrAg）等，来分析新药作用机制和靶点及其抗肝细胞内HBV共价闭合环状DNA的药效。而II～III期临床试验则更关注最佳剂量、疗效、安全性指标，验证新药在更大受试者人群范围内所选择剂量的疗效和安全性。根据国内外有关文献，并结合作者早期临床研究的实践经验,简要介绍CHB创新性药物临床试验设计中应关注的临床问题。	The research and development of chronic hepatitis B (CHB) therapeutic drugs has been undergoing rapid development in recent years in order to achieve the World Health Organization's goal of eliminating viral hepatitis as a major public health threat by 2030.The focus of early stage clinical trials (including the first human trial) is the selection of subjects, study design, dose selection, administration method, dose escalation, monitoring, observation and reporting procedures for adverse events/reactions (tolerability evaluation), and criteria for subjects to continue and discontinue administration.Therefore, quantitative pharmacology knowledge is required to analyze the relationship between in vivo drug exposure, efficacy and adverse reactions, and the inclusion of exploratory indicators such as HBV RNA, hepatitis B virus core-related antigen (HBcrAg), etc., to analyze the mechanism and target of innovative drugs and the efficacy of cccDNA in anti-hepatocytes.On the other hand, Phase II-III clinical trials prioritize the optimal dose, efficacy and safety indicators to verify the efficacy and safety of new drugs in a wider range of subjects.This paper refers to the relevant domestic and foreign literature, combined with the author's practical experience in early clinical research, and then briefly introduces the clinical issues that should be paid attention to in the design of clinical trials of CHB innovative drugs.	In order to achieve the World Health Organization's goal of "eliminating viral hepatitis as a major public health threat by 2030," the field of research and development of chronic hepatitis B (CHB) treatment drugs has been in rapid development in recent years.Early clinical trials (including the first human trial) focused on the selection of the subjects, the design of the study, the selection of the dose and manner of administration, the dose creep, the monitoring, observation and reporting procedures for adverse events / reactions (tolerance evaluation), and the criteria for the continuation and discontinuation of administration of the drug.Quantitative pharmacological knowledge is needed to analyze the relationship between drug exposure and efficacy, adverse reactions, and exploratory indicators: Hepatitis B virus (HBV) RNA, HBcrAg core-related antigen (HBcrAg), to analyze the efficacy of new drug action mechanisms and targets and HBV covalently closed cyclic DNA in anti-hepatocytes.Phase II III clinical trials focus more on optimal dose, efficacy, and safety indicators, and verify the efficacy and safety of the dose chosen by the new drug in a larger group of subjects.Based on the relevant literature at home and abroad, and taking into account the author's practical experience in early clinical research, we will briefly introduce the clinical issues that should be of concern	In order to achieve the World Health Organization goal of "eliminating viral hepatitis as a major public health threat by 2030," the field of research and development of drugs for chronic hepatitis B (CHB) treatment has been developing rapidly in recent years.Early clinical trials (including first human trials) focus on subject selection, study design, choice of dosage and mode of administration, dose climb, monitoring, observation and reporting procedures for adverse events / reactions (tolerance evaluation), and criteria for subjects to continue and discontinue administration.Quantitative pharmacological knowledge is needed to analyze the relationship between in vivo exposure and efficacy and adverse reactions, and to include exploratory indicators: hepatitis B virus (HBV) RNA, HBV core-associated antigen (HBcrAg), etc., to analyze the mechanism of action and target of new drugs and the efficacy of HBV covalent closed loop DNA in anti-hepatocytes.Phase II-III clinical trials focus more on optimal dosage, efficacy, and safety indicators to verify the efficacy and safety of new drugs in a larger population of selected 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。DBDs 可以持续到成年期，带来诸多不良后果。在发达国家的高度贫困社区，针对DBDs的有效干预措施已经得到开发和测试。但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。该论文描述了一项源自美国的循证干预措施在乌干达的国情下如何尽可能优化并保持原有效度的调适过程。作为一项随机测试的部分内容，本文调查研究了乌干达的30所学校中表现出行为问题的青少年及其他们的照顾者。研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。本文描述了原有干预措施和调整后的干预方案在内容方面以及实施方法上的异同。研究结果还强调了让社区利益相关者参与调适修改过程的重要性。	In Uganda, one in five children presents mental health challenges, including disruptive behavior disorders (DBDs).DBDs can persist through adulthood and result in negative outcomes.Effective interventions for DBDs have been developed and tested in high-poverty communities in developed countries.Yet, most African countries, such as Uganda, lack such interventions.This paper describes the adaptation process of an evidence-based intervention of U.S. origin to optimize fit to context with intervention fidelity, as part of a randomized trial conducted with youth that exhibit behavioral challenges and their caregivers in 30 schools in Uganda.The process involved: initial meetings with headteachers and teachers to introduce the study and the main concepts of the intervention; initial manual review focusing on 4Rs and 2Ss content by the Uganda team; engagement of community stakeholders for additional feedback on content and cultural relevance; final revision of the manual; and collection of children's drawings for the illustration of the manual.This paper describes both similarities and differences between the original and adapted intervention content and methods of delivery.The findings also highlight the importance of involving community stakeholders in the adaptation process.	One in every five children in Uganda has mental health problems one way or another, including disruptive behavioural disorders (DBDs).DBDs can continue into adulthood with many negative consequences.Effective interventions against DBDs have been developed and tested in highly deprived communities in developed countries.But in most African countries, such as Uganda, related interventions remain rare.The paper describes how an evidence-based intervention originating in the United States, in the case of Uganda, can optimize and maintain the adaptation process as effectively as possible.As part of a randomized test, the paper looked at teens in 30 schools in Uganda who show behavioral problems and their caregivers.The research process involved the following: the initial organization of a gathering of principals and teachers to present the contents of the study and the main concepts of the intervention; the organization of a holistic learning exercise on 4Rs and 2Ss by the Ugandan team during the initial phase; the active involvement of community stakeholders and the provision of additional feedback on the content and cultural relevance of the intervention; the final revision of the instruction manual; and the collection of drawingsThe present paper describes the differences in content and implementation of the original and adjusted interventions.The study also highlighted the importance of involving community stakeholders in the adaptation process.	One in five children in Uganda has mental health problems of one kind or another, including disruptive behavioural disorders (DBDs).DBDs can last into adulthood with many adverse consequences.In highly deprived communities in developed countries, effective interventions targeting DBDs have been developed and tested.But interventions remain rare in most African countries like Uganda.The paper describes an adaptation process for how evidence-based interventions originating in the United States can optimize and maintain their original effectiveness in the Ugandan context.As part of a randomized test, the paper looked at teenagers who showed behavioural problems and their caregivers in 30 schools in Uganda.The research process involved the following: initial organization of a gathering of principals and teachers to present the content of the study and the main concepts of the intervention; organization of a Ugandan team to conduct holistic learning on 4Rs and 2Ss-related content during the initial phase; active involvement of community stakeholders and additional feedback on the content and cultural relevance of the intervention; final revision of the instruction manual; collection of children's drawings for use in editing the manual.This paper describes the similarities and differences between the original interventions and the adapted intervention programmes in terms of content and implementation methods.The findings also highlight the importance of involving community stakeholders in the adaptation process.
总结跟腱病的分类、诊断和临床治疗方案的研究进展。检索国内外与跟腱病相关的研究文献，主要对其分类及名称、影像学诊断和临床治疗方案等方面的研究成果进行总结。跟腱病的分类和名称未完全统一，概念模糊，病因尚未明确，治疗方案较多，但缺乏有效的循证医学研究。跟腱病的诊断和治疗复杂，需依据跟腱解剖学和病因学特点，进一步明确其分类和定义，以更有效指导临床治疗，方便经验交流与学习。	To explore the classification, diagnosis, and clinical treatment of Achilles tendinopathy.The literature about Achilles tendinopathy at home and abroad was reviewed.The research results of classification and terms, imaging diagnosis, and clinical treatment of Achilles tendinopathy were summarized.The classification and name of Achilles tendinopathy are not completely unified, and the concept is vague, the cause of disease is not clear.There are many treatment plans, but there is no effective evidence-based medicine research.The diagnosis and treatment of Achilles tendinopathy is complicated.According to the characteristics of Achilles tendon anatomy and etiology, the classification and definition of Achilles tendinopathy need to be further studied in order to guide clinical treatment more effectively and facilitate experience exchange and learning.	To summarize the progress of research on the classification, diagnosis and clinical treatment of Achilles tendon disease.Search the national and international research literature related to Achilles tendon disease, mainly to summarize its classification and name, imaging diagnosis and clinical treatment programs.The classification and nomenclature of Achilles tendon disease is not fully uniform, conceptual ambiguity, cause is not clear, treatment options are numerous, but there is a lack of effectiveThe diagnosis and treatment of Achilles tendon disease is complex. Based on the anatomical and etiological characteristics of achilles tendon, its classification and definition need to be further clarified to guide clinical treatment more effectively and facilitate	Summary of progress in classification, diagnosis and clinical treatment of Achilles tendon disease.Search domestic and foreign research literature related to Achilles tendon disease, mainly to summarize the research results of its classification and name, imaging diagnosis and clinical treatment plan.The classification and name of Achilles tendon disease is not fully uniform, the concept is vague, the cause is not clear, there are many treatment options, but there is a lack of effective evidence-basedThe diagnosis and treatment of Achilles tendon disease is complex. It needs to be classified and defined based on Achilles tendon anatomy and etiology characteristics to guide clinical treatment more effectively and facilitate experience exchange and learning.
人工智能是在电子计算机技术基础上迅速发展起来的科学技术，已应用于人类社会的许多方面，在医学领域的应用也越来越广泛，人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展和应用可在一定程度上引领口腔医学的未来。口腔医学专业人员需要认知、学习和掌握人工智能技术，紧跟医疗新时代的步伐并在医疗实践中开展应用。本文就人工智能在口腔医疗、科研、教学中的应用及研究作一介绍，并对人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展进行展望。	Artificial intelligence (AI) is a kind of technology which is rapidly developed on the basis of computer technology.AI makes it possible for machines to learn from experience, adjust to new inputs and perform human-like tasks.It has been applied in many fields of human society, and is more and more widely used in medical field.The development and application of AI in stomatology will lead the future of stomatology to a certain extent.It is very important for stomatology professionals to recognize, learn and master AI, to keep pace with the pace of the new era of medical treatment and to apply it in medical practice.This paper introduces the application and progress of AI in stomatology clinic, research and teaching field, analyzes the existing and possible problems, and prospects the development of AI in the field of stomatology.	Artificial intelligence is a rapidly developing science and technology based on computer technology. It has been applied to many aspects of human society and is increasingly used in the field of medicine. The development and application of artificial intelligence in the field of dental medicine can lead the future of dental medicine to a certain extent.Dental professionals need to recognize, learn, and master artificial intelligence technology to keep up with the new era of medical care and to apply it in medical practice.This article introduces the application and research of artificial intelligence in oral medicine, scientific research and teaching, and looks forward to the development of artificial intelligence in the field of dental medicine.	Artificial intelligence is the rapid development of science and technology based on computer technology, has been applied to many aspects of human society, in the field of medicine is increasingly widely used, the development and application of artificial intelligence in the field of dentistry can lead the future of dentistry to a certain extent.Dental professionals need to recognize, learn and master AI technologies to keep pace with the new era of healthcare and apply them in medical practice.This paper introduces the application and research of artificial intelligence in dental medicine, scientific research and teaching, and provides prospects for the development of artificial intelligence in the field of dentistry.
直接抗病毒药物（DAAs），是治疗慢性乙型肝炎的重要手段。DAAs能直接干扰病毒的感染复制过程，减少子代病毒产率，继而影响体内乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）的两种动态平衡，即肝细胞中病毒复制-循环中病毒衰减之间的平衡，共价闭合环状DNA（cccDNA）池补充-cccDNA衰减之间的平衡。现有核苷（酸）类似物足以影响第一种平衡，却难以撼动第二种平衡。因此，靶向HBV感染复制的不同环节，开发新型DAAs十分必要。现从cccDNA池补充-cccDNA衰减这一平衡的两个方面，探讨近期DAAs研发的主要进展。	Direct-acting antivirals (DAAs) play a critical role for the therapy of chronical hepatitis B.DAAs can decrease the production of viral progeny of hepatitis B virus (HBV), breaking the viral dynamic equilibrium between: (1) virion production from hepatocytes and clearance from circulation; (2) replenishment and decay of covalently closed circular (ccc)DNA pool inside infected hepatocytes.Nucleos(t)ide analogues can potently shift the first balance to undetectable viremia in the blood, but have limited or no effect on the second one, thus making it imperative to develop new agents targeting additional step(s) of HBV life cycle.We herein briefly introduce the DAAs currently in development by classifying them as agents affecting the replenishment or the decay of cccDNA pool.	Direct antiviral drugs (DAAs) are an important means of treating chronic hepatitis B.DAAs can directly interfere with the viral replication process and reduce the yield of subgenerative viruses, which in turn affect the two dynamic equilibria of hepatitis B virus (HBV) in the body, that is, the balance between virus replication in liver cells - virus decay in circulation, and covalent closed cyclic DNA (cccDNA) pool supplement - cccDNA decay.The existing nucleoside (acid) analogue is enough to influence the first equilibrium, but it is difficult to shake the secondTherefore, the development of new types of DAAs is necessary for the replication of vertical HBV infection.From the cccDNA pool supplement - cccDNA attenuation the balance of two aspects, to discuss the recent major developments in the development of DAAs.	Direct antiviral drugs (DAAs) are an important means of treating chronic hepatitis B.DAAs can directly interfere with viral infection replication processes, reduce the yield of progenitor viruses, and then affect the two dynamic equilibrium of hepatitis B virus (HBV) in the body, namely, the balance between viral replication-circulation viral attenuation in liver cells and the balance between covalent closed ring DNA (cccDNA) pool supplement-cccDNA attenuationExisting nucleoside (acid) analogues are sufficient to affect the first equilibrium, but difficult to shake the second.Therefore, it is necessary to develop new types of DAAs that target different aspects of replication of HBV infection.The two aspects of the balance of cccDNA pool supplementation -cccDNA attenuation are discussed.
研究STAT3在耐药白血病细胞凋亡及免疫逃逸中的作用，并探讨白血病微小残留病引起的白血病复发的可能机制。用pcDNA3.1-STAT3质粒转染K562细胞，建立耐药白血病细胞株K562/STAT3细胞。RQ-PCR和（或）Western blot检测空载质粒转染的对照细胞株K562/-细胞和K562/STAT3细胞中STAT3、BAX以及NKG2D配体的表达。流式细胞术检测K562/-细胞和K562/STAT3细胞的凋亡情况及NK细胞对K562/-细胞和K562/STAT3细胞的杀伤作用。K562/STAT3细胞中总STAT3和STAT3磷酸化水平均明显升高，而且其耐药蛋白P-gp mRNA的表达明显升高（P<0.005）。与K562/-细胞相比，K562/STAT3细胞促凋亡基因BAX mRNA的表达水平明显下降（P=0.005），且多柔比星引起的K562/STAT3细胞凋亡明显减少（P=0.002）；用STAT3抑制剂（SH-4-54）处理K562/STAT3细胞后，促凋亡基因BAX mRNA的表达水平明显升高（P=0.017），同时细胞凋亡也明显增加（P=0.005）。与K562/-细胞相比，K562/STAT3细胞NKG2D配体（MICA和ULBP1）mRNA的表达水平明显下降（P<0.0001），MICA和ULBP1蛋白的表达水平亦明显下降（MICA：P=0.001，ULBP1：P=0.022）；用STAT3抑制剂（SH-4-54）处理K562/STAT3细胞后，MICA mRNA和蛋白表达水平升高（mRNA：P=0.001，蛋白：P=0.002），但ULBP1 mRNA和蛋白无明显改变（mRNA：P=0.137，蛋白：P=0.1905）。NK细胞对耐药K562/STAT3细胞的杀伤能力较K562/-细胞下降（P=0.002），但是STAT3抑制剂恢复了K562/STAT3细胞对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性（P=0.006）. STAT3磷酸化介导了耐药白血病细胞抗凋亡，降低其对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性。STAT3抑制剂可以促进耐药白血病细胞凋亡并增加其对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性。	To investigate the mechanisms of anti-apoptosis and immune evasion in drug-resistant leukemia cells mediated by STAT3, further to explore the possible mechanism of leukemia relapse caused by minimal residual.Drug-resistance leukemia cell line was established by transfecting pcDNA3.1-STAT3 into K562 cells (K562/STAT3).The expression of STAT3, BAX and NKG2D ligands (MICA and ULBP1) in K562/-cells, K562/STAT3 were detected by Western blot and/or RQ-PCR.Cells apoptosis and the killing effect of NK cells on leukemia cells were detected by flow cytometry.The expression of the total STAT3, STAT3 phosphorylation in K562/STAT3 was significantly increased, and P-gp mRNA expression was increased also significantly (P<0.005).In K562/STAT3 cells, the expression of pro-apoptotic BAX (P=0.005) was significantly lower, and the number of apoptotic cells (P=0.002) induced by adriamycin was significantly decreased as compared with those in K562/- cells.After K562/STAT3 cells were treated by STAT3 inhibitor (SH-4-54), the expression of BAX mRNA (P=0.017) was significantly higher and the number of apoptotic cells (P=0.005) was significantly increased.The MICA and ULBP1 mRNA expression in K562/STAT3 cells was significantly lower than that in K562/- cells, and also for MICA and ULBP1 protein (MICA and ULPB1 mRNA: P<0.0001, MICA protein: P=0.001, ULPB1 protein: P=0.022).After K562/STAT3 cells were treated with STAT3 inhibitor (SH-4-54), the expression of MICA mRNA and protein was increased (mRNA: P=0.001, protein: P=0.002), but ULBP1 mRNA and protein showed no significantly change (mRNA: P=0.137, protein: P=0.1905).The cytotoxicity of NK cells to K562/STAT3 cells was susceptible as compared with K562/- (P=0.002), but the cytotoxicity of K562/STAT3 cells to NK cell could be recovered by STAT3 inhibitor (P=0.006).STAT3 phosphorylation can inhibits cell apoptosis and promotes cell immune escape.STAT3 inhibitors can promote the apoptosis of leukemia cells and increase their sensitivity to NK cells.	Study the role of STAT3 in apoptosis and immune flight in drug-resistant leukemia cells, and explore possible mechanisms for the recurrence of leukemia caused by small residual leukemiaK562 cells are transfected with pcDNA3.1-STAT3 plasmid to create a drug-resistant leukemia cell line K562 / STAT3 cells.RQ-PCR and / or Western blot detect expression of STAT3, BAX and NKG2D ligands in control cell lines K562 / - cells and K562 / STAT3 cells with no-load plasmid transfection.Fluid cytometry detects apoptosis in K562 / -cells and K562 / STAT3 cells and the killing effect of NK cells on K562 / -cells and K562 / STAT3The total STAT3 and STAT3 phosphorylation levels in K562 / STAT3 cells increased significantly, as did the expression of the drug-resistant protein P-gp mRNA (P 0.005).The expression levels of the K562 / STAT3 apoptosis promotion gene BAX mRNA decreased significantly (P 0.005) compared to K562 / -cells, and apoptosis due to polypeptides was significantly reduced (P 0.002); the apoptosis promotion gene BAX mRNA was significantly increased (P 0.017) after processing K562 / STAT3 cells with STAT3 inhibitors (SH-4-54), and apoptosis was significantly increased (P 0.005).Compared to K562 / - cells, the expression levels of the NKG2D ligand (MICA and ULBP1) of K562 / STAT3 cells decreased significantly (P 0.0001) and the expression levels of the MICA and ULBP1 proteins decreased significantly (MICA: P 0.001, ULBP1: P 0.022); the expression levels of the MICA mRNA and protein increased (mRNA: P 0.001, protein: P 0.002) after processing the K562 / STAT3 cells with the STAT3 inhibitor (SH-4-54), but there was no significant change in the ULBP1 mRNA and protein (mRNA: P 0.137, protein: PThe ability of NK cells to kill drug-resistant K562 / STAT3 cells was reduced compared to K562 / - cells (P 0.002), but the STAT3 inhibitor restored K562 / STAT3 cell killing sensitivity to NK cells (P 0.006).STAT3 inhibitors promote apoptosis in drug-resistant leukemia cells and increase their killing sensitivity to NK cells.	Study the role of STAT3 in drug-resistant leukemia cell apoptosis and immune escape, and explore possible mechanisms for leukemia recurrence caused by small residual diseases of leukemia.Transfection of K562 cells with pcDNA3.1-STAT3 plasmid to establish drug-resistant leukemia cell line K562 / STAT3 cells.RQ-PCR and / or Western blot detect expression of STAT3, BAX and NKG2D ligands in control cell lines K562 / - cells and K562 / STAT3 cells for airborne plasmid transfection.Flow cytometry detects apoptosis of K562 / - cells and K562 / STAT3 cells and the lethal effect of NK cells on K562 / - cells and K562 / STAT3 cells.Both total STAT3 and STAT3 phosphorylation levels were significantly increased in K562 / STAT3 cells and the expression of the drug-resistant protein P-gp mRNA was significantly increased (P 0.005).Compared with K562 / -cells, expression levels of the apoptotic gene BAX mRNA of K562 / STAT3 decreased significantly (P 0.005), and apoptosis levels of K562 / STAT3 cells decreased significantly (P 0.002) caused by polysilicon stars. After treatment of K562 / STAT3 cells with STAT3 inhibitors (SH-4-54), expression levels of apoptosis gene BAX mRNA increased significantly (P 0.017) and apoptosis increased significantly (P 0.005).Compared to K562 / -cells, expression levels of NKG2D ligand (MICA and ULBP1) mRNA in K562 / STAT3 cells decreased significantly (P 0.0001), and expression levels of MICA and ULBP1 proteins decreased significantly (MICA: P 0.001, ULBP1: P 0.022). After treatment of K562 / STAT3 cells with STAT3 inhibitors (SH-4-54), MICA mRNA and protein expression levels increased (mRNA: P 0.001, protein: P 0.002), but ULBP1 mRNA and protein did not change significantly (mRNA: P 0.137, protein: P 0.1905).K562 / STAT3 cells are less capable of killing than K562 / -cells (P 0.002), but STAT3 inhibitors restore K562 / STAT3 cell kill sensitivity to NK cells (P 0.006). STAT3 phosphorylation mediates anti-apoptosis of resistant leukemia cells, reducing their kill sensitivity to NK cells.STAT3 inhibitors promote apoptosis of drug-resistant leukemia cells and increase their kill sensitivity to NK cells.
本研究旨在阐明父母依恋对青少年创伤后生长（PTG）的影响机制。汶川地震发生9年半后，在872名中国青少年使用自我报告问卷进行了评估。结果显示，父母依恋与PTG有直接关联，两个显著的一阶间接（one-step indirect ）（通过公正信念和认知重新评估）关联PTG，两个显著的二阶间接关联（通过公正信念到安全感和通过认知到公正信念）和一个显著的三阶间接关联（通过安全感到公正信念到认知重评）。结果表明，安全感，公正信念和认知重评中介了父母依恋与PTG之间的关联。这些研究结果突出了家庭观点的重要性，临床心理学家可以通过帮助他们建立积极的父母依恋来促进青少年的PTG。	This study aimed to elucidate the mechanism underlying the effect of parental attachment on post-traumatic growth (PTG) among adolescents.Nine and a half years after the Wenchuan earthquake, 872 adolescents in China were assessed using self-reported questionnaires.The results showed that parental attachment had a direct association with PTG, two significant one-step indirect associations with PTG (through justice beliefs and cognitive reappraisal), two significant two-step indirect associations (through feelings of safety via justice beliefs and justice beliefs via cognitive reappraisal), and one significant three-step indirect association (through feelings of safety via justice beliefs by cognitive reappraisal).The results indicated that feelings of safety, justice beliefs, and cognitive reappraisal mediated the association between parental attachment and PTG.These findings highlight the importance of a family perspective and may help clinical psychologists to improve adolescents' PTG by helping them to build positive parental attachments.	This study aims to shed light on the mechanisms by which parental attachment affects post-traumatic growth (PTG) in adolescents.Nine and a half years after the Wenchuan earthquake, 872 Chinese teens were assessed using self-reported questionnaires.The results show that parental attachment is directly related to PTG, with two significant one-step indirect associations (reassessment through fair conviction and cognition) with PTG, two significant second-order indirect associations (perception through fair conviction to security and perception to fair conviction) and a significant third-order indirect association (perception through security to fair conviction to cognitive reassessment).The results showed that a sense of security, fair beliefs, and cognitive reassessment mediated the association between parental attachment and PTG.The findings highlight the importance of family viewpoints, where clinical psychologists can promote adolescent PTG by helping them build positive parental attachment.	This study aims to elucidate the mechanisms by which parental attachment affects adolescent post-traumatic growth (PTG).Nine and a half years after the Wenchuan earthquake, 872 Chinese teenagers were assessed using a self-report questionnaire.The results showed that parental attachment was directly associated with PTG, with two significant one-step indirect associations (through fair belief and cognitive reassessment) associated with PTG, two significant second-order indirect associations (through fair belief to sense of security and through cognition to fair belief) and a significant third-order indirect association (through feeling safe to feel fair belief to cognitive reassessment).The results showed that feelings of security, impartial beliefs, and cognitive re-evaluation mediated the association between parental attachment and PTG.The findings highlight the importance of family perspective, and clinical psychologists can promote PTGs in teens by helping them build positive parental attachment.
